reviews.reviewText: Got it for my daughter for her birthday. I have no clue how easy it is to use but i can tell you that she has it playing while she is doing whatever. I can hear every word clearly as can be even if i am a few rooms over. I dont know what she is listening to but whatever it is, it shouldn't be called music.

reviews.reviewTitle: The speaker will turn off after a while.
reviews.reviewText:
The speaker has very good sound, on some things there will be a lag in the sound through the speaker, not with every thing, Play a movie using a computer and the speaker for sound and you will get a lag in the sound coming from the speaker, I did a lot of different things using the speaker and for me what i just said about lag time, is not a minus, it's normal. I used the speaker with a cell phone, laptop, Desktop, and a Cell phone Tablet. Operating Systems, Win XP, Win 7, Linux Mint 18.3, The speaker worked well with everything. Sound Quality is very good, Battery time is good, Durability is very good, but I do take Care of my equipment. PS. The speaker will turn off after about 10 to 15 minutes of non use, Not a bad thing, It won't drain out of power by being on all the time even when not in use.
Thank you, Hope this info is of help.

Great little speaker. It's about the size of a hockey puck. Love the rose gold color! It was very simple to pair to my phone and had good sound. Speaker is located on bottom but it still had good sound. Impressed for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best speaker ever at this price!
reviews.reviewText: Listen, I can't tell you what the other people who had purchased this were talking about in regards to muffle sound. But my findings are that this is the most fantastic Bluetooth speaker I have ever purchased and I have purchased a lot. First of all it looks amazing! Secondly it feels like money. And the controls are incredibly easy and intuitive. I might even add slick. I have no idea why they are selling at this price. Because the moment I'm done this I'm buying four more before the price goes up. The sound is gorgeous! But if you're looking for sonus Sound by sonus. Xleader is a powerful sound producer with a great deal of quality. You will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewTitle: I love this Bluetooth Speaker it's has great quality sound
reviews.reviewText: I love this Bluetooth Speaker it's has great quality sound, its small and attractive. It plays for hours at a time, I love the rose gold color. Although it's small the sound is awesome! As you can see I'm very pleased with this product!! I highly recommend this product. The price is unbelievable for such a great product! Also it's very easy to set up.

This speaker really shocked me at how well it works! For it to be so small, the sound quality is great. Although, to my ears, the quality is even clearer when I turn the speaker upside down. Very easy to use, as I just pulled it out of the box, charged it, & paired it to my phone just like that. I have to agree with another reviewer that the speaking it does when you power on & off, pairing, or when a call comes through is a little loud & obnoxious. Love the colors & the design is very chic for its inexpensive price tag. A gadget I'm actually happy I spent my money on!

Exactly as described, and with the silver finish it looks like a high-end speaker. Nice heavy-weight item, not like some cheap plastic speakers. It's about the exact same size as an Echo Dot with decent sound until it gets really loud. My 9-year old can totally operate it with his iPad and reconnect it with no problem. I was pleasantly surprised considering how many bluetooth speakers are available on Amazon.

¬†I had some serious doubts about this, but those doubts have been dashed! This small speaker has some real juice. It is louder than I expected, and it is extremely clear.

Also, the Bluetooth is great. It hooks up almost effortlessly. I can control music playing on the speaker while on my phone downstairs. This thing works.

I also posted a video of it playing.

I bought this as a gift for my son. For the price, I wasn't expecting much. I was wrong. The sound is beautiful and my son is hard to please. He liked it! There's nothing like the feeling of buying a gift someone loves and getting it for a good deal.
I like the sound quality of the device, the color and style. However after only 2weeks the device won‚Äôt charge and therefore won‚Äôt play. Unfortunately I have to return it.

This little speaker is amazing! So far I have only had it for a couple of months, but sounds awsome. I use it mostily for my audible books at night as well as my workouts and its better than my $50 speaker that I broke. When hooked to the phone the beeps from charging changing, volume and mods are very light compared to the volume you have it set at. I really like this little sound monster and will be more than likely buying another.
Day 3.
this lthing is awaome and continues to work well beyound what I expected. Shipping was exellent, packaging was perfect and came in perfect working order. I have used for music through pandora, my audihle books, but make sure you disconnect from phone before you leave the room or it might get a bit embarrasing when you try and answer calls lol. Cant relay how happy I am with tgis product.

I wanted something to use for small get-togethers in my small apartment and this did the trick. The speaker is on the bottom of the device and sounded a bit hollow at first; however, once I adjusted the equalizer on Spotify the sound improved immensely and is of a very good quality. The only drawback is that the directions are unreadable and written by somebody who doesn't know English well, so if you're not tech savvy and can't figure things out for yourself you may have trouble.

I purchased the Xleader Portable Speaker to replace a couple of old Bluetooth speakers that had stopped working. I figured for the price I couldn't go wrong. It was very easy to set up and when I played music I was amazed at the sound quality for such a small speaker. The controls are clearly visible on top and easy to use. I was a bit concerned the with the speaker on the bottom that the sound might be muffled, but the was not the case. The sound comes out clear. I used the speaker to make a phone call on my cell phone and the conversation was clear at both ends. I was so satisfied with the speaker that I ordered two more so I could listen to music throughout the house. It is small, approximately the same size as my Echo Dot, and can be placed just about anywhere. I purchased the 3rd speaker specifically to hook up to the Echo Dot with the Bluetooth feature. I also have the option of connecting it with the supplied cable. I am very satisfied with the Xleader speakers, especially for the price, and would recommend it to others.
Ordered this speaker for my new office and it's great! So minimal, chic looking with the rose gold & the sound is great. :)

reviews.reviewText: The rose gold color of this speaker is beautiful. Sound is full and clear. It's a great size. I take this speaker with me from room to room, even outside in the backyard with not a single problem.

It works perfect on Bluetooth mode, so I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs my cable or a problem in the speaker....

reviews.reviewTitle: Can't beat the quality, can't beat the customer service, cannot beat the price
reviews.reviewText:
I use this as a Bluetooth speaker, also connected via a 3.5 millimeter audio jack straight to my echo Dot, connected to that it makes the. So loud almost as if you had the large one.
It is well made, great customer service, the only weird thing is the actual speakers are upside down, it doesn't affect performance but still very odd.
I do love the highlighted touch interface, you know to lower the volume and make it louder and pause and such, it's good at night to be able to see what you're touching if you have to.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I work front desk at an office and I wanted something wireless to play some soft music since it's always so quiet up front. This is exactly what I was looking for. It's not bulky and it's a really good price and works for exactly what I needed it for. Also the battery lasts reeeeeally long, which is something I was worried about, and it's nice because there is a battery life indicator on your phone when the Bluetooth is connected. I like that it did also come with an aux cord so that is an option for you as well if you prefer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does what it's supposed to do!
reviews.reviewText:
After my previous wireless speaker broke after only 2 days, I ordered this one. The stereo in my car broke so I am using it in my car. It works perfectly for that. The speaker part is at the bottom, but in my console it bounces the sound back up so it seems louder. So if you are looking for something to do that, I highly recommend.

The other thing about this is that it's too hot to keep it in my car so it lives mostly in my purse. It gets transferred in and out a lot since I use it every time I use my car. I'm pretty impressed that it hasn't broken just with all the moving around and being thrown in my bag with other stuff. Since my other speaker broke so quickly, I intentionally waited to write a review. I've had this for a couple months now and I'm satisfied that it's doing the job and it's worth the price.

As for now I am really shocked by this small and cute beast. Amazing and clear sound, longest battery life ever. On the down side for some would be its craftmanship, is not for the heavy handed people or butterfinger ones, Im pretty sure one fall and is going to be the end of it, maybe not but Im not trying to find out. But overall is an extreme great purchase and value. Good anti slip bottom also. Very happy with my purchase.

I bought one & I liked it so much that I bought another! One is for home & took the second one to work. I bought the cute little carrying case for the one at work. I can play music for about 6 hours & then plug it into laptop for a charge. Wish it played longer before needing a charge but no biggie. I recommend this speaker to anyone that needs big sound in a tiny package. Plus it's adorably cute in rose!! (Matching case!) And matches my phone color.... What more could a girl ask for??? Oh yeah, it shipped quickly & arrived in tip top shape.
It came quick and nicely packaged! Its the perfect little speaker! I use it every morning listening to music while i get ready for work! Sound is pretty good even when it is at its loudest!

reviews.reviewTitle: This speaker is a class act
reviews.reviewText: The Bluetooth connection for this product is better than any of the other Bluetooth speakers or earpieces that I have it gives me a flawless connection every time I have never been this happy with a speaker I am so glad that I found this I have two and I am going to order a third and possibly a fourth
Small and mighty. Great sound. You can crank it up by the pool and the neighbors three houses down will hear it. Easy to operate too. So happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Speaker/Get in time for Christmas
reviews.reviewText:
WOW! This is a little speaker with a powerful sound. I have purchased other small speakers from other companies and nothing compares to the LED TOUCH DESIGN.. Last night, I hadChristmas music playing and I literally had to turn the volume down it was so loud.
The vendor sent me 2 request for an honest review. Im glad he did. My initial intent was to send it the moment I used it. But, I was having too much fun listening to my podcast and music. I actually took it on a recent trip. IT keeps the charge . Sorry, I can't say how many hours Ive used it without charging. But, I haven't charged it again. And, I've watched a Netflix series, listened to music, and several podcast within a few weeks. This would be a great stocking stuffer.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's amazing. I actually have to turn the volume down ...
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this small bluetooth speaker for my desk. It's amazing. I actually have to turn the volume down to two bars because the sound is that clear! I highly recommend this speaker!

Omg, l love this little music puck! I wanted something l could stream music to outside on my deck that didn't cost a lot of money. I also have a medieval style room where l wanted music but didn't want the glaring modernity of electronics. This is perfect. I bluetooth my phone to this speaker, select my music, and carry this puck with me wherever l want. The sound is good, it's easy to use, and it's non-obtrusive - all important factors for me. I'm very, very pleased with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love to listen to music and the [LED Touch Design] ...
reviews.reviewText: I love to listen to music and the [LED Touch Design] Bluetooth Speaker, XLeader Portable Speaker with HD Sound / 12-Hour Playtime / Bluetooth 4.1 / Micro SD Support, for iphone/ipad/Tablet/Laptop/Echo dot (gold) helps me to do that. Bought this just for me! Took it to work for my office and it works beautifully. Love the rose gold color and the sound is great. It was very easy to pair with my phone and I can listen for hours without recharging.

Love it‚Äôs compactness, it‚Äôs capacity to fill up the room, and its affordability. The color selection, however, could improve but worth the purchase nonetheless.

This speaker filled up my front porch. It‚Äôs clear and has impressive high volume quality. It‚Äôs compactness is much appreciated.

Great, loud, clear sound! This little speaker packs a punch and goes much louder than my echo dot. Bluetooth paired easy with my Amazon echo dot. Just hold down power button on the speaker until it speaks it's on Bluetooth and it will be flashing. Then open your Alexa app, select settings, select your Echo dot, select Bluetooth, select pair new device, when the "A8" shows on screen tap it, and done!! I do agree that the speaker would be better on the top of the device because when I have it on a flat hard surface, the table, it's sounds kind of muffled, not a better sound, so I turn it upside down and it sounds better which is why I knocked off a star, still a great speaker.
¬†Awesome speaker . Very comfortable and sounds good..
Amazing!!! Doesn‚Äôt look all plastic and cheap and is very loud and sound is great!!!! Great product for a great price!!

reviews.reviewTitle: This speaker is perfect for what I wanted it for
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is perfect for what I wanted it for, which is to take with me. The controls on the top is a nice touch. Having the speaker portion on the bottom amplifies the sound. Has excellent battery life. Received on time. Great buy

I've bought dozens of different portable speakers. THIS ONE IS THE BEST I'VE HAD

its little,powerful, beautiful .I would recommend it

reviews.reviewTitle: I like it! It‚Äôs a great bargain.
reviews.reviewText:
Shockingly good! I did not have high expectations for this, at all. And let‚Äôs face it: this is never going to be a great speaker, and it will never satisfy an audiophile, especially for music.

But for less than $20 it is phenomenal.

Very convenient to carry around the house or toss in my suitcase. Gets pretty loud without too much distortion. Easily pairs with all my devices. Great range, even when I‚Äôm upstairs and it‚Äôs down.

I use it mainly for podcasts, when my BT earbuds are charging, but it‚Äôs also fine for music when I‚Äôm just looking for background noise. Also a great upgrade from the weak laptop speaker when a video has poor sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's only awesome for 2-3weeks and then..They sent me another!! :o :)
reviews.reviewText:

Update:

i'm hoping it works for a while longer than 2 weeks to a month
Other than that , GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE :) !!

reviews.reviewTitle: I have been through several and been sorely disappointed in them
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I just knew this was the blue tooth speaker I have been looking for! it is small so it is beyond portable. The quality of the sound and the volume this thing has is what is magical about it! I have been through several and been sorely disappointed in them! This speaker delivers!

Took a chance on these speakers and bought three- two as gifts and one for myself. I charged it up with provided charger that night at bedtime. It was fully charged when I woke up. I have used mine with my Samsung Galaxy phone and with my Kindle tablet. Both devices paired easily with bluetooth. The speaker literally tells you when it is paired to the device. It also tells you it's on or it's turning off. It worked beautifully with both devices. I've listened to music as well as podcasts and audiobooks. All have sounded great. Easy to set up and has great sound. The instructions aren't great, but I figured it out. I bought the matching cases as well and my speaker fits perfectly and is protected. Get the case if you are looking to travel with your speaker. Gift recipients have been happy with them too. All speakers bought were in perfect shape and work great. Would buy again. UPDATE: Still working great. Also paired with laptop. Would buy again.
I don‚Äôt normally leave reviews on Amazon, but I got this speaker today and it‚Äôs very loud for it‚Äôs size. Very good quality. I love the rose gold color too. It‚Äôs definitely way worth the price
Battery is long lasting, the quality and loudness is perfect. not to mention its totally smexy.
Exceeded my expectations. I‚Äôve had these speakers that you could hardly hear, but this one is loud and clear. Fantastic!

. It was easy to pair Bluetooth on my iPad. I used it to take an online test, very clear sound. The buttons are easy for person who has limited hand function. I only have 3 fingers on my left hand. Great little speaker.

I bought this speaker for travel. Very quick delivery, thank you.

I use it with my Apple and Kindle devices. Nice. It has Bluetooth and auxiliary options, as well as a TF (microSD) slot. So cool. The sound output is decent for my use. I'm not trying to blast my eardrums, so it will work nicely when I'm on the go. This is a good winner for me.

I love this speaker, I really wasn‚Äôt expecting much for such a good price and when I opened the box and saw how small it was, I started expecting even less. But it‚Äôs actuallt really loud, I can hear it through my entire apartment. It seems really heavy duty too made out of some kind of metal not plastic. Definitely recommend buying this!

Bought this speaker to have for my Kitchen. It is very lightweight and love the color choices. This speaker is very easy to connect to via Bluetooth. I love the touch control. I would recommend this item and will be purchasing another one soon. This speaker has great sound control and get really loud for a little speaker. Makes a great gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker talks every time you turn it on, off, etc.
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a great quality speaker however - it's been embarrassing and a hassle to use at my office because it has a lady's voice in a chinese accent that loudly announces every time you turn it on, off, if it get's disconnected, when it's paired. I just need a speaker that will work and turn on and off without announcing it to the whole office. This should be added into the website description.

I wish the audio was better on this device. There isn't much bass to the unit. Another annoying thing is the prompts when turning it on, off, you get a call or low battery life.

It could be improved also by remembering what audio it was set to the last time you connected. Every time I reconnect, it's at a high audio level and I have to lower it manually.

Would I buy again? Probably not...

I have used this speaker only a few times (once with bluetooth and twice with a cable to my computer) and so far so good! With the cable sometimes I get like an interference noise (when the cable is moved). But I am very happy with it! Sound is great, and it looks very stylish! I would definitely recommend this product. If something changes, I will update my review.
Very Nice! Love that the buttons are on top. The sound is awesome. Very sleek design.

I bought this speaker for my 13-year-old son to use while he's playing his ps4 (he prefers music to listening to the fools online cursing) and he says it sounds great and loves it! I listened to it as well, and it sounds better than what you'd expect from a small disc size speaker. It has some heft to it, so I have to assume the speaker isn't some cheap paper pushing diaphragm. Time and my son using it will tell how well it holds up.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is well designed and works very well
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is cute and small nut has a very big sound. The controls are on top and easy to get to. It works very well. Great product. Thank you!

Small, classy, easy to use and perfect sound for my bathroom/ kitchen.

Much better than expected at a reasonable price!

This small speaker is perfect, sound is good main purpose of this is to use with my laptop as the speaker on my laptop was not loud enough. Highly recommend this product and highly recommend this company, great customer service

Super cute and awesome speakers! Bought them because my car's radio is awful and has no cassette/cd/aux players and I tend to hit traffic on my commute to and from school. Got mine in gold and it looks really sleek, it's also small enough to store in the little slidey cup holder in my car. Surprisingly loud for its size and doesn't sound tinny. Love how quickly it connects to my phone too!

I have very mixed feelings on this speaker. For the record, the speaker itself is on the bottom which struck me as odd but seems to work quite well. The touch sensitive buttons are fine? I don't really use them, since I mostly use the speaker to play music at night, or otherwise situated far away where it's easier to just control everything via tablet.

For the record it says something about being small enough to carry in your pocket--and yes, maybe, more or less. It's a bit bigger than a hockey puck, or thereabouts, but beware that it's quite heavy and would absolutely pull your pants down. Fine to put in a purse though. My main problems see two things.

First the durability: literally the first day we had it, it fell while plugged in (not a substantial height) and now the plug doesn't hold a cord very well; a slight jog of the cord and I have to plug it back in.

Second though, is a design flaw, in my opinion. The speaker talks to you some, with about four preloaded words. "Disconnected" and "paired" are the two I hear most because the speaker randomly disconnects. It talks slightly too loud though, suddenly, and very poorly, just absolutely awful sound quality so that I can barely understand her--which is odd since the speaker genuinely has really good sound quality.

I also don't understand who you have to hold down the button to power it on. The button isn't touch sensitive, it's very small and very unlikely to be hit by accident, I just don't get this design choice.

Overall--I do not recommend this product to anyone.

The Speaker is amazing in looks. I bought Rose gold one, which has stylish look, easy functionality and of course pleasant sound.
I love this speaker which can easily connect and gives you really good sound.
Must buy product üòä

I have nothing bad to say about the XLeader Bluetooth Speaker. It delivered on time and as anticipated. I love how this device is setup with where the speaker is located. It honestly produces louder, crisper sound since it has to bounce off of the surface it sits on. That being said, I've had to turn it down a little compared to other Bluetooth devices I've had in the past. I love that! That's definitely saying something for me because I mostly use mind in our house while I'm cleaning, paying bills and generally active around the house so I want to be able to hear it wherever I am and I can with this particular device. I love the sleek compact/portable style and rose gold color! I'm also use to charging my bluetooth speakers more frequently but definitely not with this one, it has lasted me all day. Come to think of it, I haven't even had to charge it since my husband & I bought it. Again, it's few & far between that I normally say these kinda things, (at least in this field) because I am a major music buff so I'm unusually picky. And it didn't even cost that much considering all of the above! But I can honestly say, I am completely satisfied and content. Thank you for selling such a great product!!! üòÅ
Quit working after less than a month
Wow This little package is very loud now I can hear any thing I have that is Bluetooth with this little Speaker if your looking for something simple and won't brake your bank this is it
The product is great. Much so I ordered three more as gifts.
It works really well, nice and loud. Easy to figure out and connect with. Arrived on time and is sleek. Great product for the price!
I don't have much to say about this speaker. It is GREAT! A really great buy.
Just received today , So far I really like it, Amazing Sound Quality,

reviews.reviewTitle: Great battery life and loud volume
reviews.reviewText: Love it. It has a nice look and the sound is clear and plays really loud. I‚Äôve been using it for 10 hrs and still haven‚Äôt charged it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great as an office desktop speaker
reviews.reviewText: Sounds much better than expected. Bought a second one as a gift and my friend loved it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked great for 2 months, then stopped working
reviews.reviewText: I liked this a lot at first. It worked great for two months. Then it stopped working. It is fully charged, and I know it is connected to my phone, it turns on, but no sound comes out. I tried to contact the company via their customer service section on their website, and their contact page is not working, so I can't even contact them to get it fixed or replaced. I guess you get what you pay for. In the future, I would get some a little more expensive and hope for a better quality product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I've had a few bluetooth speakers before, but ended up purchasing this one simply for the fact the volume can be adjusted on the unit, and it's small. With other speakers, I found that the difference in one volume click on my iPod was either off, or too loud for my office. With this speaker, I can enjoy listening to background music at work again, and actually have it be background music. It was easy to pair, easy to use, and pretty to look at (I got the rose gold one). The only thing that seems a bit odd, is it's a female voice that talks to you when you pair it as opposed to just making some little beep or sound. It will say "pairing" in a voice with an accent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets much louder than expected! Amazing purchase
reviews.reviewText: Works great! Gets a lot louder than I had anticipated and arrived early! Couldn‚Äôt be happier with this purchase!
I love it! Perfect size! I love the rose gold color and best of all its loud, great sound for a small speaker. It arrived on time, packaged well. Very satisfied!

I like this speaker. My only issue is that the speaker is located on the bottom so the quality can vary based on the surface you sit it on. To get around that issue I usually just turn it over, and use what ever device I have connected to control the volume and other functions. It have great range so I don‚Äôt have to be close to it for it to work, and hold a charge for a long time. I would definitely buy again.
Worth the price! Looks very nice and sounds are too notch.
Great little speaker. Good sound. Long lastinbattery. I love it!!!!

For years my portable devices have had bluetooth, going clear back to my Palm TX.
I had absolutely no idea what bluetooth was good for...In the early 2000s devices were divided between those that connected to the internet using wifi, and those that used a bluetooth capable cellphone to basically used a bluetooth connection to a cellphone to use a "dialup" connection to the internet ...which has been made useless by cellular internet connections..5 years ago i pur chased my first "Bluetooth" speaker that combined with a charging dock....I tried it once with a tablet and it has been sitting in it's box ever since.

This device is absolutely wonderful...The slot for micro SD card is definitely a selling point...An hour after I received this device I transferred my entire collection of MP3 music to two 32 gb micro sd cards and started listening...

Perhaps the best feature is the fact that the controls for volume and changing songs is on top of the device and not the bottom which seems to be standard for other similar devices.

Great design, good sound...kudos and 5 stars.

THIS SPEAKER BLEW MY MIND! Affordable, plays wonderfully for it size, now that i own one i would have payed so much more for it! its beautiful, compact, looks great on my desk and doesn't take up to much space, i can hear from the other rooms in my house even and the touch screen on the top looks beautiful as well! i loved it so much i ended up buying another after i got this for a friend who does her makeup so she would have it for her vanity and shes obsessed to! GREAT PRODUCT!

reviews.reviewTitle: I really wanted to love this :/
reviews.reviewText:
Disclaimer....I did not receive this speaker at discount or for free for an honest review, I paid for it myself.

Let‚Äôs start with the things I really liked, the rose gold color is great the color is shiny and isn‚Äôt matte, gives it some prestige. The LED buttons light up as blue so they are easy to see in the dark, they are a touch screen type instead of a typical push button. The buttons are located on the top of the speaker instead of the side.
The actual speaker is in the bottom and has some ‚Äúbumpers‚Äù lifting the speaker slightly from any surface which is really appreciated. I do like the size of this speaker, I was looking for a small speaker to fit in my back pack or my laptop bag with out adding a lot of bulk or weight and it definitely does that job well!
It powers with a regular micro cord, I‚Äôve used the cord it came with to charge and have tested it with a regular android cord and it will still charge, that‚Äôs a huge plus that you can charge it with a regular android cord!
I‚Äôve only tested this with one android cord that I use to charge my tablet so I can‚Äôt for sure say that any android cord will work but I figured if one works then all other android cords should work as well but don‚Äôt quote me on that.
It also comes with a nice little draw string bag, however, it‚Äôs just a synthetic bag to protect from scratches, this bag will not protect it from accidental drops or water things like that, for more protection I would buy a hard case.
Here is what I DO NOT like about this speaker, I bought this speaker with the intention to use it in my car ( since stereo took a dive) I figured this would be a lot more cost effective than buying a new deck and speaker......I needed something that I was loud enough to actually hear while driving. This little rosy guy does pretty well, but stellar but if all of your windows are up and the a/c or heater is on low you can hear it just fine.
It pairs easily but likes to un-pair whenever it wants :/
The battery life is pretty impressive, I ran it a sold 6 hours but I think it advertised 12 hours. I did fully charge it overnight when I first got it home.
The play/pause button does not play/pause, if pushed it will un-pair? So if you need to pause you will need to pause whatever device your connected to.
Since the speaker is on the bottom of the unit, that changes the sound, it sounds muffled and not as loud, so turning it face side down your sound is much better but also runs the risk of accidentally triggering one of the touch buttons and scratching the led touch buttons which in my opinion has been the biggest annoyance considering I use it most while driving.
As far as sound quality, is it loud enough? For the car not really, for use at home possibly depends what you consider loud. For the last few days I‚Äôve been using it with my tablet to watch movies and it does do the job but nothing like my previous speakers, as long as you have it face down then the sound it‚Äôs pretty clear and loudish even turned all the way up. My biggest gripe about the sound is, there is no bass! Its got lots of treble which depends on what your listening to can be high pitched. Don‚Äôt get me wrong the sound isn‚Äôt terrible at all, it does come through pretty crisp and clean and the volume does get loud if your in a small space but only if you have the speaker face down.

I would say this little speaker is great if your looking for something for the office and needed a little bit extra volume and the sleek look and size is perfect. I wouldn‚Äôt personally recommend this for kids only because the touch buttons are incredibly sensitive and with one push of the play/pause button it‚Äôs in-paired, ( my young nephew proved that point and he thought he broke it lol).
It came in a very nice sturdy box and was boxed in like an IPhone, has like a deep ‚Äúnest‚Äù protecting it from all angles and was pretty snug so even if it was tipped over it was still safe which is another thing I was grateful.

Overall this is a very very basic nice looking Bluetooth speaker, if your looking for something small and compact and good looking and ‚Äúok‚Äù sound quality, meaning your not looking to really bump your music or watch movies just something to amplify background noise then this is for you!
This would be perfect for a teenager, it‚Äôs cost effective, looks expensive but you don‚Äôt want to hear your teens music blasting lol.
Do I really hate this product? No, not for the price but some design issues could use more thought and tweaking and the sound needs BASS!
I have enjoyed this little speaker but it‚Äôs just not what I was looking for. I live for amazon reviews and and it has such a high amount of reviews I thought ‚Äúhey, why not‚Äù. Considering my needs I will be looking for another Bluetooth speaker.

Item arrived on time and in perfect shape. I love the rose gold color of it. I really like how small the speaker is, literally fits in the palm of my hand. I charged it once for like 2-3hrs and I have yet to charge it again. Battery life is really great! I love how it came with an aux cord, usually speakers don‚Äôt do that at all! One thing I will say is that the speaker gets really loud, proceed with caution!!! I found this out by placing it on my tv stand in the living room (3bedroomx3bath wood floor apt) and at the max volume on my phone and max volume on the speaker, we HAD to turn it down. Overall very satisfied, really love it.

Great sound and volume coverage! Battery stays charged a very long time! It's small so I can put it on the dash in my car or truck and play my music thru it since I don't have a blue tooth stereo nor auxiliary plug.

reviews.reviewTitle: Just got will update after use/ pictures.not happy
reviews.reviewText:
We just got this& wanted to post pictures and then update after we charged it and used it.
Its heavy.we got this based on over 2,000 review, compact to hide it in our childs room at night, and can use a sd card so i don't have to use my phone.hinse, bluetooth all night long.running out my phone battery.
Also its suppose to last up to 12 hours.
Update:it says tf card? Also no where does it say it has a built in microphone.we noticed that when we got the speaker.
NOT happy about it.
We dont want anyone listening in or interference if a call comes in while in our childs room.
Thats false advertisement.
Thats the main reason why we bought it.
Because we thought.no microphone(creepy) ,sd card& 12 hours.
Well havent used it once we read that.
Dont know what we're going to do.
This is my favorite mini portable Bluetooth speaker. It gets really loud and doesn‚Äôt have any static like some other brands might. I have recommended this speaker to my family :)
Very Good Quality Product! SUPER LOUD just what I needed.

I am really enjoying the speaker the sound quality is great, very portable and can easily fit in my purse side pocket. Delivery was great and it was just as the picture showed. Will be purchasing another for work and birthday gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: It‚Äôs a very good product to have and the sound it puts out ...
reviews.reviewText: It‚Äôs a very good product to have and the sound it puts out is incredible. It pairs really well with my iPhone but I have to use the auxiliary for my laptop. The sound capabilities are almost limitless and doesn‚Äôt sacrifice clarity. #NashFam

I love the design, look and feel of the device. Relatively lightweight; really modern color. I like that it speaks out to you certain options/selections. It's really a nice add for a speaker for self or a group of friends/family for movie night and otherwise.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works perfect for my desk at work
reviews.reviewText: This is great for a desktop speaker. The speaker went out on my desktop computer and this is a great replacement. I wasnt looking for something loud because i work in a quiet office. This does its job. Easy to use. Have had it for a week, i use it a few hours a day and havent had to recharge it yet. Dont expect high quality when the volume is high, thats not really what this is for. If you want something with power in the sound department get a larger device with sony or jbl, otherwise this is a great little compact device.

Slick product. Nice design. Adequate volume. Good charge life. Haven't dropped it yet, so not sure about the durability. Plastic case seems sturdy. It might take a hit or two. We'll see. So far, it's a nice little unit. Recommended.

The speaker on the bottom makes no sense, the sound is completely muffled. When i turn it upside down so the speaker is up, the quality is much better. However, there is still a half a second delay between the audio and video. Returning
Great design speaker, I ordered this item for my iPhone and laptop. Like the design and the color looks to match with my MacBook. So far so good, satisfied.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound quality and ease of use.
reviews.reviewText:
This is an easy one to give a 5 star rating to. It is as described. Since it is not possible to access sound reproduction over the Net w/o an additional speaker, this was purchased blind - w/ the exception of reviews and tech specs.
The quality of this speaks exceeds the expected. It is excellent. One might assume a larger, more expensive speaker if one did not see it before. Buy it, and enjoy it.
Great sound quality and very loud!! Bought it for the beach and pool.
Great speaker, we use it next to our hot tub with my phone, connects easily with Bluetooth and is very solid. This is a great speaker for the price.

My speaker was delivered on time. Everything was packaged sturdy with everything in the box. I was actually very surprised at the sound quality that comes from such a little speaker. The touch pad definitely impressed me as well. It‚Äôs small enough I am able to comfortably fit inside my purse and take with me. The design and led smart touch is so smooth and built good. Battery life is amazing too. I have had this speaker for well over a week and used it several times and only charged the day I got it. I will definitely be buying a second or third speaker.
I love this product. Great for the price. Very nice looking as well. Best choice I‚Äôve made when buying a portable speaker!

reviews.reviewTitle: THIS DOES NOT PAIR TO AMAZON ECHO DOT!
reviews.reviewText: So, as a BT speaker, it appears to be decent. Although the sound quality rates as a 4, for some bizarre reason they decided to put the speaker on the bottom, which means you have to turn it upside down for good sound quality (thus blocking the controls). Minus one star. I dropped it on the wood floor and it appears ok. So keeps a star for that. The battery life so far appears to be ok but I'm seeing a lot of reviews that said their units stopped charging after a couple weeks, so the jury's out on that. The biggest drawback is that my husband ONLY bought this b/c it said it connected to the Amazon Echo, which maybe it does, but it DOES NOT CONNECT TO THE ECHO DOT. And one reviewer said it did--but maybe he/she doesn't know the difference between an Echo and Echo Dot? Or we got a defective unit. And lastly, a week after we bought it, they dropped the price $5. So annoying...
I can't believe this little thing puts out this kind of sound. Now all of my neighbors get to listen to SLAYER too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little speaker for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little speaker. My last Bluetooth speaker (a different brand) only lasted about a year before the battery went to shit and it required being plugged in all the time to use so I‚Äôve given this one a chance. It‚Äôs smaller than I expected, which isn‚Äôt a bad thing. I wish the volume went a bit higher. When it‚Äôs turned up all the way the vibrations cause it to move across the table, but it‚Äôs still not that loud. When I have the speaker in the right position, with the logo facing front, and the ‚Äòvolume up‚Äô button at the top, which shows the ‚Äòplay‚Äô button in the correct direction, the ‚Äòskip‚Äô buttons are backwards. The forward ‚Äòskip‚Äô button skips to the last song and the backward ‚Äòskip‚Äô button skips to the next song, so that‚Äôs kind of shitty and weird. Other than that it‚Äôs a nice speaker for the low price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small and sleek with big sound. High-tech features.
reviews.reviewText:
I listen to a lot of Youtube videos or music when I shower, shave, get dressed, clean, cook, walk around the house, etc. I can put this speaker in my pocket and carry it around with me while I do these things or I can set it nearby and turn up the volume.

It's LOUD and CLEAR. I haven't even turned it up all the way yet. It has great bass for such a small unit.

Here is what I like about it most:

-Quality feel and build (this is immediately known when you hold it in your hand the first time. You know what shoddy products feel like. This one has a solid build and is made with quality materials.)
-Very good-looking.
-The touch sensitive controls with blue LED backlight are nice and modern-looking.
-It has two speakers hidden underneath that provide clean treble and deep bass for its size.
-You can put a micro SD card in it to play music or you can use your phone, iPod, laptop, etc.
-You can use Bluetooth (which connects fast and remembers your device) or you can use an aux cable.
-The female voice is pleasing.

Ok and now the best part: THEY ACTUALLY OFFER A LIFELONG WARRANTY!!!!! What company does that these days???

Five stars and highly recommended!

PS - I will update the review with a video after the battery discharges (right now it's still going on a single charge despite a bunch of high volume videos/music). Good stuff.

This speaker is loud and clear. I mainly chose this speaker (gold colorway), because it is stylish and fairly inexpensive. For the price, you can‚Äôt beat it. The buttons are very responsive, and it connects to my IPhone and Android within seconds. It comes in a box with aux cord, usb charger, and instructions. Buy it! You will not be disappointed.

We ordered this speaker for the Bluetooth capability and as an extra speaker in our dance studio.. Everyone that has used this speaker has been impressed with it's sound. As good as the big sound system even in the 1000sq ft room.
Great little speaker, nice sound and comes with an auxiliary cord so I can use it with my laptop at work. Works great with my iPhone X too!

I bought this Bluetooth speaker because it has the same dimensions as the Echo Dot. Amazon sells many mounts and accessories for the dot, so I purchased this $15 speaker to take advantage of those accesssories.

I have owned three other Bluetooth speakers, none of which had bottom-facing speakers. Sonically speaking, this is a terrible design concept, as the sound is ALWAYS obstructed, muffled, or has the undesired tin-can effect.

The easy fix: Flip the speaker upside down with the speakers facing up. Once upside down, the sound significantly improves. It‚Äôs not perfect clarity, but certainly worthy of a $15 price tag.

Ultimately, I wanted a speaker that would fit in an ECHO DOT wall mount, and this does the trick. I will have to slide it into the mount ‚Äúupside down‚Äù with the speakers facing out. I will also have to slide it out of the mount when I need to adjust the controls. Not the end of the world, but certainly not ideal; hence the three stars.

Great price/performance ratio. I've heard better sounding Bluetooth portables but, not in this price range. I still enjoy listening to tunz on it. Also, it has a quality look and feel. Very attractive, solid feeling unit. All the controls on the top work well and have easily understood audio prompts to confirm operation. Pleasantly surprised to find I can control it from the screen when watching Prime vids. There is one problem but I think it is more with my Samsung galaxy E Tab. The soundtrack of most, not all, videos is slightly out of synch, especially on YouTube. Not so on 3 or 4 I tried on my laptop. Always something to fret over and tinker with in digital devices... Welcome to the world's first fully automated transcontinental commercial airline flight. Sit back, relax and rest assured nothing can go wrong...go wrong...go wrong...go wrong...go wrong...
Fabulous little speaker for the price! Easily paired with my Echo Dot. Very good sound quality.
I just opened the box and connected to blue to and it is AWESOME, great sound quality, tiny enough to sit on my shower doors and it is amazing.....I AM IN LOVE!!!!

absolutely love my new Bluetooth speaker. I live in a an apartment and prefer the minimalistic approach. I purchased it in the gold metallic, along with the case (very hard to crush) which is not quite the same color,but more of a rose gold...fine with me. This speaker is small (fits in the palm of my hand) and packs big sound... more than enough for apartment living. I can hear it clearly in any area of my home even if it is in another room. It came with a charging and aux cord... yes it holds a charge and is ready for use straight out of the box. The speaker will audibly let you know when it is turned on, paired, disconnected, turning off, or in need of charging. You do have the ability to listen and charge at the same time which I have only done once. It is portable and serves dual purposes for both my home and work. I have even been asked where the sound is coming from. When I show and tell the looks of amazement are astonishing...be careful someone could easily swipe it without your knowledge. Well that's if it is turned off lol. I would recommend this product.

Im tech slow, hence this is my first ever portable speaker! I decided to dip my toes in by grabbing this inexpensive speaker. I really like it. Quite frankly the sound quality and volume on my samsung note is better (to me) but im a tech_no! Remember? When I transfer sound from my phone to the device there is a noticeable drop in volume. That said, this works great for my cozy livng room where I dance with the grandkids. Overall sound quality is good for this $20.00 buy. Plus at the size of a hockey puck it can be hidden in plain sight from prying hands and stores and totes neatly in Its carrying sack. I generally keep it plugged in so the batterey has never been depleted yet hence I dont really know how long it lasts on a single charge. I find that it goes to sleep and turns itself off, hence I must manually power it on each time I'd like to connect to it.

I listen to music all the time on my phone, so I decided to get this speaker. I like my music loud and my phone alone wasn't loud enough. This speaker is a great little device. It's really affordable and the sound quality is amazing for such a tiny contraption. I'm definitely gonna buy a second one.

I bought this speaker to use in my office at work. It's small, inconspicuous and the battery lasts all day. Overall, I'm satisfied with the purchase. That being said, there are a few things to note. 1) Given that the speaker is on the bottom of the device, the sound comes out a bit "tinny" - not very much base at all. However, for what I bought it for, the quality is acceptable. 2) A sound is played when turning the device on that is a bit annoying. Everyone around me knows when the speaker comes on. I wish it were a bit softer or eliminated altogether. 3) The SD card feature is nice, but it would be better if there were a shuffle option. It just plays the songs in order from the top down. Also, the lowest volume setting when using the SD card is still a bit loud for use in the office. These are just a few things to note. For the price, it's a nice little speaker and has worked well for the indented purpose.

reviews.reviewTitle: The seller contacted me and ruined the Christmas surprise
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality and everything is wonderful and it‚Äôs so little (little tip, if you turn up the volume on your phone it gets louder on the speaker). I‚Äôm only giving this product and overall 3 stars because the seller contacted me, apparently, twice trying to find out how I liked the product and ruined the Christmas surprise. My husband had bought this for me as a Christmas present and the seller contacted me since my email is the one attached to our Amazon account and totally ruined the surprise. My husband was really hurt by this because he looked for a long time for an affordable Bluetooth speaker for me because he knows how much I love listening to music with our son so I wasn‚Äôt happy about that. I ended up opening the gift early since I already knew what it was and yep, it works! Good sound and super cute. The seller is a moron though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker on the bottom is GREAT!!
reviews.reviewText: Don't believe the reviews that say the design with the speaker on the bottom is wrong. It's perfect. The sound is amplified and takes on a deeper quality in that configuration. As a bonus, but controls are totally accessible - right on top with just a fingertip of pressure to begin, pause, or change volume. It has been an extraordinary asset as a lightweight device to provide sound. I teach tai chi and need easy access to on/off and volume control quickly and accessibly. This unit has been ideal. Battery life is terrific (and an icon shows its charge level on your phone so no surprises). It's very small (in my purse) and connects immediately to Bluetooth. It will even run with the phone on Airplane Mode (important to not have phone interruptions when teaching).
These little speakers have great sound and are easy to pair. The base was unexpectedly strong. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than I expected it to be.
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is great. It had arrived a day earlier than expected and in great condition. I've had it for about a week now and I have had no problems with it. It is really loud for such a small speaker and is easy to use. I don't regret ordering this and I would recommend it to others.

Great sound in such a small package, I absolutely love it!!!! I can listen to my music in the kitchen without disrupting others in the house. My speaker puck matches the color of my iphone - too cool!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this little speaker. Bluetooth connection is super easy. I like the appearance and the touch controls are easy to use. One of the little things that impressed me is when I'm using it with my laptop, I sit in on the edge and the rubber feet stick like glue to the laptop. You can't accidently knock it off. The best portable speaker I've had and highly recommend it!

¬†It‚Äôs a decent little speaker. I really like the color and the sound is pretty good. It‚Äôs a bit odd the speakers are on the bottom so if it‚Äôs sitting on a cushiony surface the sound is a bit muffled but on a hard surface it sounds really nice. It was easy to pair and it charges fast as well. (Didn‚Äôt like the seller contacting me to write a review. They had messaged me twice. And once again after I‚Äôd already written a good review.)
very pleased with this purchase, sound sounds better than expected, definitely would recommend

This speaker is LOUD!! I use it in my car because sometimes it's difficult for me to use my cell phone to play my music in my car speakers. But this little thing is phenomenal. I also love how the packaging included a little note from the seller letting me know that if I have any issues to reach out to them. That gave me confidence in the product itself, so much so that I will purchase another one for my house!! The product came sooner than expected!!üòÅ Great job!!üòé

I purchased this to play music at louder volumes, as one would expect. At the maximum volume setting, it performs alright for the most part. At some points the sound quality becomes unclear, almost muffled/blurry sounding for some reason. By lowering the volume, the song becomes clear again. The problem seems to only occur when the speaker is at its loudest setting.

Another thing is the beeping. The speaker will beep to let you know when the volume is completely maxed, or muted, while you're adjusting the volume; and also as a warning before the voice will notify you of its low battery status. However, sometimes it randomly beeps while playing music for no apparent reason. I'm not adjusting the volume high or low, and the battery life will be just fine, but it just beeps while playing music. I'm not sure what that's about.

I was also surprised that the rewind/forward buttons are reversed. Pressing rewind, and the speaker will move onto the next song on shuffle/whichever song is next on the playlist. And by hitting forward, it either replays the current song or goes to the previous song. That didn't take too long to get used to, but it is backwards on this speaker.

There seems to be a good battery life on it, it's as expected and lasts a decent duration of time. Of course, keep in mind how loud you're playing it, as that will impact the battery life.

So my only real problem is with the clarity of the music when the speaker is maxed out in volume, along with the random beeping. The music will be playing just fine, only to randomly become static-like and I don't know why it does that. I suppose that for the price, it's not too bad?

reviews.reviewTitle: Bluetooth speaker to use with Echo dot
reviews.reviewText: OK, this is an attractive, small speaker that sounds pretty darn good compared to the Echo Dot. I will say though, FOR ME, it was difficult to set up. I'm not a techy person, and it took several attempts over several days to get this paired with my device, and it was very frustrating for me. I am not sure I could do it again, but at least I have a better idea. Instructions really weren't good, so wrote the company and they gave me a few basic things and then told me to look up a description of set up in Google. So I did, more than once. Finally got it though I think, and am pleased with the sound and the looks of it. I would buy it again.

I love this little speaker! My son (best 15 year old ever) bought this for me as a birthday present. He has watched me grumble about my sub-par (possible broken?) laptop speakers for the past year. I can barely hear anything from them even with the volume all the way up. Anyway, This little Bluetooth Speaker is amazing! It is small enough to sit right on my laptop (about the size of a drink coaster), and I finally have volume! I imagine that if you are looking for a "fabulous, quality sound", that you may be disappointed, but I'm not! I just wanted to hear the audio component from my computer, and it works perfectly for that. Oh, and it is easy to pair and use, too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty good speaker for it being small
reviews.reviewText:
1. The speaker was delivered in time?
YES
2. Was the package lack of accessories?
NO
3. Does the speaker works well or not ?
IT WORKS WELL.. BUT SOUND QUALITY IS LACKING. IT BEING A SMALL SPEAKER, IT WOULD MAKE SENSE THOUGH.
4. For most of small speakers,its keys are located on the bottom of the speaker ,every time you need to pick up the speaker to operate,this speaker using smart touch screen technology and the keys are located on the top of the speaker, easy to operate. what do you think after using it ? do you like this touch design ?
I REALLY ENJOY THE EASE IF USE
5. Using slim size and Built-in 1000Mah Li-battery, what do you think of its portability and playtime?
SO FAR ITS WORKED FOR A FEW DAYS IN A ROW... ITS USED AS A SHOWER MUSIC SPEAKER (USED WHILE SHOWERING)

Wonderful Christmas/Birthday gifts for friends. I used this little speaker as an MP3 Player. It is beautiful and very easy to use, especially volume up and volume down. I created a music playlist and transferred it onto an 8G micro SD card (about $4), then inserted the card in the slot on the speaker. My friends/family all love this gift! I also bought the hermit shell hard case to carry it.
Highly recommend. Note: these have a lifetime guarantee for refund or replacement.
(Note2: I have used smaller speakers in the past to do the same thing but they were very difficult to control the volume.)

This is a very nice little speaker which is exactly what I was Looking for. Sound quality is good. It came with cord for usb charging. Battery power lasts a long while. Very nice product and I would recommend.

Revised: I have changed my rating due to the excellent treatment from Seller's customer service. I had a glitch and they worked with me until issue was resolved. I not t only recommend the speaker which I liked from the beginning but, I would purchase product from this seller again.

reviews.reviewTitle: BAD DIRECTIONS!!!! I can't set this up
reviews.reviewText: I am so frustrated with the way these directions are written. I am not sure why everyone thinks setting this up is easy, maybe there is something wrong with mine? I am in the Bluetooth on my phone and this speaker is not showing in my devices. So I am STUCK and irritated that I just can't open the box and start using this!! I am sending it BACK. It's too hard and I don't have the patience to struggle. It's pretty! But if I can't get it to work it's useless. NOT happy to have wasted my time!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little hockey puck sized speaker.
reviews.reviewText:
My speaker on my phone is broken, and I needed something small, lightweight, and portable to carry with me when I wanted to watch a video or listen to music. I was pretty skeptical about this little $15 speaker being that great, but thought I'd give it a try before going a more expensive route.

This little speaker packs BIG POWER. I can't believe the volume level. I have a much bigger 808 audio bluetooth speaker that cost much more and has half the sound. Don't get me wrong, you're not gonna be bumping bass with this little dude, but it gets the job done well, and if it does break, I won't mind buying another for $15. I love that it shuts itself off after 10 minutes without anything playing. I often fall asleep with my speakers on and they're dead by morning. Not with this speaker.

I also bought a little carrying case made for this specific speaker that carries the speaker, the aux cord, the power cord, and a usb wall charger, and it STILL doesn't take up much space. I just use the caribiner to clip it to my purse and it goes everywhere I go. Great purchase, and will happily buy again.

I love music but as I've gotten older, I work from home and am not in my vehicle as much so I slowly drifted away from it over the last few years. Started missing it and once I found what I enjoy, I wanted it back for when Im getting ready but could not hear it on my phone speaker with the shower running. This little gem came home and is absolutely fabulous for my needs and moods whether I want it loud enough to drown out a tv in another room or peaceful background during work-it fits my needs perfectly and the charge lasts a week or more if used only 2-3 hours at a time. And the rose gold color just makes me happy looking at it too, so bonus benefit. Great product.
I love the quality sound from such a small Speaker. I love to travel and I use it to take it inside my hotel rooms. Is just great for traveling.
Sounds is fantastic. The charge lasts a long time. You get a great product for a low price .

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice little speaker, portable, and good sound - if it‚Äôs upside down
reviews.reviewText:
This is a powerful little speaker with a long lasting battery. However, with the unit having speakers on the bottom side, the sound has to bounce off of the surface it‚Äôs sitting on, which doesn‚Äôt effect the volume, but it gives it a sound as if it‚Äôs sitting in a can. Kind of tinny, or just a little off. If sound quality is a thing for you, you will likely notice. I ended up using the clamshell case that is made for it, and I just leave the speaker pointing up in the case, which makes the controls inaccessible. For the price and sound quality when I use it that way, I can use the controls on my phone. The battery seems to last a long time. I streamed pandora almost the entire day and my battery indicator showed barely a blip in the hit to the battery. The pair process is super easy.

Speaking of pairing, I ordered a second one to use in my classroom, and a feature I wish this had was the ability to change the name of the device in my iPhone Bluetooth settings. So I have 2 of the same name devices, which can be a bit confusing if the autopair doesn‚Äôt happen.

I bought this bluetooth speaker when the sound on my phone decided to stop working. I didn't expect much out of it because of the price, but once I charged it and put it on I was surprised with how loud it really goes! I can put it on and clean my entire house and still hear the music playing. It's small, comes with a case, a charging cord and an AUX cord that can connect to your phone. Even when you have the volume up on your phone and the speaker the sound does not get muffled, it's very clear! This is a great item for only 15.00!

I ordered this item because it was a cute color. It wasn't your run of the mill ho-hum color, no sirree. I was pleasantly surprised by the color. Nobody on the block has a speaker this color. I mean, it's wonderful. And it's unexpected. Who would believe it belongs to a man? Nobody. Even my wife commented: "Why would you buy that color? It's a girl's color." I responded: "Oh ye of little taste..." When I pull this speaker out of my pocket, it's all flowers and sunshine. Does it work? Yes, it works well. But I had to buy a new iPhone to make it work. The price was excellent; the seller was top notch and I only had to buy a new phone to make it work. But that was inevitable. My iPhone 6+ was "obsolete" according to the salesman, when I asked why I couldn't connect to my beautiful new speaker. Whenever I'd dial a number, dinosaurs would answer. But when I bought that new iPhone, well, angelic sounds came from my beautiful new speaker hidden in my pocket. If you want to experience the sheer joy, the elation, the absolute ecstasy of sound from a tiny speaker, then you have to buy this speaker. And impress your friends with its color. Pulling this speaker from your pocket is better than pulling a rabbit from a hat.

I bought 3 of these speakers. One to leave in each car/pickup truck. I dumped my Sirius subscription ($50/month was getting a bit much for music). I elected to purchase Pandora, I have it on my phone and I Bluetooth the music to these little babies! Walla! music all the way to work, on vacation, etc. I can take my phone and this little speaker to the poolside with me, the hot tub, or even to a friend's house. I love the portability. The sound is...well....not as rich as I would like, but then, for the price, I certainly cannot complain. If I want that wonderful full quality, I need to pay for it. These little devices work very well, you MUST allow them to bounce the sound off the hard object it is sitting on, or....hmmmmm‚Ä¶.even set it in a pot! Didn't even think of that till now. I must try that. At any rate, the tap controls on the device are a convenience to raise/lower the volume, etc. Just a light tap, not heavy. It is illuminated and easy to find in the dark even. I enjoy mine very much. Hope you enjoy yours.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little speaker and great sound
reviews.reviewText:
I liked the color on this, the price was right, and it didn't seem to have too many annoying lights! Some of the mini speakers have way too much light show for me, I just want to know if it's on or charging. It's a hefty little speaker and has little rubber bumpers underneath that keep it put where you set it. The speaker is located on the bottom, but the bumpers raise it up so the speaker grill is up off the table a bit, and I actually think it enhances the sound as it bounces off the table. Some reviewers say they set it speaker side up, but I don't think the sound is as full that way.

It charged well and it's nice that it included the charging cable and also an audio cable, for when you don't want to use bluetooth. Be aware that the charging cable has a usb end, not a plug for a wall socket, but any wall plug off a phone charger will work, or you can plug it into your laptop to charge.

The only thing that kept it from getting a full five stars from me is the light that shows when it is playing. It has a small blue light that flashes on and off when the bluetooth is connected and audio is playing. If you're using it at night in a dark room, it would be very distracting. However, it is not as bright as some speaker lights I've seen, and I realize this may be an issue just for me. Because of where the light is located near the bottom, the light comes out through the charging port as well as that part of the speaker, so it's not possible to simply block it off with tape. But like I said, this might be just a thing with me, and also it's not blindingly bright. If I could give fractional stars, I would give it more like 4.8. :)

The voice telling you when it's powered on or bluetooth paired is kind of amusing. I didn't think it was too loud at all. The instructions are a little cryptic, but it's a bluetooth speaker, not too difficult to get working, lol.

I just got this yesterday so I can't really speak to its durability. If it fails, I will update, but if there's no update, you can assume it's still working well. I liked this speaker and think it was a great purchase.

Update: I still love this speaker, in fact I enjoy it so much I bought a second one to use to listen to my phone in the car (I have an old car without all those fancy-schmancy ways to hook a phone into the radio speakers). Both still working great! I bought the matching case also, which is nice for the one I keep in the car.

reviews.reviewTitle: A good product at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: When we received this speaker we could not figure out how to work the wireless aspect so we used a cord to go from our Kindle to the speaker. We then had a problem with the wire connection, Meantime we received an email asking if we were satisfied with the speaker. We responded that we could not connect wirelessly. X Leader responded immediately. A U tube video was recommended. It showed starting with the Kindle wireless setting which worked instantly. We are very pleased with the speaker. We did not rate reliability because we have not been using it long enough to know how long it will work perfectly. It is hard to be technically adept in our old age.

This connected immediately, once I did a search, and my device found it. Functionally, it is fine, and for echo dot-like tasks, it os okay. The huge letdown is the terrible audio quality. You could never expect a device this small to cover decently from 20Hz to 20kHz, and this device does not. In fact, as with some ear buds I recently tested, the lows, and the lower end of the mid frequencies are missing. I went back and forth between this device and another $15 device a d discovered that this devive eliminates bass instruments. I set it on the shelf for now. Later, I expect I will find a use for it, like phone calls, etc. For now, I will do a quich survey of friends, to see what they are using.
Oh, the brochure states some pretty great specifications, but I would love to sit in a lab next to the person that came up with them, and have them demonstrate how they came up with them. They claim a frequency response from 40 Hz to 18 kHz. Well, maybe, if the response is +/-20db...
I belive you can do much better.

Update: Ok...while I love the speaker itself, the seller is ridiculous. I have received SEVERAL emails regarding a review which I had ALREADY left right after receiving it. I replied to their first email...their second email...and their third...who knows how many will follow. And my replies were apparently not even read as every friggin one mentions a review they are 'waiting' for. *head shake*
Loving this! I use it mainly with my kindle for audiobooks. It is nice when more than one of us wish to listen together. Taking it camping this weekend so we can all enjoy a bedtime story we can hear perfectly from anywhere in the tent. :)

The product puts out decent sound for something that small, but it isn‚Äôt high quality. It‚Äôs just ok.
The packaging was nice and it came with a nice card asking to please contact them with any concerns etc as they are a small company. Ok, they don‚Äôt want bad reviews. I respect that. Then I opened the instructions.
If they don‚Äôt want bad reviews, they really need a new translator. Photo shows what I was trying to read before I gave up and decided to ‚Äúwing‚Äù it. When I got the speaker to talk to me, ‚Äúshe‚Äù has a heavy accent. Now, if she were speaking full sentences you‚Äôd probably get the gist. But with individual words and phrases I had to listen to it several times before I knew what it was saying. I feel I owe it to other shoppers to share.

I liked this speaker for the most part. The one thing that kinda bothered me was the speaker being on the bottom but it didn't interfere with the sound quality. I loved the rose gold color and I liked that I could talk through the speaker which came in really handy since I clean for a living and I'm always wearing rubber gloves so I didn't have to take them off to pick up my phone. I liked that it was wireless so I could move it around with me as I moved from room to room. Sadly after barely 2 weeks it just stopped working therefore it's being returned and I will spend my money on a different speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fake. Bait & switch. Dollar store knock off.
reviews.reviewText: Received a dollar store knock off . Looks nothing like the picture. Extremely disappointed. Returning it immediately. This has never happened before and I am extremely disappointed. I expect this from an Ebay or Wish purchase, not from Amazon.

I was very pleased when I opened the package and examined the device. It is well manufactured, sturdy and has great features (although I guess my view of what should be the face is different from the manufacturer, causing some confusion as to which was the skip and back buttons!) It felt quite solid in my hand and I was looking forward to using the speaker... until I actually started playing music on it. I was quite disappointed to hear the same, tinny sound that comes from small speakers. I might as well have saved my money and played the music on my phone. There was very little bass and I'm sorry I purchased it. Next time I buy something like this, I'm going to get it in my hands and try it out first!

reviews.reviewTitle: The battery life is great and the found quality is crisp and perfect and its small and concealable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it as a gift for my wife and she loves it. She loves that the sound is loud and the bass is crisp. She is a huge fan of rose gold so she loves the color. Haven‚Äôt had any issues with the battery not lasting. So that is a plus. No issues with connecting to her iPhone. The product is all around great. I also bought the rose gold case and it fits perfect! It was delivered on time and in great condition, my wife also likes the touch screen technology.

I mainly bought this to use with my iPad, which for some reason just doesn't get loud enough. But I love this thing so much that I carry it around the house to use with nearly everything. It pairs very quickly and the sound is very good, though I'm much more frequently watching internet TV or listening to podcasts than music. I find it sounds best on a solid surface like furniture. The speaker is on the bottom, which some complained about, but it is elevated, and the ability to bounce the sound off a solid surface improves the sound, in my opinion. Putting it on the couch or bed, it doesn't do as well. Battery lasts a long time. Only thing I find annoying is the little voice that sounds like "Pavva on" and "Pavva off" (power on/off) and "Peered" (paired). It's kind of like the Captain Obvious of speakers. I wish it would tell me how much battery life is left, which is not obvious! But that's a minor complaint, great speaker for the money.
Sounds like a speaker 5 times the price easy to carry I love the hockey puck design and I've dropped it several times barely scratched and works like the day I got it :-)

reviews.reviewTitle: I‚Äôm sorely disappointed with this purchase.
reviews.reviewText: At first, I was extremely excited with this purchase as the purpose was to take it with me on vacation. However, upon using it for the first time for music, I found 1) the speaker is located at the bottom of the device; therefore, the sound is very muffled. If you try to turn it upside down, then you risk pressing the buttons at the top. 2) I can hear my callers clearly; however, to them, I always sound as if I‚Äôm underwater. I‚Äôm very familiar with the saying ‚ÄúYou get what you pay for.‚Äù However, I feel someone really dropped the ball with the design of this product. Very disappointed. I‚Äôve received better speakers in my complimentary swag bags attending conferences and trade shows.

reviews.reviewTitle: No Longer Works in Less Than 2 Months
reviews.reviewText: This is a really cute, loud speaker. I ordered this in January. However, the speakers blue lights are always on and I cannot turn off the unit or pair it w/ my phone anymore. It is now useless. The blue light is blinking at me as I type this. What a waste. I wouldn't buy it again. I can't even Google how to reset it as my search returned no results. What a bummer. I'm not saying you shouldn't purchase this speaker, but I am warning you that mine no longer works and I cannot find a remedy.

I ordered this to keep at work. I haven't tested the battery life just yet so I only gave it 4 stars but overall, I love the sleek look of this speaker. Opened the package, connected to Bluetooth with no issues and immediately started listening to my music. I also like that there is a volume control on the speaker. My last speaker did not have volume control and it was hard to find the happy medium using my phone volume. Sounds great!

I will update my review in a few weeks. I haven‚Äôt even had the speaker for a full week. I‚Äôve had it 5-days and 5-days of usage is not long enough to gage the cumulative quality as these change over time. Battery life can be significantly less on day 20 vs day 2, effecting sound over distances, etc.. Hence the current rating. I‚Äôd like to point out that others have pointed out there were issues with the battery and I have yet to listen to it charging be it a portable charger or plugged in, however it‚Äôs back to class tomorrow so no charging. I‚Äôll try to keep a log of how long it lasts between charges.

The sound quality is very clear and really make the Dot sound great. Because of the bluetooth capabilities, it's like having 2 Dots. The rechargeable feature is kinda nice because I can put it on the outwide deck without q plug.

Basically, for 15 bucks it's a helluva bargain!

reviews.reviewTitle: Okay sound quality, odd voice accent.
reviews.reviewText:
This speaker functions well, but it sounds better upside-down than it does right side up, and even then, I've used better sounding mini speakers for a similar price. Don't expect to be able to use this upside down, though, because the top is touch sensitive to any flat surface, it seems. Also, you can't prop this up against anything because it's very smooth and slides off.

I can't place the accent of the voice responses to mode changes and powering on/off, but it can be hard to understand, and I feel like they could have paid any native American-English speaker on the street a few bucks to make a better voice for the speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Little Speaker That Dreams Are Made Of
reviews.reviewText:
This fine little speaker fulfills all the basic tenets of tiny bluetooth speakers that probably brought you to this page:
+ Sound Quality. Of course, this is the first question. It has a wide range, never rattles, squawks or buzzes. In fact, the audio quality remains surprisingly clean even while charging it, which is more than I can say for most other similar devices I've used in the past.
+ Portability. It's about 2" in diameter by 1" tall, and even comes with a nice quality carrying pouch - which was a great touch.
+ Bluetooth connectivity. Easy to connect & respectable range, though I haven't conducted proper empirical tests on the range, it's never fallen short of my needs - i.e. roaming from room to room with my phone while leaving the speaker in a central location on the same floor.
+ Volume. Loud enough for a hard of hearing person to understand dialectic whispery dialogue from period cinema while sitting across the room in front of a fan, so that's loud enough for basically any conceivable, healthy indoor use and most outdoor occasions concentrated around, say, a picnic area.

The only thing I don't care for, and it's very minor (and not unique to this product/brand/model), is the robotic voice that announces itself when you fire up the power. It's not a very pleasant or intelligible voice, and is usually a little louder than I'd like it to be. This is no reason not to buy so much as it is a note to the developers, should they ever parse these reviews.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound, but not the best quality
reviews.reviewText:
I was so excited to get this that I was watching like a creep waiting for the UPS man to come. I opened it immediately and paired it after plugging it in to charge. It‚Äôs surprising how much sound this little dude has! I will say it works better upside down. I listen to music that had lots of different levels of sounds and didn‚Äôt really feel I could experience them all without them being muffled upsight right. Upside down though, it works very well. I turned it up super loud to see how it would do and it was great and pretty darn clear! I will mention that in another room at high volume, I didn‚Äôt know it needed to be upside down. This was only when I was right next to it that I felt it sounded muffled. I have a fine tuned ear and can only detect a little feedback and it might just be the songs I‚Äôm listening to. Overall, happy, but kind of wishing I‚Äôd gone with a product that had the speaker on top so I wouldn‚Äôt scratch the top with it always being upside down.
