UPDATE REVIEW: while the sound is ok, I will be sending this product back. Every time I turn it on, it talks in this thick accented voice that tells me I need to pair, things have been paired, disconnected etc. it doesn‚Äôt have hardly a 20 foot range from my phone (I was walking around my ridiculously small apartment and it disconnected) and then, when the phone was right beside it, it randomly disconnected for no reason. Every time I pick it up, the buttons get pushed (by the corner of my phone this time) and songs get skipped or stopped. Anywho, you get what you pay for and I‚Äôll be returning to use my money on a higher quality item.
I purchased this speaker to use at a school. The volume that it produces is amazing! It is a small speaker that fits in the palm of your hand. Cute color also.

Sorry, this video is unsupported on this browser.
¬†Great little speaker for 15 bucks!! Sound is pretty good quality.

I LOVE this little speaker. For the cost, it was perfect. I use this for my classroom transitions. I play short clips of music or other sounds as cues for students to know when to begin a classroom routine/procedure. I also like that it plays the sounds on my classroom management system. The class will hear the sounds when positive or negative points is awarded on our digital behavior system. Because they don‚Äôt see their points until they are home with families, students hear the sounds and check their behavior to see if the sounds were for them. It‚Äôs a nice way to redirect or affirm behavior without having to say anything or point out specific students. When we are working in small groups, I play study music. This speaker can be LOUD! I can‚Äôt believe the volume it can achieve when it‚Äôs so small. The color (rose gold) is pretty and luxe looking. I haven‚Äôt had issues pairing my iPhone with it. The charge keeps well. I think it lasts about a day and a half with al day use (8+ hours). I recommend this speaker.

The two speakers we bought from you, are easy to play, and the music or stories are clear no skipping or other noise. They are easy to take with in the car, play in the garage or anywhere. Another thing we like is we just charge the speaker and then we don't need to mess with a lot of cords.

I'm so glad I found this speaker. I had just purchased one at a local retailer and the battery life lasted literally 3 hours so I was in search of something that I could keep on my desk so I can listen while I work and the battery didn't need to be charged every hour. Well this is the product! I have been telling everyone about it and I have another one on my list because I will be purchasing another one. I love the ability to change the volume on the speaker itself and it doesn't change the volume setting on my phone. A MUST GET! I got this on a Friday, used it about an hour on Saturday & Sunday, then all day Monday, all day Tuesday, started it at 7 AM this morning and just NOW had to charge it (it's 12:30 PM) so needless to say the battery life on this is pretty damn great.

**Update** Removed a star because if you have two devices linked (my iphone and my ipad) it will link to the last device used and if you try to link the other device you can't. You have to remove forget the device on the one that you don't want and then reconnect the device you do want. My other speakers I'm able to just connect to the one that I want by disconnecting it instead of forgetting the device. It's annoying because then you have to repair the device. I use my iphone during working hours and then my ipad for at home workouts.

This item is excellent, for what it is. I was finding myself leaning into the computer to listen to audio, so this was a perfect upgrade from the built-in laptop speakers. It looks cute, matches my computer, and sounds great. And under $20? Great deal. I also purchased the matching carrying case, as I think I'll bring it with me when traveling. So far the charge has been holding up pretty well, so I don't always have to look at the wires. I didn't give it 5 stars because the sound isn't like a Bose speaker- the speaker is on the bottom of the disc, and it doesn't necessarily have a rich sound. For the money, you won't be disappointed. If you want better sound, you may have to spend more.

Built solid,music quality is good,battery life is as described. We don't give a five star rating to a very select few and don't rate this product five star because it's waterproof level is to low with many other units that are completely waterproof for the same money. Check out the boueyboy if you want this for your shower,spa,kayak,or in the pool. Use this unit for the living room,kitchen,or dry outside yard.

You get what you pay for and it especially applies to this small speaker. While pretty to look at, the sound is quite tinny unless you tilt it on its side. It hooked up easily with my iPhone but it renders your iPhone sounds null. I can see in a couple of instances where it would come in handy I'm just not sure right now what they are. I think I will put it in my bathroom and play the music while I bathe or whatever....
It is not compatible at least that I can see right now with Alexa/echo.

I had wanted to put the new speaker in another part of the room so that I could have sound and stereo but that's not going to happen .

reviews.reviewTitle: Good, small speaker with good sound
reviews.reviewText:
I liked the small size and the pretty copper look to the finish. I was excited about it being wireless and compatible with my Mac. However, I was going to return the speaker because the Bluetooth function did not work. I tried everything. I finally plugged it into my MacBook Pro speaker outlet with the round cable that came with it and then it worked fine, but must be plugged in, so for me, not wireless.

Sound quality was good. I dod not like the touch feature. Prefer switches that let me easily see the status (if they are on/off, high/low, etc.). Also could not understand the voice feature... too soft and with a non-English accent, so hard for me to understand what was being said. Decided to keep the speaker as a backup.

This little speaker is more that I expected. This thing gets loud and it actually has better sound quality than I expected. Battery last a long while. I think I charge it maybe once every week and a half and I use it for probably 4-5hrs a day when cooking. It also looks way more expensive then it actually was. My husband was freaking out that I bought it because he thought I spent close to $100 on it, totally blew his mind when I told him that it was less than $20. Shipping was super fast with prime as usual.
Very pleased with this bluetooth speaker. Good sound quality and I love the small size. Makes it easy to carry and travel with. Thinking about buying more as gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: First Bluetooth speaker I‚Äôve ever had.
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is very nice . I don‚Äôt know anything about these. I really needed more instruction on how to get it running but was unable to find information so I just started pushing buttons. The little instruction booklet was not informative at all. Other then that, I‚Äôm using it and I think it is working fine. Thanks. I can‚Äôt attest to battery life over a long period of ownership since I‚Äôve only just gotten it, but it has easily run for 10 hours everyday without needing to be charged. I‚Äôm sure it has a 12 hour life as stated. Good loud sound.
I‚Äôve only had it for a few weeks. But I love it! Works very well and affordable!

reviews.reviewTitle: Its loud not medium sound like some
reviews.reviewText: This little speaker is better than another one I bought a few months ago. Its loud or make it softer , easy to pair. Battery is about a week before I had to recharge it. Great buy an price an light weight.

reviews.reviewTitle: really good for sound, size and price
reviews.reviewText:
Truth be told i was skeptical.. am not very tech savvy.
I have a Bose but i needed something portable that i could just put in my pocket and pull out when showing a video from ipad to an older person at the doorstep or in a noisy situation. I am VERY pleased with the sound... and volume..and it fits in my pocket without being too heavy. And the price is better than just right! If i lose it, drop it..whatever no big deal. I am really happy i decided to go for this speaker! And it is pretty also!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound out of such a small device
reviews.reviewText:
Absolutely LOVE this little speaker....the sound is excellent, just as advertised. Easy to pair and easy to use. Battery life seems really good.
I do have 2 suggestions to make it even better:
(1) the button in the middle serves three purposes depending on the touch (long, short or double)....I have ACCIDENTALLY double touched it twice, redialing my last phone call....not good in the middle of the night. Would love to be able to turn this feature off.
(2) Wish there was a way to know how much battery charge is left.

I bought this as a gift for my aunt. I only had the chance to listen to it the first night but the sound was good (for a small speaker). My aunt tells me every time I talk to her how much she loves it so it was well worth the buy.

I've only been using it for about an hour but so far it ROCKS! I wasn't looking to spend $100 on a Bose so this one in the $15 range is perfect for listening to podcasts. It took literally 2 seconds to set up and I'm thrilled it can be charged and I don't have to change batteries all the time. The brushed rose gold finish is also really nice and it has a really cushiony bottom so it won't scratch furniture. I figure if it only lasts a year, it's probably cheaper to buy a new one (one more item in the landfill notwithstanding) that to replace batteries over the same period. I bought this one because it has 3000+ reviews and an average in the high 4s and all those reviewers are exactly right.

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact, good sound and beautiful design
reviews.reviewText: Hard to beat for the price - compact, pretty good sound and beautiful design. Makes a great portable speaker for travel or use at a meeting where you want to amp up the sound from your laptop or tablet.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's Pretty, Good Value, Sounds Great
reviews.reviewText: So far very good. The speaker was delivered on time, packaged nicely. I bought rose gold, its really pretty. Sound quality is good, I'm pleased. Battery life seems to be ok as well. I have only had it for about a week. It charged up quickly and it's easy to use. I paired it with my phone, Galaxy S9, and now as soon as I power the speaker on, it pairs with my phone automatically. I mostly use it to listen to music when I'm in the shower. For me, having the speaker on the bottom of the unit hasn't posed any problem with quality of sound.The phone is about 15 ft away and I'm behind closed doors - no problem at all transmitting the music. I would buy it again. Oh yeah, the carry pouch is nice too. I haven't taken it out of the house yet, but the pouch is perfect.

I love this little speaker. It sounds terrific, much better than you would think it would. The sound actually comes out of the bottom of the speaker, so it sounds terrific when placed on a hard surface. But, if you're on a sofa, or in your bed, you can simply turn it upside down and it still sounds terrific. Buttons are functional and easy to use, and pairing is a breeze. Battery life is more than adequate, as well, and I was pleased to note that when I pair it to my Android phone, it tells me how much battery life is left on the speaker. The rose gold color is elegant and pretty.
The best!!! I absolutely LOVE IT!! The sound nos amazing for such a small buddy üòç

reviews.reviewTitle: Microphone seems to be poor quality pickup comared to iPad mini's mic
reviews.reviewText:
Bought this product for my 85 year old mother so she could here me better when we do FaceTime on her iPad mini. I was disappointed that the mic in the speaker sounded considerable poorer quality then the iPad built in mic. Seems to have a muddier loss of highs then the iPad's mic. The XLeader speaker part works will for her, I just can't hear her well now.
I am now trying to see if there is a way to use only as a speaker and not use the mic part. I will see if maybe using an attached 3.8mm cord instead of the bluetooth will work. (use mic in iPad for pickup and XLeader speaker for sound output only) Don't know if this is possible to do yet. Don't know much else about this product as I had it drop shipped to her. Just as a guess as I am giving it 3 stars on sound quality and 4 stars out of 5 overall.

My 19 year old granddaughter is smart and hardworking, trying to make it in these times. I told her to start a Wish List on Amazon, and when I had extra money, I would try when I can to help out. She had this on here and the price was decent. She messaged me a few days after she received it, saying how LOUD it was, and so clear. She loved it. I don't know how these things work, but if it met her needs, I'm thrilled.

reviews.reviewTitle: This pretty thing sounds off itself every day
reviews.reviewText: The most important feature, reliability, is not on list so I had to give 2 stars for all..it is pretty, it sounds clear and it‚Äôs easy to bring everywhere, BUT, pretty much every day since I got it, I encounter at least one time, it sounds off by itself..the video was still playing but no sound all of a sudden, I had to restart it every single time. I will keep it coz it is not an expensive one, but I will try the others next time.

reviews.reviewTitle: I tried on my Samsung Galaxy S8 and love the quality of the speaker for as little as ...
reviews.reviewText: It's kind of touchy with the blue tooth feature, goes on and off sometimes. You have to mess with the settings also, I tried on my Samsung Galaxy S8 and love the quality of the speaker for as little as it is but when you don't have the settings set for media only, it can really mess up with incoming calls.

The sound quality is surprisingly good for a device this small. But when you set it down on a flat surface on it's feet, the audio gets a little tinny due to the speaker being on the bottom. If you set it on the table upside down (or on it's side) the sound quality is great!
I don't even use the Bluetooth functionality so I can't comment on that. I just wanted a device to play mp3s from a micro-SD card, and it does that very well.
The build quality seems very good. It has a bit of weight to it which gives it a substantial feel. It seems like a quality device, surprisingly so for an item in this price range.
I'm very happy and wouldn't hesitate to get another or recommend it.

Just got it today, but so far I‚Äôm loving the sound quality. Better than expected for the price. Luckily it's easy to use because the directions have so many typos that they make little sense. One thing I can't figure out which the directions don't address is that when I pair my iPhone with this speaker via Bluetooth then hit the "pause" button on this speaker, it forces my phone to call via FaceTime the last person to FaceTime me as an outgoing call. It happened twice in a row and no one was touching my phone, all I did was press pause on the music on this paired speaker and it made my phone dial, my ex-husband, of all people. lol USER BEWARE. lol Hoping to find a solution because I'm otherwise happy with the device.

Very impressive product especially when considering the cost. The sound quality is excellent and it goes really loud. I had no trouble connecting it to my phone. It has a weight in it so that you can either have it flat with the speaker down facing the table or standing on edge. haven‚Äôt used it for very long so I can‚Äôt yet give any information as to the durability of it and I haven‚Äôt used a micro card with it yet but everything else so far seems to be great. I would recommend it! My husband is already looking into buying a bunch for his coworkers.

This is a great little speaker for the price. I originally bought it because it can use an SD card (micro) instead of just bluetooth, but the range on this little guy is so good, I can connect to the iPad even if the speaker and iPad are on opposite ends of the house. It is quite little (about the size of an Echo Dot) but the sound quality is great for the size. It does get a little grainy if it's too far away from the bluetooth source, but otherwise works great. It's so simple to use, my 8-year old figured it out in a matter of minutes. I definitely recommend.

Love this little mini speaker. Don't be fooled by its compact size. I bought this to play background music from my Amazon music playlist at an out of town gender reveal party for my daughter in law. Perfect. Love it!

I bought this to use in my classroom. It is exactly the right size for me. It is not used to play music to the class, but for me while working in my room. It is small but packs a punch. I have not had any issues thus far. I wish the battery lasted a little longer, but it plugs in, so it does not need batteries. I love that feature. It also has the bluetooth feature which is a must for all speakers now.
¬†Sound is awesome
I bought these as gifts for co workers, and to be honest, minus the thundering base, these are awesome. Bought one for myself, last 12-15 hours on a full charge, loud as hell. Worth every penny

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound, battery port killed it for me
reviews.reviewText:
I really enjoyed using the speaker! I had to turn the speaker upside down so the sound could be clear. But the sound was nice and loud for such a small speaker!

Unfortunately, I‚Äôve had it for less than 2 months, and I can no longer charge it because the charging port inside the speaker has become loose and can no longer align with the charger.

reviews.reviewTitle: I Love This Little Bluetooth Speaker So Much
reviews.reviewText: I love listening to music all day while paint or do various crafts. Most of the time I can't hear the music from across the room coming from my laptop so with this Bluetooth speaker I can have it as close to me as I need. The battery life is great (up to 6hours so far) because I don't have time to get up from a picture to switch the song but this , allows for this too. It has volume control,and song switching abilities. It also has a good sound quality ( not very much bass but I don't mind) and it can be loud. I'm so happy with this and as soon as I can,i.I'm buying a second spare one !
Well built no cheap plastic. So far the sound quality is very good

I bought this speaker to boost the sound for my music on my laptop because of the changes to Amazon Music that makes it impossible for me to listen to ALL the music I have bought over the years. But, I will rant about that elsewhere.

The speaker is small but powerful. The sound quality is great. Easy to use and pair with my laptop and Android phone and tablet. Haven't been able to pair with my Echo Dot as of this writing. Will update if able to.

It looks great, could set it in with any decor. Very portable. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a sleek portable speaker.

Oh, and although the speaker is on the bottom, the sound is not muffled or lost.
For how small this speaker is it gets hellas loud. I love it! Pisses off my neighbors but it‚Äôs great quality and the battery last at least 3 weeks without charging. 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: By far the best speaker in sound and quality for around 15.00!
reviews.reviewText: Wow. Paid a little over 15.00 for this sleek, smooth looking little device. Sound is just astounding and I can‚Äôt believe how high quality this looks. Will also say that the ‚Äúreset‚Äù button for this speaker is in the AUX cord location. I am going to purchase another one! Received in about 20 hours and hit the purchase button around 230pm yesterday! I am so impressed with this and can‚Äôt say enough. The reviews were correct and came with the XLeader dust bag for protection, Aux cord, usb cord, instructions that are broken English; however not so difficult to understand, 2 cards. Packages extremely well in a larger box and bubble sacks. You won‚Äôt regret your purchase!

In general, it‚Äôs a great speaker ‚Äî especially for the price. It seems to hold a charge, although I‚Äôve only used it once without it being plugged into a wall outlet. When listening to music paired with my cell phone, I‚Äôm not sure why when I hit the pause button it automatically redials the last person I spoke to. Strange. But the sound is good, it‚Äôs compact, and the ‚Äúpower on‚Äù and ‚Äúpairing‚Äù prompts are not loud or obnoxious like some portable speakers. I will probably buy a 2nd one to take to work.

This little Bluetooth speaker is a great product. The sound is excellent for the price. The controls are intuitive and the size convenient. Overall it's about the size of a hockey puck. Some have complained that the speaker is on the bottom. I've found that a bottom speaker is no big deal, however, you can just flip the hockey puck speaker over and now the speaker is on the top. That does increase volume a little bit, but really isn't needed, as the sound is adequate for most applications. The package includes the hockey puck speaker, a USB recharger cable and an additional cable that appears to be an aux cable. Over all, this is an amazing deal for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: It may be small but sounds great
reviews.reviewText: I didn't think it would get as loud by it being a small speaker but I was wrong. It only costing $16 it was well worth the investment. The sound quality is great and the battery life is great. I would recommend this speaker to anyone if they don't want to spend a lot of money.

Love this speaker! It has great sound, battery life and range. We use it with our desk top and have used it with our phone. We have a 2000 sq ft home and we can put it in the center of the house and hear it clearly through out the house. The only thing we can‚Äôt do while it is paired with the computer is put it on the patio. I definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a blue tooth speaker.

Pretty good speaker, does the job. Is nice and loud. Probably not the best sound quality, but it‚Äôs great for listening to music while cleaning and stuff like that. Would buy again, and I love the color. Ordered the rose gold so it matches my decor at home. Battery life is exceptional!

My first Bluetooth speaker (I‚Äôm old and behind the times) so I don‚Äôt have the ability to compare at this point...however...I can say that I am highly impressed by this sound producing hockey puck. I have linked it up to my phone, so I can listen to satellite radio (Jim and Sam show on SiriusXM - if you want some irreverent talk show humor) and carried it around my house while performing Honey-do list items, not once has it dropped signal, or underperformed. Sound quality is great, a little reverb‚Äô if pushed high on volume, but that might alter if listening to tunes, instead of talk radio. So, ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è across the board, as it does everything I need it to, plus a little more.

Charle - July 10, 2019
I am an 82 year old woman who loves to listen to music and podcasts while I am gardening and doing house chores. I prefer a wireless speaker to earbuds. While my iPhone is charging, I carry the wireless speaker with me from place to place inside and outside of my home.
I own two wireless speakers and for the price, the XLEADER is superior. The other speaker is the OontZAangle3. Comparing the two, the XLEADER has greater range and the control buttons are easier to see. The XLEADER is smaller than the Angle3 and easier to move around. I can tell no difference between the two in the tone quality and the XLEADER is less costly. The XLEADER malfunctioned and was quickly replaced at no cost to me, with superior customer service and support . I would highly recommend the XLEADER wireless speaker.

It's a decent speaker at this price point. It is loud but the speaker is placed at the bottom where it projects off of whatever surface you place it, which makes the sound awkward and have a high pitched yet muffled sound. There is not really any bass but it does seem to play better off the phone through Bluetooth than being hooked to the TV. It can be a bit shrill which is my biggest complaint but for what I paid I am happier than other speakers I've bought. It's not bad but also it's not the best. I would not buy it again but I'm also not brooding over the money I spent. I think the price has raised since I purchased mine so I would recommend spending a few extra bucks and getting a better one, but for the amount I paid it's fine for now.

reviews.reviewTitle: LOUD A.F. for such a small speaker!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this speaker because I have an Alexa Dot and it is so quiet when I'm running around getting ready for work or an event. It is LITERALLY the same circumference as the Dot, so I was going to set the Dot on top of the speaker. It gets so loud that it actually rattled off the speaker. I now have the speaker on top of the Dot because it has rubber feet/nubs on the bottom, and prevents it from sliding off. You can also still see the Alexa Dot Light Ring when they are stacked too. I sincerely can't believe how loud this gets. It's as loud as my dual driver/dual passive woofer ($60) bluetooth speaker. Just buy it, trust me.

First, I was not able to pair this with my iPhone 7, which may have been user error, but the English instructions are so terribly translated I couldn't make any sense of it. (Is it that difficult to get an English speaking proofreader??). When connected to my Mac Book Pro, the sound quality was terrible. It was buzzy and the highest volume was less than that of my computer. My computer's speaker sounded much better then this. Very disappointed.

I love the power this little speaker packs. While sometimes the sound quality can get muffled depending on the surface it is on, it isn‚Äôt enough to notice unless looking for flaws. I use this for my 12U softball team‚Äôs pre-games and practices, and it‚Äôs perfect. The fact that I can just throw it in my backpack and go is such a huge plus. Battery life is impressive, on the first use I got two 2 hour practices and 1 pregame warm up (1 hr) in. Not too shabby! The Rose Gold color is a plus too ;)

So this time, I read the product info, specifically searched Amazon for a speaker to use with EchoDot/Alexa. Info said it would, but just like the other speakers I returned- It does not. Alexa will not "discover" it. I may keep this because it does have volume and I can use it with my phone. By the way, the instructions read like they were written by a 4 year old, or by an overseas telemarketer; if you read them aloud, it sounds like you're plotting big trouble for Moose and Squirrel
Product arrived on time. The speaker sounds good. The battery is going on 11 hours strong and it still doesn‚Äôt need a recharge. For the price you are getting a good speaker. Definitely recommend!

So I guess I should‚Äôve thought about this a bit more, but the speaker is underneath the item. So when you put it down, the speaker bounces off the table and causes it to sound awful. However, if you put it upside down (so that the controls are down), it sounds okay. I‚Äôm only using it to provide music/podcasting while I‚Äôm playing video games, so it works. Just poor design to have the speaker on the bottom.

I bought this because I wanted a Bluetooth speaker to use with my Echo Dot in my small apartment. Based on other reviews I read, I believed that the sound quality would be ‚Äúgood‚Äù. The sound quality is poor. As a professional musician, I‚Äôd have to say I have high standards and I should have remembered that ‚Äúyou get what you pay for‚Äù. I‚Äôve heard it because I was only able to make a Bluetooth connection with my iPhone 8; establishing a working connection with the Dot never happened . I knew the Dot and the speaker were communicating only because of the silence that resulted when I attempted to connect it with the Dot, which had been playing before my attempts. The instructions that came with the speaker were gibberish; here is a random exact quote from the instructions for the speaker: ‚ÄúOur Bluetooth stereo stereo scheme, so the requirements of the Bluetooth audio switch, but also to ensure that Bluetooth.‚Äù I might have given this speaker two stars for the poor sound quality alone if I had been able to connect with more than just my iPhone. I‚Äôve bought scores of products from Amazon over the years and I rarely write a review. I felt motivated this time.

Very satisfied with this little speaker, well worth the $10 price. Easy to set up, it paired easily with my iPhone, and the sound is very good. I have played it 6 hours straight on a single charge and it wasn't even showing the low battery warning. It is very portable, easily fits in a pocket. Seems sturdy and well made. I don't have great hearing so I play it at a moderate volume and the sound is very good, no distortion at my volume. I didn't receive any compensation for this review either! I have only used it a few days but it seems to be a good little product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cutest and most powerful speaker that I have owned
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty powerful speaker for its size! Even when I turn the volume all the way up it still sounds clear. I love the rose gold color and the LED touch buttons, it makes it look very classy. It is a little strange that the speaker is on the bottom but as long as it is not on fabric (like bed sheets) it sounds perfectly. I take it everywhere because it's small and it even comes with a little bag to put it in. I have used it often since I got it about two weeks ago and I've only had to charge it twice. Overall I love my new speaker and you definitely get even better quality than you expect for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound and an inexpensive price
reviews.reviewText: Love this speaker! Bought this for my desk at work. It doesn't take up a lot of space but has a good quality sound for the price. Pairs quickly and easily with my iPhone. Long battery life.
I figured it would be low quality because it was so cheap but the speaker sounds better than my stereo and is super loud. I will be buying another one

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound is okay, price is inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this small speaker for use in my treatment room. I'm not sure about battery life because I just leave it plugged in. It seems pretty durable. The sound quality is meh. It delivers way more volume than I need in a small space but the sound is slightly distorted and maybe muffled? I will keep using it until I can save up enough to buy one in the hundred to two hundred range. In the meantime and especially for the price, I am satisfied.
Great sound. Love the portability of it. Would recommend it to someone who is looking to get great sound for an office, or small room. And for the low price, it is definitely worth it.

I'm not sure what would possess a designer to put the speaker on the bottom of the device, but it's a really bad move. The sound quality of this speaker is actually pretty decent, but you wouldn't know it because the way it sits muffles the sound and gives it a terrible tinny quality. You can't prop it on its side since it's wheel-shaped, and turning it upside down both disconnects the device and hides all the control buttons. It also doesn't automatically connect when it's on and your device's bluetooth is on - you have to manually pair them each time you turn on the speaker.

VERY cute. It's small but works great to enhance the sound from my phone. I purchased two thinking l would be able to both simultaneously, but if I leave the bedroom and to the kitchen the second one will not work. Works perfect the sound will fill a room nicely..but not multiple rooms.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked well to amplify audiobooks and music from my iphone
reviews.reviewText: I'm 60+ and not technologically inclined but even I was able to get this operational in just a few minutes. HOWEVER, the instructions are not clear -- at least not to me. I suspect they were translated into English rather than written in English. However, I'm sure any 12 year old could show you how to use this in 10 seconds flat with no instructions needed. It's not that complicated.

I feel like I got ripped off. Are people being paid for their review? 'Cause y'all lied.

The sound quality is terrible. Not at all in stereo. The sound comes out of the bottom so it has to be on an absolutely flat surface. No bass, no treble. I have a 7 year old Jawbone that sounds incredible. Only reason I purchased this speaker is because it was compact and matched my glam room. The auto voice has an Asian accent.

The only good thing is ther design. Handsome piece of equipment. True rose gold.

This little speaker is not only stylish but compact and conveniently fits just about anywhere. I have a small office and I have this little guy on my desk. I get a lot of compliments on it and am very happy I made this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: I ordered in April, it's now October
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, but this thing has so many glitches. It will pause my music, video, streaming, or it'll turn it. Literally today it turned four of my YouTube videos onto another video I did not want to watch or just got done watching. This is ridiculous. It'll tell me it has 30% left on my phone and then an hour later it's saying low battery, please charge and it dies soon after(20mins). This product could have been made a lot better. I'll still use it till it becomes completely useless. SAVE YOUR MONEY.

Pretty speaker but craaaaaappy sound. Yeah it‚Äôs loud: but the louder it gets, the crappier sound quality. When it‚Äôs LOW sound it sounds bad too. Medium volume is where it‚Äôs decent. It‚Äôs 16-17 dollars and maybe that‚Äôs why. But I‚Äôve bought other portable speakers with waaay better sound quality and loudness. Looks went into it way more than quality. Not a fan. The sound comes out the BOTTOM and it sounds muffled: so you have to flip it over for it to sound better. Ridiculous. I gave it two stars because of the looks, but THATS IT.

reviews.reviewTitle: sounds like a good deal to me
reviews.reviewText: i use this at work, it's pretty decent for its price & size. the speaker is "under" the unit so it takes advantage of the surface to amplify and it actually works well. this isn't bose or any other high end speaker so don't expect that kind of performance and you won't be disappointed. the tone is good, the bass is good, it doesn't sound tinny at all and it's nice to look at tbh. once it's paired with your phone it'll connect as soon as you turn it on; it also turns itself off when you move out of range, so while i can't speak on the battery life bc i just keep it plugged in to my computer, the auto off feature can only help with longevity. i'd probably buy this again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Phone calls & conversations has a good sound
reviews.reviewText: I was very impressed with the size of speaker and the sound; I take it with me every where since my car radio does not work it‚Äôs easy to touch to change the songs I‚Äôm listening to & a phone call comes in from my iPhone so I have hands on the steering wheel. I ordered the rose gold & am very pleased.

This speaker puts out a ton of sound, and the quality is excellent! I usually have it on one of the lowest volume settings in my office, which is plenty loud enough for me. The touch controls are fantastic as well. It is very compact as well at a little over 3.5" in diameter. Great value at this price point too! I plan on getting another for my house!

My little precious arrived today and I could not be more happier. Especially, since it was charged and ready to go. The size is absolutely perfect for my desk at work. And the color is is as described; rose gold. So pretty. I was just a happy to see that it came with a charging cord and an audio plug, as well as a nice little carry bag. However, I had already spent the money and purchased the Hermitshell Hard Travel Case for it. Another great buy. Not only is the size and color perfect, but the sound quality is just as great for a speaker of its size. You can pair this with your phone, your computer/laptop, or even your Echo Dot and Kindle. Granted, I‚Äôve only paired it with my iPhone so far. And! It has a microphone. I could actually answer a call while it was on. I had to speak closer to the mic so the person on the other could hear me better, but still. Also, I don‚Äôt know how to use it, but there is a micro SD card reader you can play your music that way too. The speaker will support MP3, WMA, and WAV. I couldn‚Äôt give a rating on the battery life as I haven‚Äôt worn it down just yet. But I foresee draining it everyday. I‚Äôm very pleased with my purchase and will likely purchase a few more for family or friends. After all, Christmas is just around the corner and these would be great stocking stuffers or gift exchange gifts.
Like the size its small enough to take with you and not take up space.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound at the bottom muffles the music.
reviews.reviewText:
I really love the sound quality of these speakers and their portability. It is smaller than I imagined but for me, that was a good thing because I like being able to take them around in my backpack. It is really loud and really crisp sounding! If I didn't have neighbors I would be blasting music every day to the fullest volume. As for the battery life, I have not used this so much where I needed to charge it consistently. I have charged it twice since I have gotten it and I received them on October 4th. But the great thing about this is you can keep your music or movie playing while it is in charge!

The biggest con of this, however, is that the speaker is at the bottom and if it was raised a bit more I would not have trouble with the sound being muffled but it does. Not to say that it isn't loud right side up but you can hear it clearer when you put the device upside down. However, this defeats the purpose of having control buttons. The other issue I have been having with this product is that there is some sort of lag when pressing any of the control buttons. On a number of occasions, I have accidentally dialed a previous number when connected to my phone.

I would still recommend this product, although, I don't know if I have gotten a defective product considering some of the lag issues.

Pros: able to skip, pause and control audio without operating my phone. Good sound quality. Stays connected after I turn off my vehicle, so doesn't lag every time I jump in.

Cons: cables. I wish it were easier to hard wire to the dash so there were no dangling cables, but then it'd be tougher to move between vehicles.

Works best, for me, when it can be plugged in to audio/power in the console and you can just leave the remote hanging out a few inches so it's reachable in a natural sitting position.

I bought this for my husband who is a mail carrier. On days when he drives a lot this will come in handy, he loves to listen to music while he works (who doesn't). I have one similar that I use and he wanted one. I ordered this one (because this is the one my husband picked). It arrived quickly, the packaging was very nice. It synced like it should with no problems, the charge was quick, and the sound was very good. The sleek look is very nice, so far so good. He hasn't said anything about the battery life as if yet. Good product!

I bought this for work so I could stream music and radio stations from my phone. I was really impressed with the sound quality. I can‚Äôt comment on the battery life, as I kept it plugged into it my computer most of the time. But it works great! I just wish there was a way to stop it from talking when I receive a phone call; it‚Äôll stop whatever‚Äôs playing and just say ‚Äúcalling‚Äù every 2 seconds until the call goes to voicemail. But otherwise it‚Äôs easy to use and for $12, the sound quality is great. Super easy to setup, too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ghost Dials! Might Be Defective-Will Use My Warranty
reviews.reviewText: Well I love my speaker, but mine is constantly making random phone calls in my phone! I was reading the reviews and it didn't appear that others have the same problem I do, so it is possible that my speaker is defective. My daughter and I will be driving down the road just listening to the music with the bluetooth on, and then it will dial of one of my recent phone numbers I've called! And it does this every day! So I thought at first maybe I bumped a button on the speaker, or on my phone, but no it's not that at all. Otherwise I have loved this speaker. The sound is great for as little as it is, in fact I bought my mom one just a few days later. She has not used hers yet so I can't ask her if hers has the same problem mine does. However, I bought the warranty so hopefully they can look at it and resolve this problem.

reviews.reviewTitle: This little speaker has an amazing sound, especially for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product. It seems to be very well made. It works very well with my iPhone. And the sound quality is for better than I had expected it to be.
Happy with this little guy. The aux plugged into my computer and I was able to get rid of the 2 speaker cord fiasco. Loud enough for my classroom of 20 kiddos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Got my son to sleep in his own bed
reviews.reviewText:
I don't usually write reviews even if I really like a product but I had to for this one.

For the past two years, my three year old son would fight and cry for up to an hour when we put him to sleep. It wasn't until we got this speaker that we realized that he didn't just not like going to bed but had a major fear of the dark.

But after downloading sleep music (12 hour loop) and playing it on this...nothing! No cries, no pounding on walls, no screaming!

Any speaker would have done the job, but the reason I like this is because of the micro sd slot. Bluetooth is great but when you need music to be played all night, it kills the battery on my phone. Not only that but I cannot do anything else while the YouTube app is on.

Battery life is also fantastic. Plays throughout the night.

The actual speaker is on the bottom which is a strange design choice, which also mufflers the sound a bit. However, just flipping the device over should solve that. Or maybe that is what they intended. Either way it's not a big deal.

Also, this device has a pause, skip and back button. If you are connected via Bluetooth it will skip to the next song on your phone or on YouTube.

Sound:

Sound is amazing. Right now, it's not even at it's maximum and I can hear it from across the house. I'm not a huge audiophile but it sounds great.

For any parents out there who are struggling to get their toddlers/babies to bed, buy this!

Another thing I bought was a light projector, which helped, however, the speaker really was what brought the most comfort.

Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: What a GREAT little Bluetooth speaker!!!
reviews.reviewText:
I am a little technically "challenged"... really just clueless about Bluetooth and a lot of technology. But, I wanted a better sound experience with my Fire HD 8 tablet (which I love!) so I did my homework researching wireless speakers. I don't recall where I found out about your product, probably one of many reviews that I read. But, I liked the design... and really good price - about 60% cheaper than my next choice!

Upon arrival (on time!), I opened and followed the simple, well-written instructions in the nicely-packaged box... and, might also have referred to a YouTube video for assurance. But, set up was quick & easy. In minutes, Spotify was filling the space with glorious music. I couldn't be more pleased!

Next week, I will buy a second one (as I've noticed my taking it with me at the end of the workday / no need for that). It will find a happy home on my desk, next to my computer.
This speaker packs a lot of sound and the battery life is great. I use it in my kitchen and bathroom. Great product and value.

This is a nice little speaker for the price. I wanted something small and low profile that I could bring to the office and link to my SiriusXM on my phone, and this fits the bill nicely. The sound quality is a little scratchy and there isn't much low range, but you get what you pay for. It's the perfect size for travel and I like the little bag that came with it. Battery life is good so far - it's been running for nearly four hours and the battery level hasn't even dropped yet. We'll see how the battery does once I've had it for a while. All in all I'm very happy with it!

I carry an sd card with music switching between devices and heard of this great little speaker at work where others use one. I adore it and the rose pink is beautiful. I love the many features such as answering my phone with it when paired, yes if playing music and a call is answered your music will pause during playback to answer that call. It has no trouble playing my large music mp3 collection on my memory card when inserted and the volume and playback are loud and great quality. Mine came with the USB cord you just plug it into a oc or brick or car to charge.

Color: Rose Gold Packaged very well. It comes with a nice pouch to carry everything in. The USB charger cable worked with the wall charger I use for my phone, excellent! This was exactly what I needed. I am tired of listening to the radio (same songs over & over, plus radio ads). I used the bluetooth to pair with my phone, which I have music stored on an SD Card. I had it playing for about 9 hours before I was alerted of a low battery (by voice). Although the speaker is on the bottom, there are small raised padded feet on it, so it isn't really going to rest flat against a surface. I am lucky, the shelf I have is the wire kind, so it's all open BUT I do think the sound would be excellent on any surface. The touch screen is nice, a light touch is all ya need. Very pleased with this speaker. It has exceeded expectations.

I have been having my eye on this speaker for a while & now since I got it, I like the speaker. It came on time, in great condition & I hadchecked if it was used just in case & it was not. Seemed pretty new, I charged it & I tried it out. It is loud but not as loud as the Google speaker, since the sound comes from the bottom it does sound just a bit muffled but no too much to the point where it sounds like a cheap speaker. It's very sturdy,it's good quality & I love that its traveled size so you can take w/ you wherever you go. I love it & I'm very satisfied w/ it alot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Golden audio with rose gold speaker
reviews.reviewText: Great sound for such a tiny hockey-puck-sized speaker. It's so small, that I panicked when I opened it but whadda ya know, it has such awesome sound, my teenaged nephews were impressed....and that's saying something! I use it all the time for music and my Netflix binges. It's so small, it fits perfectly in a Ziploc for all my poolside parties. Easy to charge, too, although I wish it was a plugged in charger rather than just a USB option. Seems to last a good while with every charge. I love the rose gold color too.

I am a dog groomer and purchased this listen to music and podcasts while at work.
It's not the loudest speaker ever but pretty good for it's size. I love how small it is and how easy it is to throw in my bag if I am bringing it somewhere. For the price it is perfect! The one negative thing is sometimes after pressing pause or play a few minutes later it plays or pauses again. I'm not sure what causes it to catch but it can be annoying, somedays it does it more than others.

What an amazing deal I got‚Äô I couldn‚Äôt believe myself. The quality is perfect, the sound system is fair enough according to the size, the distance of the Bluetooth is so strong that I was able to control the music duck from 2floor down. And most importantly I would like to mention the small incident with my duck. Just a few days ago I was listening music outside at the backyard and unfortunately I forgot to bring it inside so‚Äô sadly it got wet for 2night and 3days in the rain. And when I finally realized I quickly brought it inside‚Äô and before I even try switching on I went trade for the vacuum to suck the water out; then I finally tried switching on...... wow oh‚Äô‚Äô boy got so surprise it was working perfectly fine.

I received this speaker on time and here are some things I found

1. The packaging could have been a little better but the speaker arrived intact.

2. The speaker is relatively easy to use and pair with simple instructions to follow and understand.

3. It can get very loud and the neighbors can vouche for that, but the speaker has very weak bass, not a big deal breaker but something that could be improved on for a little extra charge.

4. Price. This is honestly an amazing speaker for the price, after shipping and tax charges my total order was only $23 dollars, if you want something to toy around with this is for you.

5. It‚Äôs extremely portable, it‚Äôs about the size of a hockey puck and very light, it comes with its own mini carrying pouch too.

It also came with a very short but useable USB cable and a small AUX cord.
I‚Äôll update this review if it breaks prematurely or I encounter any issues, so far, it‚Äôs 5 stars for me.

I got this speaker to use with my Chromebook, which is very quiet on some videos/sites. This works great for this. It is very easy to set up and use, and the sound is great. It has features that I haven't used yet (like pairing it with and MP3 player), but hope to in the future. I'm not exactly sure how long the battery life is because I haven't had it long enough to know much about that. I like that it can be charged via micro usb cord. All in all, this fits my purpose well and I'm very happy with it.

Smaller than expected, its cute though
Sound is not great, sounds very muffled since the speaker is on the bottom of the unit and basically plays the sound into whatever surface you have it on. Due to sound being muffled the volume isn't as loud as I would like it to be. Placed speaker on a smaller round "lift" which seems to help with the sound a little but kind of defeats the purpose. It's alright for the price point to use in my smaller apartment but will not buy again
Love it! Super portable, amazing quality , long lasting battery, and great fromconference calling!!
Heads up - the volume on the speaker is about HALF as loud as my iPhone 7!! I guess you get what you pay for. It looks very pretty but what‚Äôs the point when you can‚Äôt hear a dang thing on it!

1} I found turning on is touch and go you have to play around with it.
2} Directions aren't good. You don't know if it comes charged or how long you should charge it. Or when you should charge.
3} The unit tells you when it is Paired BUT my iphone says"Connection Unsuccessful "make sure unit is turned on and in range" Well...my unit was turned and right next to iphone.
4} Gave it 2 Stars for sound quality which was good
5} Sent it back and going to buy a different brand.

I so love my new Bluetooth speaker. The sound quality is amazingly clear, & it's very loud which I absolutely love. The battery life is awesome as well. I went days before having to charge it & I constantly listen to podcasts & music on a regular. I'm so satisfied with my portable speaker & will definitely be purchasing another one, because my daughter keeps trying to take this one.

I was looking for something smaller than the large speaker I currently have so this one was perfect! It is the perfect portable size without lacking in sound quality. I needed a speaker with an audio output port so when I searched for a speaker with that specification I and was extremely happy to find this one did on fact have one and it was compatible with my cable. It has a very sleek design and easy to use functions. The little travel pouch it comes with is a bit flimsy, it broke the first time I tried to draw the bag closed so I would look for a sturdier case for it but the speaker over all is fantastic!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Connectivity Great Sound Great Price
reviews.reviewText:
This Small Wireless Speaker is Great for the Price. Better than Large Stereo Blue Tooth's that I have previously used. The Lightning sized port is a little on the tricky side. The enclosed cord should be longer because I couldn't get my longer IPhone charging cord to fit in its port.
So Far I am enjoying it to amp up my I Pad to watch Amazon Prime Video while Cooking!!

Love this product! Used it for a week at the beach. I didn‚Äôt do the best job protecting it from sand/salty air, but the product had no issues! No sand got in the speaker! We now use this in the kitchen and at the pool. Very durable doesn‚Äôt get over heated! Great price for a great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: For the price a great buy.
reviews.reviewText: Great inexpensive little speaker. You get what you pay for, but even so this is s good deal.

Got this because got tired of trying to play music loud for others through my phone - an external speaker was needed. This is easy to carry around (especially with the case), easy to pair to my phone with the Bluetooth feature, has really good sound quality, and you can use the speaker itself for volume or pause/play/forward or your phone (I find it easier to adjust sound on my phone) or whatever device the speaker is paired to. Price was really good, too.

I wanted a little speaker that would connect to my fire TV... So I could listen to content in every room while doing chores (Without the expense of Echo Dots everywhere). Or take fishing and blue tooth to my phone. IMHO, I think bass might take a shine to Johnny Cash. Trout, maybe Stevie Nick's. I digress. This speaker is wonderful! Easily recognized by Fire and Android phone. Short charging time, long battery life, good sound for small device. Well appointed with carrying case, all the cables you need (like 3.5 audio even). A small point... Call me a dingbat if you must. There are little felt scratch protectors on "the bottom" of the speaker, so I assumed the actual LED "buttons" of the speaker should be facing up. LOLs on me. Turn it over for the greatness of the speaker. PS...I gave it four stars instead of five, just because I wish the volume went louder at times. If you are a grunge or Nugent aficionado wanting to bang your head, you should probably pursue a $300 Bose or something. Just saying.

The speaker is nice looking, small and light. It looks exactly as the photo shows.

The sound is ok. Definitely not Bose quality or even close to it. But for $18 the sound quality matches the price. I‚Äôm using this speaker for my bedroom, so it‚Äôs fine. I wouldn‚Äôt use this as a speaker for a large area like a living room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Overall good speaker for the price.
reviews.reviewText: The speaker arrived quickly and was packaged safely. I like the small size and also the rose gold color of the speaker. It was easy to use and charge. My only complaint is that the speaker is on the bottom and it would sound much better at the top. So far, I flip the speaker over when I want to hear my music. I‚Äôm looking for a stand to put the speaker in so the sound would be less muffled.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice size, nice price and nicely constructed
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied with this little Bluetooth speaker. It paired easily, charged quickly and the sound is not bad, for something of this size. I wanted something I can easily carry on trips for streaming music from my iPhone and enjoy in my hotel rooms. This little speaker seems to meet my needs. Better sound would require a larger speaker and a much more expensive one. So, compromise is called for. Overall, I'm very pleased and would recommend it to others wanting a low-cost, portable wireless speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome boom box that fits in your hand!
reviews.reviewText:
I really like this little boom box!
A great gift for the holidays! Pairs with my cell phone so I can listen to Pandora or my own tunes. It's loud and very small. I had total doubt when I saw how little it was. "no way is this going to provide good sound quality!" I thought. My Dad being a addicted to music. My first concert was at 21 days old. We blasted music in huge speakers my entire life! However, it actually sounds great! And is loud enough for my ears.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker, great quality, great price!
reviews.reviewText: Great mini speaker! I live in a small apartment and this is great for listening to music. The battery life IS PHENOMENAL! I‚Äôve used this for at least 15+ hours since I received it and haven‚Äôt once charged it. Great quality, great look and I love the size. I‚Äôm honestly shocked it isn‚Äôt more expensive.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker, especially considering the price
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased many cheap speakers like this and all of them have either been disappointing or have broken in a few months. A button pushed through in a week on the last one. This one seems like a very solid unit. The touch controls on top are very well executed and make it easy to control verses tiny buttons with impossible to see markings. I guess the bottom line is this a well thought out and executed speaker that happens to be inexpensive and not cheap.

The design of the LED Design Bluetooth speaker is sleek. Although the picture shows the speaker resting on its side, it is made to rest on the base. Unfortunately, the speaker is on the bottom and this muffles the sound. Also, my pet peeve is a speaker that makes announcements, i.e. 'on', 'off', etc. Good size and nice design but not the quality I was expecting.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound for a small speaker!
reviews.reviewText: Very impressive sound for a small portable speaker. It paired immediately to my cell phone and PC. The controls are easy to use and work well. Quality seems very good, with a good weight to the speaker. I got the rose gold color, and it looks elegant and classy. If you have the speaker on a hard surface like a kitchen counter, it accentuates the treble, so try to put something soft under it to dampen the treble. Being small, it doesn't have booming bass, but it still is very good for its size. To get a more balanced sound, place it upside down.

reviews.reviewerName: Very fun. My two year old loves it.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how loud this little speaker was. It‚Äôs better than the more expensive ones I‚Äôve purchased in the past.

I brought this speaker to fill my lovely little room with some music, as it gets chafing to wear a headset all the time. The Rose Gold color is wonderful with a nice sheen to it, and the touch screen LED lights are nice and bright. The overall quality of the speaker is high with no warping, crunch, or otherwise unnecessary secondary sounds whenever I play my music, even when I blast it to the highest volume. Speaking of which, this thing has some strength too it, it's nice and bassy and can get fairly loud with the volume set high, which is impressive. Battery life is tremendous, lasting for overall 8 hours. I do have two complaints however - The touch screen is a little delayed or insensitive to touch, as it takes awhile for it to respond when you use the screen. The design is also... Kind of annoying. The speaker is located underneath the touch screen, and the sound will come out weird because it's probably going to be emitted against a hard surface you put it on. I bought a case for my speaker and leave it flipped over to best sound quality and reach. Aside from that, for it's price, it's an above average product and you'll be getting a little more than you expected from something of it's caliber.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker...when it's placed upside down!
reviews.reviewText: Odd little speaker sounds much better when it's placed upside down. Yeah, you heard me right. Place it with the speaker firing right side up instead of down. Whilst facing the speaker down the sound was shrill and harsh. Face the speaker up and the sound is much fuller.

reviews.reviewTitle: IT SOUNDS MUCH BETTER IF THE SPEAKER FRONT-- ,i.e. THE WHITE GRILL FACES UP.
reviews.reviewText: It sounds better if the "bottom" the white grill which seems to be the front of the speaker faces either up or sideways, even using my equalizer on my computer in iTunes. Sound quality clear but virtually no bass is present. iTunes equalizer does very little to help this problem.

Very nice looking little speaker, unfortunately it didn‚Äôt connect with my iPhone 6 Plus, I can use it with the phone, but it must be connected to the cable, however the Bluetooth connected very easy to my iPad, the phone just couldn‚Äôt find the XLeaderA8 to connect, on the phone shows as ‚ÄòTV Samsung 8Series‚Äô, and that is not compatible with the phone,. Anyway, the sound is acceptable, nothing amazing, but I guess is good for the low price.

reviews.reviewTitle: A good bargain for the cost
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfectly satisfactory speaker, with good strong sound, and I like the ability to adjust the volume - not all inexpensive blue tooth speakers have that feature. I bought it to use with my iPod to listen to books, so my demands for fidelity are not great. Hooking it up was very intuitive and easy, which is a good thing: my only complaint is the instruction pamphlet, which is written in such poorly-translated English that it is simply not understandable. Fortunately, I haven't really needed it!

I purchased two of these speakers to connect to my Alexa's for extra sound. I cannot get either one of these to connect to my Alexa as stated. I followed the directions and my Alexa cannot discover the speakers. I have one that states in Bluetooth mode when I turn it on, the other one does not do this so one works better than the other. The sound out of both is nice but that is not the biggest reason for ordering them. Kind of disappointed.

This speaker is amazing . I was having a girls night out on the patio and needed something small, yet loud and good battery life . This speaker did all that an more ! It‚Äôs loud, clear and the phone functionality buttons are a major plus.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sounds like I put phone in a tin can
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this bluetooth speaker in the hopes that it would sound better than my iPhone's speaker - I was wrong. This speaker rattled and sounded like I put my phone in a tin can. It sounds hallow and metallic; no redeeming qualities at all. Don't be fooled my the MANY raving reviews.

I love this little speaker. The sound is great. Louder than expected which is nice. Makes my laptop sound really good. I've listened to music with it, watched YouTube How-To's. I am very happy with this purchase. Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Increases volume for iPhone for treadmill use.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to increase the volume for my iPhone while I listen to music on my treadmill. Even at the highest volume I could not hear the music good over the noise of the treadmill with just my phone. This little speaker works great. I can‚Äôt really detect sound quality I just like to listen to the music. It works perfectly for increasing volume

I can't really say what the sound quality is because it never charged. I had it plugged in for 6 hours and every time I tried to pair it it would say battery low then shut off. It also doesn't let you use it while it's plugged in to the charger, so I had to return it expecting it will never charge/work.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product, great sound, buttons are odd, and battery life is amazing
reviews.reviewText: First of all, like to start out by saying how amazing the battery life is on this speaker. It‚Äôs been a week since buying it, and I have been using it 30 mintues a day, and I still haven‚Äôt had to charge it. The sound is amazing, and it can go louder then your phone sound. The buttons are odd. To go skip a song or go back to a song, the button are backwards. I‚Äôm unsure if this is how it‚Äôs supposed to be, or mine is just a mess up. It doesn‚Äôt bother me, but it‚Äôs something to be noted. The speaker is also on the bottom, I find myself placing the speaker on its side or placed down on its front. Besides those two things, this speaker is awesome and is amazing for the price.

I bought this for my daughter and she likes it. It match her iPhone. She and I use the speaker and the only thing that we don't like is that the speaker is on the bottom. The sound is muffle even with speaker legs. If you flip the speaker you can hear the difference in the sound, it sound better and you enjoy the music and/or the video. It probably would be nice if the speaker is higher by having the legs 2 or 3 inches high. Because of this, I'm giving 3 stars.

I came across this and wasn't sure if I wanted to spend money to buy it seeing that I bought other speakers for my car and don't work very well so I decided to give this one to try and lo and behold this little thing has awesome sounds I don't have a car with Bluetooth so therefore I like to connect my phone and don't want to drive with headsets and this is phenomenal I put it in the driver side dashboard sounds great would only like to know if I can sync two together and I would definitely buy another love it
LOVED IT! Looking foward to buy more just to have in everyroom. Its really loud for its size. Would totally recommend! Great quality & looks so pretty, even better than the picture!

Just wanted something that didn't cost too much and would get the job done. It has done that and more. Bought it for my wife, she loves everything about this little gem. I myself was impressed by the sound quality. If you are looking for a Bluetooth speaker, grab this, it won't disappoint.

I was NOT given anything for this review.

I've been using it for nearly a week. The sound is great, even with the speaker on the bottom. When I first paired it I was mad that it wasn't loud, but I turned up the volume on my device and it was louder than I needed. I can take it from room to room without while my device is on the charger. I would definitely recommend this speaker.

Bought this as a gift for my 18 year old nephew for Christmas. He had asked for a portable Bluetooth speaker but later told me he didn‚Äôt really think he‚Äôd get it. It was just one of the things on his list. He used it on Christmas evening, and we were all really impressed with the sound quality and even the level of bass coming out of that tiny little speaker. He still uses it regularly - for seven months now and counting - and says it still works like its brand new.

After reading the reviews I had to find out for myself if it's true and it is. I was looking for something small and portable for the office but wanted something that could put out the kind of sound quality I wanted (and didn't burn a hole through my wallet). Love the rose gold color that it came in. Easy to use and it really does pack a punch when it comes to sound. I flip the speaker facing upwards so the sound is more intense. I highly suggest this awesome product.

I like how small it is and easy to move around. It charges really well and lasts a long time. My only issue is the fact that the speakers being on the bottom, get muffled very easily. The legs on the speaker are too small so it doesn't keep the speaker from sitting directly on top of whatever surface it's on and that muffles the sound. I'm going to add some height to the feet if possible to see if it helps. Other than that it's worth it.

the sound volume range is wide. can go very quiet to very loud yet having good sounds. I used it every day and I felt like it lasted for at least a week before I needed to recharge it. I'm happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Little Speaker; Carrying Case is Sweeeeet!!!!
reviews.reviewText:
There is nothing to not like about this speaker. It has great sound quality. I use it for moving from room to room when home. It's loud enough for me to enjoy, but not so intense that, at its highest, it disturbs my neighbor.

The larger purpose (and the reason I purchased it) is at church I serve in the Golf Cart Ministry, where our attendees are transported from the further ends of the parking lot to the buildings housing the sanctuaries. It's a great welcome to hear music crisply and clearly from this little dynamo while being transported to corporate worship. My passengers love it!

How much do I like it, really? I purchased a second one (plus the carrying case) for a friend.

Goes very loud with long battery life and compact lightweight. There's almost no bass and there's no bass boost option. It does the job for background music and for phonic intelligibility (voice and speech).

I paid $15 for this. Oonts came out with a small unit that looks to be much more impressive for ~$23 and in hindsight, I would have been glad to pay the difference.

This is definitely 5 star for the price, Just be aware of the limitations.

reviews.reviewTitle: NICE LOOKING AND BLUETOOTH PAIRING CAPABILITY
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is fair for a small portable speaker......it's the VOLUME that concerns me most......I wanted it for an alarm speaker (I still have to work out how to get Alexa to SAY "Time to WAKE UP".....but the TONE alarm isn't all that loud......we are senior citizens and need the volume....so maybe this speaker isn't the best fit! I LIKE that it's portable, but using it as an alarm, if we continue and don't return it, isn't all that big a deal for us.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is NOT good for making phone calls because the person on the ...
reviews.reviewText:
I use this to listen to my audio books in the car. It is NOT good for making phone calls because the person on the other line consistently cannot hear me very well on it. It's okay for audiobooks but the sound quality could be better. It is a little "fuzzy" if you know what I mean.

Lookswise, it is a cute portable speaker that can fit in one hand and the rose gold is attractive.

I realize you get what you pay for but this speaker is pretty poor. The speaker is on the bottom of the disk resulting in low quality, tinny sound. If you flip it over it sounds a bit better but the buttons get pressed lowering/raising the volume or skipping songs. Very poor design.

I really like how compact but loud it is. I use this for my classroom, and it is perfect to use as a background noise during writing/reading/independent time that students are focusing. When it's at full volume it's not the best quality of sound, but it is most definitely LOUD. No issues there.

I usually place this with the speaker down against a hard surface with the buttons up, since I need quick access to those when moving from subject to subject. When speaker down against a cushioned/soft surface it is considerably muted, but that would happen with ANY speaker placed in that situation (simple physics).

The play/pause option is a little delayed, and the volume up button has to be closest to you to skip to the next song (just fyi). However, for me, this did not necessitate a lower rating.

Overall, amazing quality! I may buy another for only personal use, since I have already forgotten it at home once and regretted it deeply that day when I could only use my (honestly) crappy projector and computer sound. Very pleased with my purchase.
Great product and price. Plan on ordering more

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker are on the bottom!! smh
reviews.reviewText: Okay so this would be a fine speaker (don't expect super sound quality or bass)... but, THE SPEAKER IS ON THE BOTTOM. imagine the way your phone music all of a sudden sounds awful when you cover the little speaker with your thumb.... that's how this sounds because the speaker is on the bottom and it's covered up. Now... you can just turn it upside down, but then you can't get to the volume change and track skip buttons. Whoever designed this should quit.

reviews.reviewTitle: It worked for a day and now it will not connect
reviews.reviewText: It worked fine for a day and a half - now I can not get it to connect to my phone - it powers on and a blue light on the back blinks but it will not collect via Bluetooth. I loved it for the time it worked. It continues to be unable to connect via Bluetooth but will work when connected via wire. Very saf
These speakers are Awesome. I haven't tested the battery life yet but the sound is powerful and they feel really sturdy for their size. Thanks a lot.

I like the product, it has great sound and sleek look. But it has got two stars because I had to get a replacement and the second product that was issued has the same problem as the one I returned.

Pro's: The product is small with a great sound. I was able to connect with my phone and the battery lasted a long time before I needed to recharge.

Con's: The skip and repeat buttons were switched. I thought I may have mistaken this issue but if i turned it the other way around the volume button would be switched. I got a replacement item and again I had the same issue.

I like the product I can over look the this issue but I will have to warn future buyers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid speaker for the price. Could sound better.
reviews.reviewText: I read many reviews touting the sound quality of this little speaker, and sadly, I was disappointed. If you only listen to music over your phone speaker then yes this is much better. It makes the sound louder, but I feel like I have to keep moving the speaker to try to get rid of the echo or harshness from the upper midrange. Otherwise a good speaker and not glitchy. At this price you cant expect much so I would recommend it for a cheap speaker.

sound quality is phenominal. get some feedback squall if I use 2 apps. like now. I'm listening to music and doing a review and getting feedback. no issue though and no deal breaker. could use taller feet. ( constructive criticism or a cool side stand) real compact. battery life I will update. it's plenty loud, surprisingly so. nice unit. UPDATED so said there was a squall type feed back. so no it is my fire tab. hmmm yeah.. so and battery is doing well. haven't had it
down to 100% longest time running is 5 hours full volume.

I overall like the product. The bluetooth feature is good and the sound is amazing. It's small too so it doesn't take up a lot of room and the battery life is wicked long so I can use it multiple times without having to charge it completely. HOWEVER,the voice that speaks whenever i turn it on or off is a little annoying. If someone knows how to turn that off I'd appreciate it. Also, the voice does this annoying thing when you're hooked up to the bluetooth, it screams, "Calling, Calling, Calling" until you answer your phone. I wish it would just stop playing the music. Again, if anyone knows how to solve this I'd really appreciate your help!

This little baby gets LOUD! I bought this speaker for use at work, where there are pretty loud machines at every worker's station, and they kind of drown things out‚Äîoh, boy. Man does this speaker overpower that, not to mention I've still not had to charge it since initially getting it to full when I received it in the mail. Admittedly, I also don't use it daily, but that's still about a hundred times the battery life my little Bluetooth earbuds have. Only complaint is that the speaker itself is on the bottom of the product, so when you sit it down on a table, the sound distorts a little bit‚Äîand since the controls are touch-activated and not button-buttons, if I flip it upside down on a surface, it has a tendency to pause itself.

reviews.reviewTitle: A2 LENRUE Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker Is much better.
reviews.reviewText:
Keeping this to gift to a coworker since it‚Äôs no point in returning. The below is much better.

A2 LENRUE Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Built-in-Mic,Handsfree Call,AUX Line,TF Card,HD Sound and Bass for iPhone Ipad Android Smartphone and More(Rose Gold).

For the price this thing gets pretty loud but since the speaker is on the bottom it's a little muffled. I plan on dealing with that by putting it between two book stops and lying it on its side. The sound also gets distorted at its highest volume. Still, for the purpose (movies in my room off of Netflix with my projector and music in my room/kitchen) this is great for the price. Its cute, light, and the rose gold makes it so I'm not afraid to leave it out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Smaller, louder, and clearer than expected
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my daughter. The speaker is so small we worried that it might sound small or tinny. She was very pleasantly surprised to hear how loud and clear it sounded. Even the bass has good depth, and even a tiny thump to it. The unit is very nice looking and the rose gold color matches her phone. It feels solid and durable in the hand, so I wouldn't worry about portability. Overall a very good purchase and a bargain for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can hear clearly even when you're hearing impaired
reviews.reviewText: I love how loud this device can be. I'm hearing impaired and I can hear it clearly while I'm at work. I'm so glad I bought this Bluetooth speaker. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone who needs a really awesome Bluetooth speaker for cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: it's little it''s lovey it lights
reviews.reviewText: It' little I;s lovey it lights this was the trade mark for the Princess telephone .way back then. But really fits this speeker,And the extra added attraction is the case. Its a semi soft case that holds the speaker and leads,and I think it makes the music sound better kind like a small echo chamber.Battery lasts quite awhile and I can charge...joe the unit with the lead that I use to charge my phone.The instructions were well written and it was easy to hook up

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at a reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these speakers to use in my office and liked it so much that I ordered another one for my house. The product came timely and was packaged appropriately. The sound can get very loud for such a small speaker and the sound quality is very good. The product is very easy to pair and use. The touch buttons on top of the speaker are great. The battery life is very good. i have used it a bunch and still have not had to charge it again. I also really like that it powers off when the device unpairs (i.e when I leave the room with my phone), so no need to remember to power off to save battery. Great product!

Holy cow, this thing has been running on it's first charge for two days (over 12 hours run time) and is still sounding great. Bought this for my wife to listen to music from her cell phone and she loves it. Nice sound for a small speaker and well placed controls on top of the unit. I'm jealous since my blue tooth speaker craps out within about two hours. I'm about to buy another one to replace mine which is not very old.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks and sounds great, especially for the price.
reviews.reviewText: For the price this little speaker is well worth it. Looks nice, sounds great, and is easily portable. I just use it as a Bluetooth desk speaker at work, so it doesnt get a lot of testing against crazy environments. However, the battery has done very well, lasting for days of constant use without having to be charged.
