I've had issues with cheap speakers in the past making a "pop" sound if there was ever any kind of lull in whatever I was listening to, but not with this one. The only issue I have is that the Next and Previous buttons are swapped in their functions. So, not a huge deal just annoying. All in all, this speaker is definitely worth the buy.

In the description this item says the battery will last over 8 hours on one charge, this is far from the truth. You will be lucky if you get 4 hours after charging it all night. You cannot listen to it while it is charging either. I would never recommend this speaker to anyone. I have one I paid half the price for that hold a better charge than this does.

reviews.reviewTitle: Intrusive and interferes with my choices on my computer and Iphone
reviews.reviewText: Intrusive!!! It makes phone calls I haven't asked it to. When I choose a youtube video to listen to, this thing chooses something else from my files I didn't want. When I turned my bluetooth in my computer off, I no longer had sound from the internal speakers in my computer. This device randomly speaks even when it's been turned off. I call it the devil's box. I may drop it off the nearest bridge into the gulf‚ÄîI don't want this in my house or anywhere near my devices!

I wanted a cheap speaker for my old iPad which volume is insanely small. So I bought this, the cheapest speaker I found on Amazon. And I am so surprised by the quality!! It is better than the triangle one I bought from another seller here a year ago.
This is touched screen, pretty rose gold and portable size. I bring this speaker on my car now as well Bc my phone couldn‚Äôt connect to the car speaker system haha.

For the unit size has fairly good tonal quality. Sufficient amplification. I bought this unit to pair with my Echo Auto so as not to have to stream my music on short hops around town but still have the advantage of the Echo Auto unit. The only con is that you can not till which mode you are in, bluetooth, SD Card or aux input.
The added carrying case was a nice bonus to the package.

This is a beautiful little speaker. Was a bit confused on how to pair, but not too difficult. The reason it only has two stars is because it is beautiful. Otherwise od give it 0. It doesn't get as loud as I expected (I've had other little speakers with much more) but there is NO bass. So it makes it seem high pitched and gives me a head ache. Very sad. As I loved the size and beautiful design.

Absolutely love this product. I use it at work and I have a open space I can keep it low enough that I can hear it but not everyone that walks into my office can. Or I can turn it up and the whole office can hear it. I have bought so many of different kinds of these. I think this one so far as been the best.

I am a massage therapist, using this speaker while working with clients. The package arrived quickly and the sound is great! I received all attachments when the package arrived. I love the size of the speaker, I can put it in my leggings side pocket after I‚Äôve cleaned my room for the day. Thank you

I wanted to really like this speaker, but it just didn't work out for me. The sound quality wasn't very good, and it was having trouble staying connected to my phone when it was literally 2 feet away from it. Ended up returning the product.

Because of the controls on the top of the speakers, the speaker itself is on the bottom, which means you'll get better volume if you turn the speakers upside down, but then that defeats the purpose of having the control scheme on top.
ALOT better than the last 3 speakers that I‚Äôve bought.
I do t know if I‚Äôm going to keep this or send it back. Every time it‚Äôs more then a foot away from my cell it stops playing. It‚Äôs very loud and has a great sound but I need range!

reviews.reviewTitle: The volume does not go high enough for my purposes
reviews.reviewText: For the music I needed to play for my preschool music program, the volume does not go high enough for the children to hear it. Some songs allowed it better than others, but overall I'm looking for a different method. These are songs I recorded from cassette tape, so maybe this is the reason. I had a speaker system that worked better with these same songs than the current device is doing.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great things really DO come in small packages!
reviews.reviewText:
Initially, I was searching for a set of desktop speakers when it suddenly dawned on me that that might be antiquated; especially given that my new laptop is Bluetooth enabled. Thus I changed my search phrase and found this little speaker and it's absolutely perfect. Though small, this little speaker emits a LOUD, crystal clear, sound which is just enough for my home office space. I've been streaming music on Pandora, watching YouTube videos, etc and the sound is just great. It's performed impressively well for my teleconference meetings which is the primary reason I purchased this speaker. I can hear my clients and they can hear me very well.

This device comes equipped with a short USB cable for charging, but not a wall charger. So, if you happen to have an extra wall charger lying around, keep it. Or, you may want to purchase a wall charger at the same time you purchase this speaker.There is also an audio cable for wired sound if you need/prefer.

It was relatively easy to pair with my laptop, but I did have some trouble getting sound to play. Strangely enough, it was until I plugged in the USB cable that sound suddenly started blaring out. I was startled and impressed at the same time. I unplugged the USB and the sound has been working perfectly ever since. It powers on quickly, indicated by a brief jingle. After which, a woman's voice announces "Bluetooth mode". "Pairing". "Paired". It's never failed to pair or emit sound since the first day and I feel confident it will last for a long time. I love that the control buttons sit right on top of the speaker, and are literally controlled by tapping them.

The size is perfect given the limited space on my desk. I've yet to finish assessing the battery life but if disappointing, I'll be back with an update.

So my only complaint about this speaker is the fact that the speaker part is on the bottom part, therefore the noise muffles against whatever you have the speaker sitting on, and I‚Äôve tried to flip it over while playing to avoid this and the whole thing stops working. However it is still a perfectly good speaker and it is only a minor complaint on my part. It has an excellent battery life, it‚Äôs easy to charge, it‚Äôs small and portable and I love the pink color.

We purchased this tiny little gem for when we're out camping. It is small, easily transportable, and best of all...it sounds great! The speaker feels rather sturdy and substantial but is really only the size of a hockey puck. It isn't terribly loud, but the sound quality is exceptional...especially from a $15 unit. I'm impressed, and I think you'd be too if you picked one up.

This product gives me satisfaction more than I expected. After comparing this product with other similar products, finally I selected this one to purchase. It arrived on time, the package box includes the speaker, a short USB cable, a cable to plug in laptop and a small bag to put all stuff in together. This speaker has a good bass built-in sound, I think. It does not need battery, just plug into power and play music. As a graduate student, I play songs from laptop and listen to the songs from the speaker via bluetooth by putting away from my study table. It helps me create a relaxed study environment. It has its own volume control, so the volume can be controlled (increased or decreased) from both laptop and the speaker itself. It is cute and small enough to carry in the backpack as well. Overall, I am satisfied with this product.

This speaker is small. That's all I can say for it. When you turn it on, a voice loudly announces "PEERED" and when you turn it off, same voice yells, "POWVER OVFF" There is no option to disable her voice and it's loud regardless of the volume setting on the device you are pairing to the speaker. When using it to sync to Netflix or Youtube, the audio is not in sync with the video compared to other bluetooth speakers I've used.

No exaggeration, this is the worst device purchase I have ever made, possibly the worst purchase ever. I charged it for 24 hours before using it and within seconds, SECONDS, of unplugging it and playing music it informed me the battery was low and it needed charging. Fine. I can listen to it while plugged in. NOPE. The sound is terrible with lots of static. The only reason I didn't return it is because I threw away the box being entirely too optimistic.

I got it for my Amazon Echo Spot. Just plugged in the audio connection, gave it a minute or two, powered on & off and it was good to go! Would love to get it set up via bluetooth but haven't bothered yet. I think the sound is great. I have it sitting on its side. Perhaps it sounds muffled if you have it on its back because that's where the speakers are. Dunno. Battery life is a bit short though. Otherwise, A+!
Quite a powerful speaker for the size. Linked up quickly. Just got it so looking forward to trying it out.

This is the cutest little portable Bluetooth speaker! It‚Äôs well worth the price every detail listed is on point! The sound is excellent, very easy to connect it‚Äôs not heavy either an the battery last a long time an doesn‚Äôt take long to charge when it‚Äôs run dead! I give it 5 stars an would definitely purchase it again !!

It‚Äôs a cute speaker and the sound is great..... for about a month, then it‚Äôs trash. I used it for about a month in my studio and one day last week I turned my music on and there was more static than music. Just to be sure it wasn‚Äôt the multiple pandora stations that were acting up that day, I switched to an old bluetooth speaker I have and the static was gone. I bought this speaker because it‚Äôs small so it took up less counter space at work. Unfortunately I had to go back to my big bluetooth speaker so that I could play my music until I find replacement. If you only need this item for a month then it‚Äôs perfect for you! If you need something more long term; DO NOT BUY THIS SPEAKER. I hope this review helps other shoppers!

I like the speaker very much. It is quite handy and the quality is very good for such a small speaker. Volumn control is great. My only complaint has to do with the instruction manual. Obviously, the individual writing the instructions does not speak English as a first language. I could not decipher the instructions--the English is very poor. I was able to set up the speaker, but it took me a little longer than it should due to issues with the instructions.

Thank you,
Diane

I bought this as a new speaker since the last one I had stopped working. I like to play music while I take a shower and this new speaker is great! It has great battery life (I should probably charge it though, I haven‚Äôt since I got it) and it has great sound quality.

Works better than I could have hoped! The sound quality is phenomenal. It's very light and portable, so I can bring it with me wherever I go whenever I want to. I also particularly enjoy the digital touch keys! Very convenient!

I bought this speaker primarily so I could listen to music from my phone and iPad outdoors. So far it works great! Much better than the phone or iPad speakers alone. One thing I‚Äôve noticed when using it with my iPad is that it keeps losing the Bluetooth connection. That doesn‚Äôt seem to happen with my phone, and my iPad is brand new. Hope this resolves itself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not my favorite but looks good
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this for my office hoping to get rid of my big desk speakers. The size and look are great! I got the rose gold and love the tone.

However, here are my frustrations with this speaker: 1. The sound is really tinny with the buttons facing up (like when you put your phone in a cup to make the sound louder). It's not bad with the speaker side up, but then I have to pick it up to use the buttons. This is very disappointing as I was hoping for something with good sound quality. 2. The turn-off time seems pretty short and can't be changed. Going in and out of my office so often, I wish it would stay on for a few minutes so I didn't have to turn it back on Everytime I come back in.

I knew based on reviews that this speaker would be small, but it can easily fit in a pocket. For it's size, it gives out pretty great sound even with the speaker being on the bottom. I love the SD card port and the AUX cord for my ipod so I don't waste the battery on my phone using Bluetooth. I bought this one as a gift, but I'll probably be purchasing another for myself in the future.

Great little speaker! I have purchased 2 or 3 other brands. Some were just poor quality and none of the others had an adjustable volume button. They were totally dependent on the volume adjustment from my phone which only goes so loud. This one has great sound and will adjust to a very high volume.
Small and compact but has enough weight (on rubber grip on bottom) so it won't slide around. Very Happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Would be better if speaker wasn't on bottom
reviews.reviewText: This item is good, but I would have rated it 5 stars if the speaker wasn't on the bottom of the device. Why? Because it is muffled if you have it on anything (even a solid surface) and sounds horrible. I have to turn it upside down to hear it perfectly but sometimes the touch pad hits itself on its own and changes the song and/or stops. So that part is quite annoying. The sound quality overall is loud for such a little device which is great. I just wish they put the speaker on the side or on the top.

reviews.reviewTitle: Paired immediately with early model Taotronics transmitter.
reviews.reviewText: My wife can hear it on her side of the bed and I can't or just barely can. She couldn't sleep with bluetooth headphones and I can't sleep with the TV yelling bloody murder!..This little speaker saved the day!.. Paired to a Taotronics bluetooth TV audio transmitter and sounds great about 10 feet from the transmitter. Seems to be well made. We're pleased with our purchase.

Overall this is one fine product. I really like the Echo Dot controls. It was a gift for my wife. She really likes it! For me the bass could be just a hair better but everything else is great ! Personally, I am A GADGET GUY? Have been in the communications field and home entertainment business for over 50 years. I have MP3 players with TF card slots on several different brands and really like that capability. Bluedio, TM-01 BTC, Several Bluetooth headphones (at least a dozen.) A half dozen Alexa Echo Dots etc. etc. Introduced the first Home Computers The TI 99 (Texas Instrument) -- to consumers in 1972 before the commodore 20. and 64--------------8 track in the 60's, The Pong game,Atari Etc Etc,. The first VCR's, ,Camcorders, Laser Players, CD Players, .Satellite Antenna, Big Screen Televisions etc . etc. It goes on and on. Loved the being in the business and lots of gadgets. I hope that you are enjoying the industry as much as I have. Sincerely, John Russell Have a good day!

I bought this cute little speaker last year, and did a brief test on it, its sound effect was pretty good, even though the manual was impossible to understand. Recently I start to use it on daily bases, it works good for news and music, but when I use it for language learning, for some lessons, it was frequently eating some words, or only speak out half of a word, this happens like every 2 seconds out of 6 seconds, while it works fine for other lessons. It might be good for listening to music, but definitely not for language learning where every single word matters.

I bought this because it was inexpensive but cute for work. We work in a kitchen so it gets noisy & items have been stolen. I was quite impressed with how loud this little thing gets!! The speaker is on the bottom so we sit it on a wire rack & it can be heard all through the area. I bought the hard shell case for it & my chargers all fit with it. I really like this cute bluetooth alot! It's about the size of the little Amazon alexa.
It‚Äôs as described and pretty simple to use I‚Äôm happy with it and it‚Äôs a great value the sound quality is good does not have a lot of bass but I still like it

reviews.reviewTitle: Lowest volume setting still too loud for my desk at work :(
reviews.reviewText: Lowest setting still too loud - I work in an office And just wanted my music to play low in the background at my desk. The lowest volume settings still too loud though. This wouldn‚Äôt be an issue if you don‚Äôt need it for work for a small cubicle :-) cute speaker though. Would have loved to keep it.

I bought this after I dropped my other A2 speaker thinking it would be close to the same thing for a little bit less money. However, this product is already falling apart. The speaker is on the bottom first of all. I don‚Äôt like this feature at all and it makes the sound coming through the speaker muffled. In addition, the small pad things on the bottom of the speaker have fallen off in the first couple of weeks I have had it. I have tried to flip the speaker over to get a better sound quality, yet, the buttons (sound, skip, disconnect, pause) are so sensitive that the speaker just disconnects. All around very disappointed with how the speaker turned out. Would not buy this again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great value for the price and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this little speaker. Works perfectly for not needing mass volume our surround at my desk. Tone is pretty good, more bass than expected. Could probably adjust base and treble on device so it's not as bassy but overall I'm impressed for it being so inexpensive. I purchased the rose and love it. The only thing I'm not fond of is the voice that tells you it's powering off but that's minor.

This product is so much worse than anticipated. The sound quality is horrible since the speaker is on the bottom. It also does not sync well with any of my devices. I wish I could return this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker on the bottom is a major design flaw
reviews.reviewText: Overall it's very pretty and it paired easily. Unfortunately, the speaker is the bottom of the unit, so sound goes directly into the surface it's sitting on. I turned it upside down so speaker is facing up, but the control buttons are on the top and are flush with the body, so music kept fast forwarding. I finally put adhesive "feet" on the top, so it can be placed upside down when in use and it works fine. Looks dumb with the feet on it when not in use tho. I wish I could recommend it, but I cannot.

I use it in the car because my stereo went out and while I decide to do (a story for another time) I need something to play music, other than the speaker from my phone. It plays great and good volume. Occasionally it will ‚Äúskip‚Äù but it‚Äôs only for a second at most. Overall I am satisfied with purchase and would recommend.

I should have thought through it more before buying this speaker, but I saw a few reviews that were positive about sound quality, but the design has the speaker on the bottom of the unit. This means when you place it on a table, or anywhere else, the sound is projected into the table underneath creating a muffled sound. It's fine for the price and not worth returning for me, but I definitely wouldn't recommend it to anyone. Yes, it's small and cute, but in order for me to not get annoyed with the sound quality, i have to prop it up and point the speaker at me so it doesn't matter how cute it is when I only see the bottom speaker at that point. When I listen to it that way, the sound quality is a little tinny, but I would have been fine with it for the price if it sounded like that when used as designed.
I really like the sound quality and battery life of this speaker that I ordered three. It was better than I expected.

I got this for my mom for her Christmas present because she was asking me about mine. And she doesn't like her music as loud as I like my music, so this one was perfect for her. Actually kind of wanted to keep it! It's just so cute and small! Was really easy to use and she loves it. First my little thing it sure does get loud! She doesn't even use it on the loudest setting because she thinks it's too loud LOL

I wanted to love this speaker. There were a lot of reviews and they seemed mostly positive so I gave it a try. The sound quality isn‚Äôt great. The speaker sits almost flush with whatever surface it is on. In order to get any decent use out of it I have to elevate it on something like an open trivet. I honestly get better sound by putting my phone in a bowl or glass.

This little this is very nice the color is very pretty. I ordered it because I didn‚Äôt know Alexa could be blue tooth enabled. However I like this blue tooth speaker it‚Äôs very easy to use, I keep it plugged in because I have to have to music going continuously while my client is on the table, and I don‚Äôt want to risk the battery dying in the middle of a session (I‚Äôm a LMT). The sound quality is very crisp and clear.

reviews.reviewTitle: Speaker stands up on part where sound comes out
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of this speaker but the design doesnt make sense.. the speaker part where the sound comes out is on the bottom where you stand the device which in my opinion muffles the sound. Not sure why they would make a speaker like this. I'm most likely going to send it back and look for a better designed portable speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lightweight very portable speaker with decent sound for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This really inexpensive unit is an excellent personal speaker for traveling. It also looks good, and has acceptable sound quality and volume for a few people listening in a small space. The user interface is excellent. The controls are easy to see and use. It comes with a carry bag that easily holds the speaker and the cables that come with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Huge sound in a small package
reviews.reviewText: This is the coolest Bluetooth speaker I‚Äôve ever used. It was easy to link with and has a great sound that you‚Äôd expect in a much larger speaker. The touch controls work flawlessly. I‚Äôm very satisfied and would definitely refer this to anyone.

In my opinion, the most important aspect of a speaker is the sound quality. There is no point in purchasing a speaker that sounds terrible, period. The sounds very good. It's relatively small, about 4 inches in diameter and 1.5 inches deep. Vocals, guitars, most synths come through loud, clear, and distinct. Even though small, the bass is clearly audible in the sound profile, though not loud or driving. You will hear the bass, but not feel it in any way. Their small size makes them the perfect travel companion. I think is one of the best and I definitely recommend it.

Speaker cuts off every once I a while. I bought this wanting to use it in my Classroom so that my students can listen to their class books via Audible. The problem that I ran into is that at the start of every sentence the speaker cuts off the first word. Obviously this won‚Äôt help my students understand the book, so I found this speaker to be underwhelming.

I keep this on my nightstand. When directly plugged to my phone, I get 'crackling'. It's the droid phone electronics feeding back into the speaker. If I open my phone cover, it changes the crackling. When in bluetooth, no problem. Sound is only OK, I only listen to talk radio, no music. Really stylish. Worth the cheap price. But, if sound quality is paramount...spend more, buy better. My original speaker was much larger, but died recently. This one fits better on my night stand. No knowledge of battery life.

My business partner and I bought this speaker so we have the ability to play some background music during solo activities time at our workshops. So far, we really like it. The speaker is on the bottom on the device, which sometimes means it has a tinny sound depending on what sort of surface it's sitting on when you're listening. We've solved this by simply flipping it upside down. For the price it was exactly what we needed and so far, we're very happy with it!

Hey, it's under $17, what do you expect? It turns out that despite the laughably horrible instruction booklet this isn't half-bad. There are only so many buttons so even placing the instructions aside you'll probably figure it out if you regularly pair Bluetooth devices. The sound is mediocre, but again, hard to complain at this price. Battery life is better than some other under-$20 speakers and that is a feature you should compare with the competition.

This thing is so powerful with sound and battery life is unbelievable. I turn this thing on at 8:30am when I got to work and here it is 3:15 pm and it‚Äôs still going strong. I have had to charge my phone since 8:30 am but not this speaker. This was an excellent buy for me. This my second one I purchase my grandson took the first one. Hahaha hahaha

reviews.reviewTitle: Attempted to use as a PC speaker
reviews.reviewText:
Attempted to use this as my PC speaker. Connectivity would be thru bluetooth and power via usb cable to PC. Unfortunately the sound was out-of-sync with the video. Resorted to using the AUX port which does not have that issue.

Sound quality is OK not a lot of bass. Compared to 2 other blue tooth speakers that I have this unit was the worse in terms of sound quality.

For the price you can't beat this little speaker and the case is fabulous. The only problem is it's very particular. To pause it is very difficult. You have to tap very gently or it stops for a second then keeps playing. I'm not sure why the speaker is on the bottom but it still sounds pretty good. It's definitely not Bose quality but better than listening through phone or computer speakers. I have not tried it with phone calls yet.
I gifted it and the person who recieved it said it's an awesome gift and one that she'll be using a lot. Said that sound is great, good that it can be taken anywhere, doesnt use up alot of space.

Charge has lasted a while so no problem there. Silver looks great. But, why would you design a speaker with a speaker that projects into the surface its sitting on? How are there seemingly very little comments about this? I luckily had rubber grip adhesives that I placed around the side of the speaker, this allows me to place the speaker on its side without rolling. In this way I can hear the music clearly and I am pleased with the quality so far. The design issue is why I give it 3 stars.
I use it in bluetooth mode for my iPhone, and with a sound cord for my laptop. It was affordable and works well for videos, podcasts, and audiobooks. I don't listen to music as often.

Great little speaker! I threw this on my wishlist last year around Xmas time on a whim because I wanted all rose gold accessories for my office. Turns out the sound quality is actually shockingly good. So much so that I got one for home too. My only complaint is the battery life on a single charge leaves something to be desired, but overall am happy with the gift and subsequent purchase.

I received my device today. I was absolutely astounded by the sound quality. I really didn't know what to expect even though I'd read some good reviews. This device is just amazing. The sound/audio is so defined, clear, and impressive. I paired it with my cell phone first and opened Netflix and Prime to play a movie. The quality was as close to theater sound that I've ever heard in such a small device. I then paired it with two different android tablets and then my laptop. I can tell you this device is a keeper. No matter with device I paired it to the sound was always outstanding. I can tell you that this is the best wireless speaker device you can invest in for the price. I loved it so much that I ordered another one for my daughter who had already started asking to use mine to play her music.

Construction is very good, solid. Sound is clear, and can get loud.
It‚Äôs a 4 star because of one (important) criticism, when using it with the TV there is quite a bit of delay in sound or speech synch. Otherwise it is a great item, I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Was hoping for a little more bass
reviews.reviewText: The speaker works fine. I have a laptop and it really doesn't carry any bass on it's on. I purchased this speaker to try it out. It does have a little more bass than the laptop on it's on. Headphones are still better with the bass, but the speaker is nice when I want to be up doing things in the house and listening at the same time.

Got it as a gift for my mom who cannot live without music. It is so pretty and compact (got the rose gold), which is perfect to just throw in your purse and take it anywhere.?The sound is surprisingly loud for its size. Im not sure how well the battery lasts as I haven‚Äôt asked my mom; i will be back with updates on that as soon as I ask her, but as of right now, it is a Great product overall

Edit: It‚Äôs so great I‚Äôm back to purchase a second one.

Great little speaker. Paired quickly with my iPhone and sounds pretty good. I love the small size and the controls on the top are convenient.

The speaker works fine for music. Using Bluetooth there is a delay when paired to my FireTV between the picture and sound. Just enough to be annoying. It does have a headphone jack and using that removes the delay.

Biggest issue is that there is a hum in the audio if you leave it in to change and want to play music. Source of Bluetooth or direct does not matter. Works fine with good sound when not plugged in. So if you are wanting to keep it plugged in find something else. If you are going to be running off of the battery this is a fine pick

It is so compact and the rose color is just so elegant and cute ! The sound is actually pretty good for the size and fills my classroom ,I bought it for that reason so it does work out . I can connect my laptop for presentations and videos . Battery life so far so good and I like that I can charge it while I‚Äôm using it to play via USB , I am super pleased and my students love it too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Just what i was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I only received this a few days ago but I was amazed at the size. It is small but I can hear clearly what's on the speaker. I mostly got it for listening to audiobooks. I hate to have earphones on all the time so I wanted something with a speaker for my phone. This will work perfectly and its rechargeable. The pairing with my phone was very simple I was worried about that but I shouldn't have worried.

Love the size. Color is great too. I got the rose gold. I wish the battery lasted a bit longer, but I have the ability to plug it in at work where I use it most, so it‚Äôs not a huge deal for me. I have also bought a few for gifts. Would buy again.

THIS is truly an amazing product. My husband attempted to break it but he only ruined our dresser. It still works...even he can't believe It! Best product of its kind. I love it and take it everywhere with Me!

1. The speaker was delivered in time? Yes
2. Was the package lack of accessories? No
3. Does the speaker works well or not ? Works amazing
4. For most of small speakers,its keys are located on the bottom of the speaker ,every time you need to pick up the speaker to operate,this speaker using smart touch screen technology and the keys are located on the top of the speaker, easy to operate. what do you think after using it ? do you like this touch design ? Yes it awesome
5. Using slim size and Built-in 1000Mah Li-battery, what do you think of its portability and playtime? Portability is great. So far playtime is great to but havent played it till it died yet .
Love it and the quality is perfect
Hella loud, hella long battery life. 11/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewTitle: Super long playtime with just a short amount of charge and amazing playback
reviews.reviewText:
I really like the speaker! It is small, compact and it has a great sound! It is absolutely great value for the price! Occasionally the sound will stutter but a simple shut down and restart, the sound would be great again.
It has a super long playtime with just a short amount of charge, and the Bluetooth buttons on the top are also very great! Also the customer service has also been wonderful! Overall, I would rate this 10/10!

This product came in very late. I was so excited to receive this item but when I saw it in the package I was upset. it‚Äôs a very cheap product. The white base at the bottom is not supported , and the sound quality is a lot (if not all) static. The sound comes from the bottom of the speaker which muffles the sound even more. I think it‚Äôs unfair to have wasted my money on a speaker that doesn‚Äôt work the best
Primarily it has very poor sound quantities. It was difficult to pair with my devices. Used it a few times but is just collecting dust as something that was too good to be true.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great buy for your money!
reviews.reviewText: I like the color and the portability of the speaker. Also, having the controls on the top make it handy to change to the next, or last, song. You can lay it on its top, bottom or side ~ that's nice. The part I'm not sure about is the sound quality, especially if it's on a hard surface ~ the quality seems to get a bit sharp. On a softer surface it seems to emit a much nicer sound.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tiny Speaker with Great Battery Life
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a bluetooth speaker for my desktop computer so I wouldn't have to deal with more cables cluttering my already-crowded desk. This is perfect - it's so small that it was easy to find a place for it next to my monitor and I've had no trouble getting the bluetooth to connect. It also turns on quickly and automatically pairs. It even automatically turns off to save battery when it's not being used, which is great for me (I keep forgetting to turn it off).

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice auditory experience in a small package
reviews.reviewText: I actually love this product. My echo Dot is in the living room and I brought my xLeader Bluetooth speaker into the bedroom and it continued playing without missing a heartbeat. I am not sure it's maximum distance capability to work, but I was impressed with the large sound in such a small package. And I am hard of hearing so this device enhances my total experience, making me consider enrolling music unlimited with Amazon.
this little speaker gets the job done! I ordered it to take with me to the hospital so there can be music in the room during my labor and deliver.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not spend 1 penny on this
reviews.reviewText: This item worked the first day after I opened it then it wouldn't charge or cut on! I never damage the item. Worst of all the seller would never contact me back so now I must file a claim. It's not worth it. It's too many other devices that will work better

reviews.reviewTitle: Little speaker packs a big punch!
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about the speaker. I thought having the speaker on the bottom would take away from the quality of sound but I hardly notice any difference. It‚Äôs very sleek and I like the touch buttons and the blue lights. It came on time and the packaging had all the needed cords/accessories (including a cute bag to tote my speaker around in). Battery is great. Overall I‚Äôm extremely satisfied!

I bought this for my 10 and 12 year old daughters. They use them everyday. I especially liked the gold and rose gold finishes. The sound that comes from these little speakers is more than I had expected. The sound is clear. I wish they were designed a little better as the speaker is on the bottom and the sound quality is better if I turn the speaker over. Overall, I am really impressed with this purchase. My girls love them. The battery last for days on end.

It is very cute and portable (and matches my iPhone! Lol) it's ok for the price. But you do get what you pay for. It doesn't last long if not plugged in (even after charging all night) and if you like rap music as much as I do, I would pay more for something else. Rap music doesn't sound great on this speaker, the bass doesn't come through and if you turn it up too high it sounds a little muffled. Other music has ok sound quality. It's fine for the price, but in hindsight I kind of wish I'd payed a little more for something else.

I bought 12 of them for Christmas gifts..This baby has a very good range so one can carry it around the house.and listen favorite music while a phone is charging. It is s pretty powerful, looking classy and quality of sound is really good. There is nothing negative I could say about this speaker. You can also pick a color and all of them look fantastic.

Speaker is incredible. Sound is very crisp. The only reason for 4 stars in the sound rating was the bass quality. In a speaker this size a resonant bass is not possible. I charged it once and have been using it every morning for about an hour all week! Very user friendly. My music source is my computer and I use the speaker all over our home.It works well in our bedroom that is in the opposite end of our home. Something that a speaker I purchased earlier for more than $100 couldn‚Äôt do. This speaker does everything that I hoped it would. It is an incredible buy.

This little thing is a power house of sound, I'm so impressed with it. When I'm throwing pottery in the studio ( which is large) this little rock star can turn up too loud , it can fill the whole studio!! I make better pots to loud musicüòâ and loud is not distorted, so , very pleased with my very first bluetooth speaker, especially after comparing it to my daughters which has poor batter life and much poorer soud quality and was much more costly.
It packed a big punch for a small footprint. I love that it‚Äôs really portable and there are great cases you.can get for travel.

Love the style & sound. I use it mainly to listen to Podcasts & they come through clearly & with enough volume to listen from across a large room. The only negative comment I have is regarding the instructions. Not only did they make the setup process seem complicated, they didn‚Äôt make sense. I figured out how to set it up on my own & it was SO simple!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not quite what I was expecting
reviews.reviewText: I loved the style. I wasn't quite happy with the sound quality. It also came with a couple of dings in it. ‚òπÔ∏è I ordered another speaker from another company to see which one was the best. The other speaker won hands down! And with NO dings. Even the case I ordered for this one seemed to have been used. I'm guessing Amazon repackaged it from another return and I was the lucky recipient. I'm returned this speaker and case today.

reviews.reviewTitle: Booming sound at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife to play music for her brother in a nursing home as he loves music. I purchased another speaker to hook up to her phone but the sound was just OK. This thing has a microSD "and" the ability to hook up to the phone, it also BOOMS! Her brother sings along now and with a brain injury that's a gift. I am buying another for us!!

I received it today. So far it sounds good from my cell phone. We will see how it
does when I have to use it for audio during interview playbacks.

UPDATE: so, it plays back fantastic from the audio recording from my phone. It is clear and I didn't hear movement in the background. Awesome!!!

I'm not sure about battery life. Used it for 2 or 3 hour Haven't used it again. I bought it so I can hear movies on my tablet. Haven't dropped it and probably won't so no easy to answer that. My only complaint is you only have a minute or two warning before it dies. But really like it.

My 21 year old truck radio stopped working and I didn‚Äôt want to spend the money for a new radio. When I found this speaker I realized I could use the speaker by hooking my cell phone to the speaker to play music. The speaker sounds good and has a good volume. For the price of the speaker it saved me money and if the truck breaks down I can then use the speaker on other devices. I gave battery life 4 stars because it is still on the first charge.
I gave the

I love this speaker. I bought the Zosam but the lights were too distracting. I primarily use it to watch movies on my ipad in bed in the dark. However it's so portable I pair it with my phone and take it into the loo when I am getting ready. The sound is clear and loud. It even fits into my clutch which is great if I wanna take it with me to a hotel or on vacation. best money i ever spent.

This is a sturdy product that is great for basic use. Listening to music for any length of time would become tiresome. I use it with iPhone for old radio programs and news. Music is ok but sound quality is slightly better than an old-school transistor radio. That said, it is cheap and worth the money. Use it at home and for travel

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Sound, Compact in Size, Top Keys
reviews.reviewText: Rose gold is gorgeous, the sound is impressive in comparison to some larger devices, and it pairs with my Alcatel Idol 4s phone, Surface Pro 3 laptop, & Nuvision tablet. Size is just right-pocket or small purse-; even better is the carrying case purchased separately which comes with a clip-on. All buttons are on top a plus with the exception of the power button. Battery life is great.

First off: kudos to you for your excellent shipping speed! Estimated delivery landed on the week following the order date, and yet it was delivered in two days? Incredible and exceptional! Many points there!

As for the product, it's a ~$15 portable Bluetooth speaker. It does exactly what it says on the tin. Is the audio quality going to knock your socks off? Not at all. Does it play audio that is easy to understand and follow, without skips or crackling? Yes! It is a simple, cheap speaker that I will happily keep around for as long as it is willing to stay.

Also, it is pink, and there is a little voice that goes off when I connect, disconnect, and power off. I have named her Louise. We are best friends now.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker, ordered a second one after the first one was such a hit!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one of these as a last minute Christmas present. I was so impressed with the quality of the sound and ease of seeing it up, that I ordered a second one for another person! These are great speakers! I don't know about battery length and durability yet since we have just started using them, but I have been satisfied with the sound, cost, and shipping.

I received the gold edition one yesterday it came fast but it was Strached up on the front bottons, the sound quality is very bad, and it lags behind when you‚Äôre watching a video, so the words don‚Äôt match up with the video :(

reviews.reviewTitle: This model should be used with an aux cable to watch videos.
reviews.reviewText: I love this model of Bluetooth speaker. This is the second one I‚Äôve ordered now and I am still using the first one from a year ago. My fianc√© needed one so I got him one too, but this is also the second time I got a faulty auxiliary cable. The speaker itself is great aside from using it to listen to a video without an aux cable, because the words won‚Äôt match up with the mouths. It‚Äôs really loud and works for hours after being charged. I use this with my tablet to watch videos while I‚Äôm doing dishes or cleaning up the house. If you are like me and you just need your tablet or phone to be a lot louder than it‚Äôs internal factory installed speakers, then this is the speaker for you. If your wanting a speaker that will bump, then you‚Äôre not looking for this type of Bluetooth speaker, and you need to look into a model that has a sub woofer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for brown noise, tinny for music or video purposes.
reviews.reviewText:
Mediocre sound quality but I purchased this to play brown noise while sleeping, for which purpose it is excellent. Small size sits on my nightstand unobtrusively and the lights on top automatically shut off on a timer. Great for my purposes but tinny if you're looking for something to play music or movies with.

For my purposes as a sleep aid it's excellent, but I had to knock off two stars due to mediocre audio quality for other uses than sleeping or audiobooks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect speaker except a tiny problem...
reviews.reviewText:
It is a really good speaker for this price.

Pros:
- Good sound quality
- The touch buttons are really sensitive and no delay
- Palm size & easy to put in your bag
- Easy to set up
- Good pricing
- 10+ hours of battery life

Cons:
- The next and prev buttons works inversely. I had to rotate it 90 degree in order to not to confuse :)
- it has approximately 20% pairing problem with Samsung S8

I'm a podcast addict and I need volume buttons & media controllers in order to skip ads. This is a perfect chose for me even if the small conflict.
I contacted with the support for the prev/next problem. I'll keep you updated.

reviews.reviewTitle: Husband loved it so much he made me buy another one.
reviews.reviewText:
Love this!! This little thing puts out some sound!!! In fact, my husband loved it so much, he insisted I get one for him, too!
It is perfect in the car when you can't find a radio station, you can just play your own music. And the sound quality is GREAT!!
It does it‚Äôs job and sounds good. No complaints at all. Have had it on for three (8 hour) work days and the battery still hasn‚Äôt died. I‚Äôm happy with it so far.

Really wanted this to work well but after using it over a month it started getting ‚Äòglitchy‚Äô not connecting with my iPhone or my Amazon Fire 8 tablet anymore. I‚Äôve reset it several times and it would work then when I have to shut down my devices for a time it wouldn‚Äôt connect, nor are my devices even seeing it. Sad because I bought it for my birthday. üò¢
Love this I bought it to use in my office for background music. So far it works great! I keep it connected so I‚Äôm not sure how great the battery is. Perfect size

reviews.reviewTitle: Really nice sound boost for the size and cost.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 12 for my fundraiser guest gifts. All are pleased with the performance.
I've been listening to the sound on this speaker for 2 days, it's awesome! Crisp, clear and loud!

I love this speaker. I pair it with my phone to listen to all of my downloaded music. I leave my phone in one room and walk from room to room with the speaker listening to music as I clean house or work on my crafts. The sound is great. I haven't found anything to dislike. Great little speaker.

Love it. It's very loud. It is cute. Sync's well with my phone. Only issue it has a design flaw. To hear the sound good it has to lay on the part where you push the buttons for operations and when you do that it may pause the sound. The operation buttons should probably be on the side. I purchased two by mistake, may give one as a gift.

reviews.reviewTitle: No bass sound, but that‚Äôs what I wanted.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a speaker for my iPad to watch movies. I didn‚Äôt want a lot of bass as then it‚Äôs too hard to understand the words on the movies. This speaker will be perfect for my purposes but if you want to use it to listen to music I wouldn‚Äôt purchase it. The sound is crisp and clear but without bass I would hate it for music.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality, value and price BUT don‚Äôt expect understandable instructions.
reviews.reviewText: Generally a very good value with good audio quality and excellent build and features. Easy pairing to an iPhone. BUT be prepared for the incomprehensible instructions - they give ‚Äúpidgeon English‚Äù a bad name! Make sure to hold center power button for several seconds to turn on. After that the audio cues MAY help, otherwise: trial & error!

This little speaker is great! Its loud only problem is that I connected it to my Alexa fire tablet and every 30 minutes or so it tell me its connected and pairing, that becomes annoying especially when I use it to stay connected to tablet, when I ask Alexa to do something and she does it, it easier to hear her because the speaker on the tablet doesn't fill the room. That's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.

The item was delivered quickly (next day) and came with everything described. It also came with a carrying case, which is really convenient to carry inside my purse. As for the speaker sound quality, I do flip it upside down for better quality because it sounds muffled sitting the normal way. The amount of volume is awesome though, for the price! I also like the touchscreen controls, work very well. As for battery life, I haven‚Äôt used it enough that the battery died but it does seem to have a very good battery life. Will update review if anything changes! But very good quality for the price!
I am VERY HAPPY with this Bluetooth speaker. I‚Äôm using it right now! I use it in the car by placing it on the dashboard, so it sounds like the actual car speakers while playing my phone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the job done without breaking the bank.
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this speaker to replace one whose battery supply no longer functioned. I really dig how small and compact it is in comparison to the one I had, it comes with a nifty little carry case so you can take it with you pretty easily.

Small enough to fit into a backpack, a purse, even a pocket. The sound quality is pretty good, though it doesn't compare to AAA offerings. I pretty much just use it when I workout, or im doing something in a room and I want some tunes.

Tbe battery life is not impressive, Im getting about 3 hours per charge, but for ease of use, portability, and good sound quality at a very attractive pricepoint makes this a quality speaker

reviews.reviewTitle: Hollow sound with too much treble
reviews.reviewText: Its nice and loud but sounds hollow with too much treble; maybe I can change that with an equalizer. For 13 bucks the Simthings is half the size with a surprising range of bass and treble that sounds more natural. I will keep the speaker because I can play podcasts or radio loud enough to hear over the noise at work; or low enough for it to sound more natural.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: I think the reviews of this thing are mostly bogus. While the sound quality is decent the battery life is CRAP. The blue light flashes constantly which, if I'm listening at night with lights off, is completely distracting and annoying. So now I mostly leave it plugged in but even then it randomly cuts out. I do not recommend. Lesson learned.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: It's a cheap speaker. I wasn't looking for anything extravagant, just something louder than my phone. And that's exactly what it is. It gets the job done, but don't think it's this amazing high quality speaker. The skip/pause buttons are a little delayed with my Spotify. I've also noticed if I flip it upside down the sound quality is much better.
I must say that I love this little speaker! It is small with lots of clear sound & charges quick! I also love how quick the Bluetooth connects to my phone! Most definitely will recommend to others
Great little speaker. Sound is clear and it projects well. Can't beat it for the price. The seller shipped right away and ensured it was packaged correctly for safe travel.

I really love this little speaker. It has great sound and is very easy to take with you. The best feature of this speaker is that there is a slot for an sd card so you can take your music with you anywhere you go. It also has big sound for a little speaker. Great customer service. I contacted them and they responded promptly.
The only downside is that you have to be very careful with the buttons, they are very sensitive. I would buy it again.

This is a really nice speaker. It sounds a bit muffled but I am assuming this is due to the placement of the speakers. Great color and I love that it is so portable. The touch does work well. I would have loved it more if the sound did not sound muffled. I will try to use something to raise it up more. It may help.
This little speaker is packed with power! It is easy to move from room to room and the sound quality is great!

i just received the bluetooth speaker and paired it to my iphone. i played Coldplay and turned it up all the way to see how loud it would go. i was shocked on how loud it got. i was startled on the volume level. beyond what i expected. sound quality, it's a small speaker so the bass is not going to be room rattling by any means. I am impressed...five stars.

Reviewing after two months use! At first it was great, easily connected to any Bluetooth, great volume, great battery life. Two months in it won't connect to any Bluetooth device, it can't even be found when sitting right next to my phone.

Spend a little more money on something better!!

I am not.
1. The sound is so so, the volume is not impressive either
2. Put it on the flat surface facing up, the sound is... weird, like from AM radio.
3. Facing down generates more natural sound.
4. Disconnect occasionally with Samsung galaxy S8 and S8+ when facing down, strange...
5. Can pair with only one device, had to remove it from my S8+ in order to connect to my wife's S8

Wife teaches the 2nd grade and she needs a light weight speaker in her class, this works for her.

I really wanted to love this. It's such a pretty little thing, and well designed as far as the user interface goes...I had zero troubles pairing it with my android phone, and the battery life is frankly awesome. The audio cues for pairing and power off/on might be annoying to some, but for me were a nice surprise, as one member of my family is blind and this helps her out a lot. Sadly, the sound is pretty awful...very tinny, with no real bass to speak of, even when using my phone's equalizer setting. It's a real shame, because otherwise it would be a truly awesome little gizmo.

reviews.reviewTitle: amazing product, even more amazing customer service
reviews.reviewText: Great product! Use it in all of my kid's rooms for a noise machine. The company responded to all my requests and questions. Couldn't be happier. It travels easily as well. I also loaded my kid's favorite music on these devices and they use them to toggle back and forth through their favorite songs. No more waking mom and dad up in the middle of the night! Even my toddlers can use them independently.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Sound from a little speaker
reviews.reviewText: I love the rose gold color on this speaker. The design and touch functions are a great look and feel. The reason for only 4 stars is that even though this speaker puts out loud sounds at times it sounds muffled depending on what you have it sitting on due to the speaker being on the bottom. To bad the touch features couldn‚Äôt go around the sides and the speaker be on top.

I purchased this because of the reviews but honestly this item is no good as far as sound quality goes. The controls are good and Bluetooth set up is a breeze but the bass is non-existent and the high end is tinny. Phone speaker is a better option. My incling was to flip it over, sounds a bit better then...as a last resort

I bought this for my home office. It's great to be able to place this on my coffee table and play music from my laptop without worrying about tripping over wires. One USB charge seems to last forever. Easily paired with my MacBook and allows me to steam sound from Spotify.

This speaker is small and very portable but don't let that fool you. This speaker has really good sound quality and can get LOUD!! Very satisfied with it and it's perfect for when I'm outside working on my car and want to listen to music while I work.

I love this little speaker and really cannot recommend it highly enough. It is loud and clear, compact and easily portable, and connects seamlessly to other devices (I have used it with my Macbook, iPad, and iPhone). I love the rose gold color, and it is very intuitive and easy to use. I am also shocked by how inexpensive it is! It is really exceptional quality especially at this price point. Don't hesitate to buy this; you will not be disappointed!
excellent in sound, functionality, control buttons, appearance and style.all around an excellent little speaker with superb design

I recently join the Iphone gang and the bluetooth I owned previously is only for android products. Being unabel to connect with my 8 plus I was forced to order another. This speaker exceeded my expectations. I first heard it playing by another owner and when I took notice to the sound quality and the battery life I had to order one. Very satisfied !

This little device can make tables vibrate when its at its maximum volume. This sucker is LOUD! Battery life is also amazing! I can take it with me when I do my afternoon work and I don't think I have ever had it die on me and my afternoon work usually lasts 3-4 hours!

reviews.reviewTitle: Yes, you're sure you want this one!
reviews.reviewText:
This little guy is amazing. I had the 808 cans, and was impressed, but it broke due to droppage so I needed a new bluetooth speaker. This thing surpasses the 808, at a cheaper price point and smaller size. Plus, it has controls, and they're right on top, for easy use.
I can't get over the quality of this sound! My son, a musician, was even impressed!

I am very happy with this speaker. I like that I can use an SD card directly so I don‚Äôt have to connect my phone if I don‚Äôt want to.

The buttons are a small problem when I pick up the speaker sometimes I press the buttons when I don‚Äôt want to.

Also, I like to bike with my speakers, it would be nicer if I hade a place to attach a D ring or something like that.

The battery life seems good when using the SD card as I haven‚Äôt had to recharge yet.

Pros: sounds good, getting music out of it is plug-and-play

Cons: you have to put it on its side to hear it clearly (so controlling it will make it fall over) and there's no shuffle function, so you have to keep pressing the forward button if you don't like the song

Love everything about this speaker so far. Super easy to use, light weight, comes with a bag for traveling or whatever. My only complaint is the sound. Not enough base. Sounds better when turned upside down

I love this product I bought it for my new job. I work at sephoras warehouse and they allow music while you work. However they don't allow headphones or phones or devices with cameras.. So I have my ipod that I can connect to this speaker and it has amazing sound quality. When an embarrassing song Comes on all I have to do it barely tap the very sensitive buttons and it'll stop it and turn the volume down very fast. Long story short it's pretty cool. I like it a lot.

I bought this little speaker for my office. I love the size, ease of use and the sound. I haven't played it long enough to comment on the battery life. It comes with a little pouch to hold the speaker and cables. I'm thinking of getting another one to throw in my travel bag.

Going from a Google Home to this is disappointing. The sound that comes out of the speaker almost hurts my ears at certain times depending on the song I guess? I haven't used it for more than a day but I'm not sure I can tolerate it? Pairs very easily and is CUTE... looks good on my desk and the buttons work easily.

Package was delivered on time. Came with all accessories. It's a good size, the sound is good for the price I paid. A few times I had trouble pairing it with my devices (which is why I gave it 3 stars), but after a few restarts of turning bluetooth on/off and the speaker off/on, it worked fine. It didn't always auto-shut off consistently. Battery life was great- at least a week of using before needed a charge. For the price though, it gets the job done and it's a decent sounding little speaker.

Simple and easy to use. The sound is just right for bedrooms and bathrooms. For the price, it‚Äôs great. The only annoying thing is that it talks to you when you turn it on and when it powers off. If not being used, it will suddenly say ‚Äúpowering off‚Äù in this woman‚Äôs voice which is terrifying.

Yeah it's cheap. Yeah it's fast in arriving. It will play your music for about an hour. Then for the next hour, it will constantly interrupt your music to tell you "Low Battery." Then it shuts off. It takes longer to charge than it will play for. Horrible.

Loved this speaker as soon as it came! It arrived in 2 days which was pretty unexpected since I dknt have prime. It works so well and is so cute. This speaker last for so long without needing to be charged and the sound is great! I love the color and the fact that it is tiny and portable! My only complaint is not about the speaker but that about after a week the seller sent me an email asking to write them a review which I ignored. Then a week later they sent a second email asking to write a review which I also ignored. Then again 2 weeks later they sent another email asking me to write them a review which i am doing right now. Would've given 5 stars if they hadn't kept emailing me.

I'm sorry folks, but this is not a good sounding speaker. Actually, it's a bad sounding speaker. I bought this for a friend and I'll just say that it sounds one notch higher than my phone speaker. Best thing I can say is that it's pretty. That has no appeal to me. This is going back! I'd advise anyone who thinks this has a good sound to listen to another one... ANY other one. I count on other people's reviews and I based my decision on those reviews. I'm so disappointed that I wasted my time and effort on this thing.

This is a minor detail but it may be worth mentioning that device has an English-speaking female voice with an accent (Chinese I'm assuming).

Regarding sound quality, I had realistic expectations and honestly wanted something that was better than using just my phone at least with the volume up. This exceeded those expectations... im very pleased. I've also used it as a speaker phone for calls and it sounded OK to outside callers.

It‚Äôs the size and weight of a hockey puck. The battery life is decent and so is the sound quality. Sometimes the sounds come out muffled but it probably has something to do with the speakers being on the bottom of it. It‚Äôs easy to set up and pair with your phone. When I turn it on it automatic pairs with my phone.
This is a perfect Bluetooth speaker for my desktop. I use it to listen to podcasts and audio books.
Aside from the Ihome products that I have, this is my 2nd purchase of this type of portable speaker and is A GREAT product. It's better than the 4 cover that I just got in volume and bass.

I am happy with this speaker. And the team of Leaderway USA so helpful. I ordered black speaker and after I did my order I realized that there are different colors and because I am a big fan for pink I tried to change my order to pink one but they replied the order already in delivery now but don't worry we will send you the pink one and keep the two speakers with you. And really I received the pink one but not one two and they told me you don't need to return any. Enjoy with all of them. I am so happy with my speaker I use it during my cooking to listen to what I love.
Thank you Leaderway.

Love the style and sound quality from this little beauty! My only dislike you that the speaker is on the bottom, but I guess that adds to the aesthetic. I was looking to replace an old Bluetooth speaker of mine that was over 10 years old, and this knocks it out of the park. Highly recommend for those looking for a sleek but loud speaker solution for their home or on the go.
Very pretty rose golden color, tiny, easy to travel with. Great quality, nice voice

So far, so good! Not only is this speaker small and compact, it has pretty decent sound for its size. It pairs easily with my phone, and after the first full charge, still going strong. I liked mine so much that I ordered another one for my husband, who was jealous of mine! Customer service has been attentive and concerned with my satisfaction with this product, which is nice. It‚Äôs refreshing to be asked personally what I think of their product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to pair with my devices and is on the ...
reviews.reviewText: Small and portable. Exceptional quality of sound and exceeded my expectation. Easy to pair with my devices and is on the cutting edge of technology. I highly recommend this product.

I‚Äôve had this for almost a month and I‚Äôve only had to charge it up when I first opened it. I use it in my great room downstairs, and the sound really fills the space. Just what I was looking for in order to have a little background noise without going in for a major sound system or intrusive listening device.
The sound on this thing is terrible!! It does work but it has zero bass and sounds like it‚Äôs coming from inside a tin can. I should have returned it.

Bluetooth mode is good. The micro-SD card mode, however, is exactly what I wanted. It cycles automatically and also remembers when it last stopped playing. The battery is excellent and the illuminated buttons are intuitive and easy to use.

I bought this for my daughter, then bought a different speaker for myself... I'm totally jealous of the purchase I made for her... I spent twice as much on mine as I did for her's and this little, tiny, cheap speaker. Mine has 4x the wattage and pails in comparison.

It's just as others have said, it doesn't get very loud, so plan to use it in a relatively quiet environment. That means a lot from someone like me who does not crank up the music. The button lights don't stay on, so, I found that frustrating. I returned it.

I‚Äôm very happy with this little speaker. It‚Äôs very loud and sound quality is good. Battery life is good and it comes with a little case which is nice to keep it protected while it‚Äôs in my bag. I use it at home and work for music and podcasts. I will probably buy another one so I can leave one home and one at work.

This is a nice speaker, sound is decent - I'm listening to audio books though with it, not music. The only problem I've had is sometimes when I first turn it on the audio is garbled, it usually clears up in a few seconds and I just rewind to hear what I've missed.
Great little speaker for the price. I'm extremely satisfied with it.

Worse speaker l ever had. It won‚Äôt charge, it won‚Äôt pair with my iPad, and now it won‚Äôt come on. I admit I shelved it for a few months because I was impatient with it. I decided to try it again today and it won‚Äôt charge or come on. I picked this because it had good reviews but the one I have is a dud.

So I‚Äôve been looking for in expensive portable speaker for a while now, and when I came across this I was read the product reviews and thought ‚Äúwhy not‚Äù. And I‚Äôm glad I took a chance a purchased it. The sound quality is nice and clear and, the touch screen aspect is nice and sensitive so I don‚Äôt feel like I have to jam my finger to get it to change songs. And it‚Äôs rose gold lol, so it‚Äôs cute.

Works great. Make sure you hold the on button for "3 seconds" for it to come on. Then make sure the headphone jacks are not plugged in when you want Bluetooth on your phone to find the device. Once support helped me with those 2 things, it was easy and I highly recommend!

Easy to set up! Connects In seconds. In order to charge it, just connect to your phone or tablet charger. The sound quality is amazing. Small but very mighty and I would highly recommend this one! It came with all of the accessories with a nice box, packaged well. Love the rose gold!

reviews.reviewTitle: When someone calls, the speaker announces the name. Not sure I like that feature.
reviews.reviewText: I like the size of the Bluetooth speaker, small like a hockey puck. The sound is okay, but I can‚Äôt rate it yet, I‚Äôm using it at work for patience whom images take 12-15 minutes under my gamma camera, so I keep it low to avoid disturbing other patients in nearby rooms. But, it‚Äôs easy to use and very portable. I am happy with the purchase, thus far. I‚Äôll update in a week or two after I have had more time to use the speaker outside of my work atmosphere.

reviews.reviewTitle: The sound is equivalent to the cost
reviews.reviewText:
From our perspective, the sound was really inadequate. The device is lightweight, indicative of a small coil magnet which directly impacts ability of the speaker to produce sound.

However, given the cost of the little speaker, the sound was what should be expected.

This will be a nice gift for our 5 year old granddaughter.

I bought this to use at work. It connects to bluetooth easily. It is easy to use. It can be turned up quite loud, which is nice. The sound quality is good, although I have not tested it at full volume. I like that it is made of metal, not cheap plastic, so it seems fairly durable. I have only used it once, so far, though, so time will tell. I also like the size, as it fits in the pocket of my scrubs. There was a similar one advertised which is even smaller, but that one is plastic, which is why I chose the larger one. So far I am happy with this purchase.
I love my new Bluetooth speaker. It's amazingly loud and clear and I love the choice of color the seller offers. For the price, the product works wonderful exactly as advertised .

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a great personal speaker
reviews.reviewText: When you want to listen to music for just you but without a headphone, this is the perfect speaker. Not too loud it is just right. You get to just wrap yourself into your favorite songs using this. I love it!

I bought this to replace a speaker at my desk for the office. The battery life is very short. It needs to be charged 2x a week, the previous one went a full week plus before re-charging. Sound is ok but again, I just use it for background music at work.
Great little speaker. Only problem is the speaker is on the bottom so I have to put it on its side to hear it.

I loved this speaker at first. The sound quality for a $15.99 speaker was good. Battery life wasn‚Äôt excellent but it was decent. Now I‚Äôve had this thing since the end of February 2019 (so barely 3 months) and the battery craps out after about 20 minutes. Not impressed and would not recommend purchasing.

reviews.reviewTitle: exactly what i was looking for
reviews.reviewText: the speaker is exactly what I was looking for. wireless, portable. Bluetooth but also has connectivity to audio input and even a memory chip. the touch -buttons are a bit of a learning curve - I kept picking it up and forgetting about the button's sensitivity.

The speaker is attractive, easy to use, and seems pretty well made. In fact it is pretty loud and sounds good, until you put it down that is. The speaker is on the bottom! When you place it down the sound quality changes significantly. What a design bust! We still use it, but we place it on its side or upside down.

Great features and very portable with a great design. My only problem is I can't here the sound, just not loud enough. Not even taking outside, but at my desk......this one just does not work for me. Will find a kid in the neighborhood to give tooooo. Sorry!

So glad I found this. Easily paired with both of my phones. It is indeed loud. It's cute and portable. I love the bag it came with as well. Battery life has been GREAT! The customers at my job think I have a boom box when it's just this little cute pink speaker.

Received this beautiful little wireless speaker today. It is well made and stunning in the rose gold. It was very easy to connect to my phone and the sounds is excellent. Can‚Äôt beat it for the price paid!

reviews.reviewTitle: sounds fine, looks good, and my mom is happy with it
reviews.reviewText: Got for mom as a gift and she loves it. she likes the pretty rose color, as she says. Connects easily, and sounds fine. good physical arrangement, and battery life is good... maybe about 10-12 hrs before needing a charge.

reviews.reviewTitle: reviews were deceiving, poor sound quality
reviews.reviewText: Iwas honestly expecting so much more out of this speaker. The portability is honestly the greatest thing about it. But due to the sound quality if I had to suggest it to anyone else. I would say not worth 20 bucks. I read the reviews multiple times different occasions before deciding to purchase. And sounded like such an epic buy and was utterly let down.. I would not. If I were to suggest to anyone else

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for the price and size.
reviews.reviewText: I have only been using this for a day. For its size and price it is beyond expectations. I use it for listening to music while resting, doing light chores, etc. It is easy to pair, charge and use. It won't fill one's room with sound, but it fits in one's palm. Sound is clear. I haven't tried it for calls yet.

I bought this 3 months ago, not complaints. I love it, the sound is clear and high, the battery lasts a looot. I connected by Bluetooth to any devices and also with the cable on my computer. Its very portable for the size and the touch panel is very useful. I would buy more units for gifts.

Product works great, I can hear it about 10-15ft away clearly in the kitchen when it is on max volume and my phone is on max volume but below the orange part. That is over top of a ventilation fan, dishwasher, metal dinging and an extra air circulation fan as well. Connecting is easy with the voice-response on turn-on and turn-off. Automatically turns itself off if not connected after awhile in case you forget to turn it off after disconnecting.

When I initially purchased this small saucer speaker it was intended only for a temp speaker until I move again. Because of the low price I expected it to be lousy or to die out on me in 3 months. The battery life on this thing is remarkable. It can play for 6-8 hours straight. Not much bass coming from this but its perfect for listening to podcast, watching movies and even a short music playlist while you are in the shower. Great for traveling as well. No pairing issues whatsoever. Great product.

I use the blue tooth feature of it to connect to my laptop and play video from a DVD or video file. The sound is very good. I have not check out other features of this product yet, because I have no need for it.

The speaker itself works fine however the fast forward and replay buttons are backwards. It‚Äôs also touch screen instead of actual buttons. I spent way to much time trying to figure out why the buttons are switched. The seller has contacted me three times for a review so here it is. It sucks.

Honestly this speaker is so cute - it actually looks expensive for the price! I like the pink color and the capability to pause or change songs on the speaker and the battery life is good. The appearance is an A+. The sound quality on the other hand..... not so much. Best way to describe it is when you don‚Äôt have a speaker and you resort to putting your phone in a cup to project the sound...that is exactly what this speaker sounds like!! There‚Äôs no other way to put it. I have a small apartment and I don‚Äôt even like turning it on when I have guests. I would‚Äôve returned it but not worth the hassle. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend it.

Bought this to take on an upcoming trip to Ireland. I love it. I've used it quite a bit already, not long enough to test the battery life though. I bought the metalic pink one with a case. It was easy to link up, even for an old tech impaired gal like me. The sound is great for it's size, and I have found that if I rest it lightly in the case instead of hard surface I get an even better sound with more bass. For the price I am very happy with this sweet little speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Designed for Looks, Not for Function
reviews.reviewText: When I paired the speaker with my computer, I was disappointed with the quality of the sound. Well, wait... the speaker is on the bottom, where the feet are. Flip it over and it sounds about average for this price range of speaker - fairly good, not great. But, by doing this, you lose access to volume as well as forward/backward buttons. The only feasible way to optimally use this speaker would be to have a stand to hold it on its side. It looks fairly nice -- but I didn't purchase it to admire its looks.

This small fragile little circle speaker can BLOW!!! I LOVE the sound and quality of this speaker. I've used it with my tablet, iPad, phone and laptop - this thing is PERFECT! The battery life is awesome as well. I even carry it to work with me and have my music playing low. Well, it was on the lowest setting and other people in the office were bopping to my ole skool tunes as well! I love it! I highly recommend this unit!

For how inexpensive this is, I wasn‚Äôt expecting much but it has really surprised me. It works really well. The sound quality isn‚Äôt amazing but it is good. I don‚Äôt need it to be anything spectacular but honestly I‚Äôm very impressed with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: SO MUCH BETTER THEN THE PRICE THEY ARE SELLING IT FOR.
reviews.reviewText:
I got this speaker for my Husband. He loves it. He works in a warehouse on a forklift all day long. So the old speaker that he had just didn't have the power to geet the sound out there. But this new oe works over time. Wwe aare planing on getting another one very soon.

He just loves it!

This is a great speaker for the price. It's tiny and super loud; however, the speaker is on the bottom so in order to get the best sound quality I recommend sitting it on its side as it seems to not work well when it's sitting upside down. Would def recommend!

I spent time trying to figure out this unit. The unit‚Äôs English user‚Äôs manual is poor at best and is almost impossible to use. Whoever developed this user‚Äôs manual clearly did not know English. On the other hand, the unit was easy enough to use that using it without a manual was acceptable.

This speaker is very easy to use, portable, chargeable. It‚Äôs about the size of a hockey puck. The sound isn‚Äôt exactly top quality, but it‚Äôs not bad. It‚Äôs very good for my purposes in the classroom. For the price, I‚Äôm very happy with it.

I just use this around the apartment and it‚Äôs not bad. Could be a little louder but honestly, it‚Äôs small. So the sound is good for the size of it. Worth the investment and it cracks me up that she‚Äôs British sounding. Took a bit to pair it because I didn‚Äôt really see which one I was supposed to pair it to, was an odd name. But once I clicked on it, BAM. Paired. Every time.
I am hard of hearing and found that most speakers were not loud enough, this one was amazing , now Apple saying that it won‚Äôt pair with my Iphone and the problem is the speaker not my phone

reviews.reviewTitle: stays on forever and keeps my cats company
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised to return home and see that this bluetooth speaker had managed to stay on and connected to my ipad. It also stayed on (and unconnected) that night because I forgot to turn it off. So the battery life is really great and the connectivity is solid. i hate leaving my cats in the silence.
It's a good speaker for music. But, it is out is out of sync with the tv sound. Do not have this problem with my other speakers.
