This speaker is wonderful. Very loud, great sound quality, and easy to use.
The only kind of issue it has is that the speaker itself is on the bottom while the controls are on the top. When the control are facing up, and the speaker is on the bottom, the sound quality drops dramatically. So I just keep it on it‚Äôs top.

I really like the speaker in all ways but the sound when it‚Äôs turned up can be really tinny and hurts my ears. The controls are easy to use, it travels well, it stays in place in the car, the battery lasts forever, it‚Äôs decent sounding when it‚Äôs half volume or less but it can pierce a ear at full volume!

I'm only 2 days in use of it and I love it. The sound is great for a tiny little thing, it's also got some weight to it which I love. Its not some cheap dinky thing.. I also reccomend not setting on anything but hard surfaces. Otherwise sound gets blocked since it comes from under the setup. Would reccomend.. also added protection plan incase anything does happen to it.. idk why people complained when they could've added that for 2-4$ extra haha

This little thing is AMAZING. first of all it looks expensive. Beautiful rose gold. The sound is amazing quality. It came right out of the box charged. I‚Äôve used it every day for over a week for maybe an hour a day and it hasn‚Äôt died yet. You can also use it for phone calls which I love and my friend said she can hear me better on the speaker than my actual phone. Buy it, it‚Äôs oerfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: I can‚Äôt hook it up to my phone
reviews.reviewText: I am over 50 years and can‚Äôt figure out how to work it.

Wow, I am amazed at this little speaker. It is awesome, and sounds awesome. For only $15, you can't beat it. Easy to operate, the buttons are right on top, and it turns off and on quickly. I bought it to take to work with me to use on my luch breaks, but it sounds so good, I also listen to it around the house, when I am cooking or cleaning.

I got this so my work partner and I could listen to music without it being straight from my computer and annoying me during phone calls. So far it's been amazing. I haven't exactly tried it out as loud as it can be, but it works fantastic at the level I need it to. As far as battery goes, I used it for two 9 hour work days and about a hour or two into the third day before needing to charge. So that's pretty awesome. For 16 bucks it's a steal ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Attractive speaker and good price. My last speaker was a Bose so it didn‚Äôt compare in sound. I wish also it would turn on without me having to press the button on it.

It sits on my desk and does not take up much room at all. Couples easily with bluetooth and helps me hear and understand the sound from my laptop. No matter how much you spend on a laptop they still include the $0.15 speakers for your enjoyment.

I love this speaker so much I want to get a second one for my computer downstairs. My apple speakers stopped working for some reason so I got this speaker. It saved the day! The sound is even more powerful than my MacBook pro was. I don't have apple care anymore so i couldn't get it fixed. I love these speakers.

This is a quality speaker for a great price easy to use great sound for a tiny thing it‚Äôs cute also üòäthe seller was very persistent in regards to my satisfaction. So don‚Äôt give any negativity a thought about this product or seller üòÆ‚ù§Ô∏è

I bought this to carry in my shirt pocket while on a walk. Unfortunately the buttons on top are very easy to push and get bumped no matter which way the buttons are pointed. It has good sound for the price though. I gave to my Wife so she can listen to books on tape.

This speaker is just okay. The speaker is on the bottom and the controls are on the top, so the sound gets muffled by whatever it‚Äôs sitting on. It‚Äôs easy to use but I feel like playing music directly from my phone without a speaker works better than this speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Which side is up? Neither works for me.
reviews.reviewText: After only a few hours of use: With the "speaker end" down, the sound is too tinny on some surfaces where I would regularly use it - unlike experiences with other speakers. With "switch end" down, some switches are triggered when I put the thing down, triggering a reset in at least two cases.

reviews.reviewTitle: Volume Level Does Not Stay Where you Set it, once power off!!
reviews.reviewText: The volume level is automatically reset after it power off. Every time you turn it on you need to adjust the volume and that is not good. Other features are awesome, and does not stay on for more than five minutes of inactivity.

reviews.reviewTitle: I did not get what I ordered!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is not what I ordered. I ordered the picture above which was described as the shape of a hockey puck and is a rose gold metal look. I got a cheap plastic speaker the size of a soup can and no instructions on how to set up and use it. Very dissatisfied.

Great little doohickey for listening to music. The sound is definitely much better than my phone! Easy to set up and pair. I can't really speak to the battery life as I keep mine plugged in so really haven't tried using it on the battery alone.

Love the design of this little guy, but didn't like the 'muffled' sound off the top of the table or counter. The sound comes out from the bottom of the device. It might not be such a big deal for someone else, but I just found it annoying. :) Going to give it away to someone who I don't think it will bother as much. lol

It‚Äôs very cute!!! Appears exactly as in picture. I guess it‚Äôs really small. I thought the size would have been larger. Otherwise the color is amazing and the sound is good enough for the price and size. It comes with a little case which is also cute as well.

Sound is great, easy setup, and I love the pink color!
This was a terrific transaction with no issues or problems and it arrived quickly!

reviews.reviewTitle: Too short of cords. Not used it yet. People don't show the real picture of it actually hooked
reviews.reviewText:
I get two short cable. So I have to buy 1 more iPad cords to use on my iPad to the speaker. I have to wait to Walmart to buy another because the cords go all way to the wall. I plan on sitting my lazy boy to use , the plug is is like 5 feet to the chair.
So haven't been able to use it.
Love this little speaker! I have it in my bathroom so i can listen to music in the morning. The sound is great for a small speaker. Battery LASTS DAYS! GREAT PRICE FOR QUALITY

reviews.reviewTitle: Highly recommended it is GREAT!!!!! will buy again as a gift or for me anytime.
reviews.reviewText: I use this for yoga and meditations class I teach in various location and it is the best little speaker I have ever had! I have had this for a few months used it 2 x a week and just had to recharge it 1 time! the sound quality is amazing and the pairing with my phone is the easiest I have ever experienced.

reviews.reviewTitle: Surpassing my expectations. Even included a hard shell case.
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Surpassing my expectations for the price. Even included a hard shell case, which I didn‚Äôt expect (and actually did buy one in advance, so now I have an extra case that I can‚Äôt return because my children threw away the packaging).

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound quality not great on mine
reviews.reviewText:
I like the size, quality, look but I‚Äôm not happy with the sound quality. It sounds very muffled, especially at a higher volume. If I turn it sideways or upside down it sounds better.
Most of the reviews state that the sound quality is good so I may have received a defective speaker. I do love the rose color.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great battery life. Great volume. Easy to set up.
reviews.reviewText: I‚Äôm a preschool teacher with a noisy little bunch of munchkins! I play our circle time music using my phone paired with this incredible Bluetooth. It has amazing volume and is so easy to use. Don‚Äôt know how I survived without it.

Arrived on time, everything there, no damage, good looking unit.
It would not work at all with the aux input from my Galaxy S8.
Not using the aux, the volume was too low even though I turned it all the way up.
I returned it.

This speaker is absolutely great. You can travel with it with ease and it has big sound for a small speaker. It's louder than my Amazon Spot. it comes with an auxiliary cord and a charging cord and a travel bag. I will purchase more.

Love it. Received as described by seller. Fast delivery. This is is probably my 4 times buying them . They are great for gifts. Good quality sound. For an inexpensive priced. Last at least 9 hrs . Thanks you so much to view my request to delivered it to right Address.

This speaker is fantastic, especially for such a low price! I've used mine for about 7-8 hours since I got it and haven't had to charge it once. The sound quality is amazing, and the controls are ridiculously simple, you practically don't need to read the instructions. It also came with a nice little carrying pouch, a usb cable for charging, and an auxiliary cable. The touch pad for the buttons is very responsive. I got the black version and it's very nice looking.

Got it for my mom so she can listen to music while she‚Äôs in the kitchen or doing laundry and she likes it! The size is great so you can take it anywhere and the sound is awesome for the size! So far we‚Äôve had no issues with it

Wow, it's the Perfect lil portable speaker!! I Use it in my room all the time while cleansing & it's been a must have by the family pool!! I love it & the rose gold color adds just the right flare!! Very modern & sooooo easy to use!!!

It's a little bit bigger than I was expecting, but it definitely does the job. My only complaint is that the middle Play/Pause/Stop button is on backwards, so when I first started using it, I kept restarting the song instead of skipping ahead. But I really like that I can change the volume or songs with just the speaker, makes it easier than going to my phone. And it definitely gets loud.

Love this little speaker, the quality is amazing for the price. I got it to pair with my phone, as the phone is often too quiet to listen to music on, this speaker is the size of a hockey puck, solid and gets very loud. I would purchase this again for myself or as a gift, great deal and great product!

Im really happy with this for the price. My only complaint is ther battery life but I'm generally using it inside anyway so it's not that big of a deal. Its really nice looking and heavy, sound quality is better than ones I've bought in the past. It's worth the price

Easy to use. Sounds great. Connects quickly. It plays for hours without a problem. Button response is a little slow so highering the volume can take a bit. And be careful it‚Äôs easy to accordingly make a phone call on this thing.

The instructions are horrible. So, it‚Äôs just a matter of playing with it to figure out how it works. I figured out how to get music from my phone to the speaker, but if it does anything else, I haven‚Äôt figured that out yet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent speaker, but received a used product
reviews.reviewText:
I rated this product 3 stars because I‚Äôve definitely received a used product. The box was not sealed, the product itself has some water marks on the top side, and the rubber stands are full of scratches.
The product itself works okay. When you put it on a table in normal way, the speaker faces downward, creating some noticable murmur. However, if you put it upside down it sounds much better.

Great little speaker for my laptop. Perfect addition to take the laptop out on the deck and watch a movie. If your laptop does NOT have Bluetooth you'll need an Avantree DG40S USB Bluetooth 4.0 Adapter Dongle for PC Laptop Computer. Perfect pairing!

The speaker is.. Ok... But it is very cheaply made... The play button is printed on backwards.. And common sense, + volume should be on top and - volume should be on bottom, but they are switched.. If you don't have OCD, maybe it won't bother you as much.. Then, when I asked for a return (for my defected item), they only offered me half of my money back.. If you are looking for something cheap, this isn't horrible. But I'd rather spend a little more for better quality..

i bought this about a month or two ago. The speaker is good and it is really loud, but it has some problems. After a while the bluetooth would randomly disconnect and the aux cord didn't really work well. It's loud, portable, and stylish, but has some problems after using it for a bit. I don't know if there was something just wrong with mine, but aside from that it's a great speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well built speaker with cringe-worthy voice prompts
reviews.reviewText: Excellent design and build quality. However the English voice notifications are a travesty. The person saying the voice prompts has heavy non-English accent. The promt for incoming call is a nagging, barely intelligible "hear, hear, hear." Sounds good and has solid bluetooth radio.

Its a beautiful piece of work. Sleek metal design

Sound is good for what you pay for, it's not on the scale of a Bose but its great for everyday use.

The plus side to this is that you can control the volume and advance channel or music from the device itself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing sound, touch controls on top, long life battery, compact
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love it! Amazing sound for something so small & compact, it's like listening to a stereo! The touch controls being on top is a bonus - instead of having to pick it up each time like some of the others this size. It also has a long battery life. It was already charged right out of the package, but I charged it anyway to make sure it was fully charged. I use it daily and haven't had to charge it again yet! It comes with a drawstring bag to keep it in which makes taking it with you a breeze. I highly recommend it!

Not a bad speaker only thing i am not fond of speaker being on the bottom but it's loud and has good sound so i would recommend plus you put the volume on high on your phone but still make itc louder on the speaker i like that a lot overall i think i would buy this again

I love this little speaker! It‚Äôs powerful sound is amazing! It‚Äôs conveniently compact to carry! The batter last for hours! I received it so fast in the mail. I really needed something to perform at a luncheon and this speaker is perfect!! Thank you so much!
The sound is muffled and not loud enough. Bought this as a replacement speaker that went missing.

This little speaker made it possible to watch video on my personal computer. Originally bought for my tablet but now I use on both. The auxiliary cord comes with the speaker for the pc and it is wireless for the tablet with bluetooth.
I ordered the wrong thing...I was suppose to order an echo for my sister not a speaker....which I eventually did!

Love this little speaker. The thing I noticed is if the speaker is on a flat surface and sounds like it's got way to much treble, flip it over and it sounds way better. The battery life on this is outstanding. I listen to podcasts at night to fall asleep so this thing plays all night long and then some.

I love this little speaker! The keys on the top are very convenient and it connects to my Bluetooth quickly and easily. It charges quickly and battery life is great. And best of all, the sound is really good for a speaker this small.

The touch part takes a bit to turn off but it‚Äôs still a good speaker. I was going to use it in my car for my new phone since it doesn‚Äôt have Bluetooth but I can‚Äôt figure out where to place it. It gives you no room to Velcro it to your dash or no clip to hang it. But I am pretty smart. I will figure it out. Also, buy the hard shell case. Easy to travel with and holds all wires.

I bought this as a gift for a friend who is somewhat non-technical so I set it up for her (ridicuously easy). I didn't get a chance to check the battery life but the sound was so good I decided to buy myself one.
I got this speaker for my grandson to use with his Kindle. It‚Äôs a great little speaker for the price. I may order another one for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound and such a small portable product
reviews.reviewText: A lot louder than I expected. I find I don't even need it on the highest sound to enjoy! I read the reviews and didn't believe the sound would be so loud until I received it. Lightweight and easy to travel with

reviews.reviewTitle: Great things do come in small packages! üëçüëç
reviews.reviewText: Honestly the color and price caught my attention then when I saw the reviews and videos, I was sold on this item. This little speaker is powerful and sound is amazing!! I would honestly buy everyone I know one if I could afford it.

This is small but reasonably powerful speaker I‚Äôm using it on my echo dot. The echo dot has limitations and can only go through one speaker, whether it‚Äôs the internal or the external one. I wanted this to be in the spot where it could play white noise on the other side of the room it works fine for this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lot's of Sound from a Small Speaker!
reviews.reviewText: Speaker output from my iPhone is not quite loud enough for my very old ears so I thought I'd give this XLEADER Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speakers with HD Sound a try. I'm very impressed with the output from this speaker!!!

Have had it only a short time, but it seems to fit my needs so far, & design is attractive. Maybe little nubbins on bottom to elevate it a bit would be a minor improvement, as speaker sits flat on any surface. Very pleased with this product.
Great quality Bluetooth speaker. Durable and sound quality is great. Can‚Äôt beat this speaker for price.

I got this for the kids room so I could control the music while I wasn't in there, and put in playlists easier. But it turns out it plays off of microsd card too! It's just a good little speaker, easy to set up, pretty loud, cool interface. Definitely worth the price.
*VERY DISAPPOINTED, IT CANNOT PLAY 2 SIMUTANEOUSLY, TOTAL FAIL, I BOUGHT 2 CAUSE SOMEWHERE I READ IT COULD PLAY IN STEREO, BULLFUCKINSHIT LYING PRICKS!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound was okay, worked as advertised
reviews.reviewText:
Instructions hard to read. It would be nice if downloaded pdf instructions were available. Connected bluetooth with Ipad and LG optimus V but could not bluetooth connect to Galaxy s5 so not sure if this is an issue with my Galaxy s5 or the speaker.

Sound was a little better than my other mini bluetooth speaker but was hoping for better sound and deeper bass levels.

The battery life is good. I charge at night when I leave work and can play the full 8 hours that I‚Äôm at work. The sound quality is good also. I turn it to the very minimum and it‚Äôs still loud enough to hear very well. I plan on buying another for home.

Only problem i have with my speaker is the previous/next song buttons. So the next song button is actually the previous song button and vice versa. Also the speaker gets loud but i think the quality could be a little better. Other than that it‚Äôs not too bad.

So the speaker is at the bottom which muffles the sound and if you just want to turn it over so the sound isn't muffled it'll pry disconnect. Sound quality isn't very good either it gets loud but it's not a crisp sound, and the battery life is definitely exaggerated it will last four hours tops.

This little speaker is excellent. I bought it to stream lullabies into my son's room. The Bluetooth works even through multiple walls. Easy to connect, easy to use. Good volume, although it can get staticky at times. Great performance for the money.

Super cute! Small! The color is amazing! Sounds great! Battery life great. But... I‚Äôll be honest to say, you need to flip the speaker over (so the speaker faces up) to get the best quality of the sound. I am standing it up so I can still see how cute it is andddddd get the sound lol totally worth it! It‚Äôs my desk/work speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. This speaker cracks, skips, and low quality

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound is not that great on a flat surface
reviews.reviewText: I have to put this up on something because the speaker part is on the bottom of the speaker and it muffles the sound. Once you put it up on something that has an open bottom , the sound is what I would expect from a $15 speaker.

I really like the speaker. My husband was pleasantly surprised too. When he saw the size of it he said, "how loud does it go"? We were both very happy with the volume level. I can play it loud enough to hear clearly throughout the house (1800 sq ft.) It really is the size of a hockey puck...maybe a tad bigger. It is really good quality materials as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: AUX and USB cables way too short.
reviews.reviewText: Come on people, how are you supposed to charge this in your car, with an 18-24 inch cable? What? is it just supposed to hang there? It would be nice to be able to pick up your device and not have to pick up the speaker due to the short AUX cable as well. Why are companies so stinking stingy with cables? It was nice to see it came with a little bag, and I like the size. I've not really tried it in my car with my kindle, and non-Bluetooth radio to test the sound, but these short cables are going to be a PITA.
Very shabbily made, much better sound quality from my phone. Will be returning it.

Bought the rose gold as a gift and she loved it! It‚Äôs the perfect color and the sound is really good for the price. She does say that the quality gets a little static when she puts it to the highest volume but for its price, it‚Äôs a great buy! It‚Äôs easy to hook up via Bluetooth and easy to use.
This thing is compact but I've got nothing but praises for this little device. Looks so cute too. Love the touchpad it's got on top!

I love this little speaker! For something as cheap as this, it is a really good product and really worth the money. I have only had the speaker for a short time but in the times that I have used it, I have been very satisfied.

Didn‚Äôt provide better sound than speaker iPhone 8 which is why I purchased wanted to return was told i had to return to their facility about 45 minutes away from, wound up keeping - poor business ethnics but I betcha the are making millions off us

Find myself using this all the time to listen to TED talks and other audio (podcasts, radio etc.) on my phone. Not a bad little unit. In fact, am really pleased with it. Does its thing quite nicely. Kudos to the designer.

I bought this to be a pillow BT speaker. It's not loud and bassy, but it didn't need to be to do what I wanted. It's loud enough. The voice confirmation prompts sounds like a Chinese woman, incidentally.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for Work & Good Quality Sound
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something to play my music from my phone on at work. They won't let us play music from our computers and I hate all of the commercials on the radio, so I opted for this solution and I am thoroughly enjoying it. It's perfect for what I needed.

Only complaint iz that it is hard to get to bluetooth operation on my samsung tablet How do you get it to go tobluetooth mode immediately After several attempts it finally goes to bluetooth just don't know how i get it there on the first try

Good speaker for the price. Easy to use. Can get quite loud. The actual sound quality is pretty rough, reminds me of watching an 80s movie, and a radio is playing in the movie. But, for the price, I wasn‚Äôt expecting excellence. Was a little disappointed that the music sounds like an iPhone playing in a tin can.
I love this Bluetooth speaker .it is nice and loud ,good quality sound and feels like it is well made with high-quality material

For the price of this speaker I felt like it would be low quality but I bought it because of other reviews I read. I am SO GLAD I did! This is so easy to move around & easy to use & the sound is great!

Portability and Bluetooth technology very good. Speakers sound clear and good quality. I have not used it enough yet to know how good of a battery life it has. Product comes with complete with a nice carrying case as it is portable. The look is also very sleek and the product is easy to use. I am very happy so far with this product.

I like product because of size & price. However, I wish it would just stay on all the time without turning itself off when not in use. I know this is picky, but I was using to split an Alexa (echo device) that's wired to my home stereo. That way I can still interact with Alexa for non-music purposes without needing to turn the home stereo on. Overall great for what it's supposed to do! I'm just trying to do something very specific to my needs!

Great speaker, small enough that it doesn't take up a lot of room on my desk at work. Got the black and most people don't even know that it's there. Charged it for 5 minutes when I got it and listed to it for most of the day with no problems. Any problems so far have been with wandering too far from it with my phone but better than being tethered by earbuds.

for the size it delivers great sound, controls are in a great position, and very responsive. perfect size for travel, or on a kitchen table. very attractive design! works very easily with a android phone. no problem hooking it up!

Package arrived super fast and was packaged well. Cute little Bluetooth speaker. Sound quality is excellent. I needed to amplify my MacBook Pro. I couldn‚Äôt hear anything out of my laptop speakers and this xleader A8 is perfect. Since I need it for this purpose it doesn‚Äôt matter to me that the range is about 15 feet.
this product is fine although, the speaker is on the bottom which makes it sound weird if it's not on a flat surface.

The battery lasts a LONG time. I love it, I can take calls on it that are super clear. It plays music clearly with volume buttons and I can leave my phone in the house and take it pretty far outside and it still works awesome!

Sounds great. Volume is great. Connect to Bluetooth easily. Have not had a chance to check out battery life. The only problem so far is the inability to understand some of the things the device is saying, like when you get a phone call while connected. When a call comes through the Music Stops and it starts to repeat something but I cannot understand what it's saying.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quality Speaker For A Good Price
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the sound quality and the volume of the speaker. I like that it tells you when it‚Äôs connected, disconnected, on and off. I dropped it once on a tile floor and the fall didn‚Äôt faze it. My friend liked it so much, she bought one for herself.

reviews.reviewTitle: Please Get This Speaker If You Are Considering
reviews.reviewText: If the reviews weren‚Äôt so high I probably wouldn‚Äôt have bought this speaker but it‚Äôs amazing! The speaker is on the bottom of the dot itself which I found weird but with the touch screen top it makes senses. The base is perfect and the volume is ridiculous(In a good)! Bluetooth range is just as great.

I don't use to listen music frequently. My usage is to connect on my notebook for skype meeting at work. It is perfect!!
Even listening music is good quality.
Very simple to pair with IPhone using Bluetooth.

For the money this little speaker is great. I love listening to my pod casts while I‚Äôm getting ready in hotel rooms. It‚Äôs perfect. I know some people hate the quality but I like it. I mean it‚Äôs not bose, but it‚Äôs fine.

This is an amazing little , new toy and I LOVE it. I also love the phone call feature that let's you use it as a speaker phone. SO HAPPY I found and bought this. It would make an awesome Christmas gift !!!!!!

It‚Äôs cute and all but the sound quality is crap! No base. At all. Sounds like it‚Äôs in a tin can. With the speaker at the bottom where you sit it makes for a muffled sound. Sounds better with you flip it over. I couldn‚Äôt wait to get this. But I am so dissatisfied with this product. I will return.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great sound at an affordable price
reviews.reviewText: I didn't start off with extremely high expectations for the product. I just needed a portable speaker with reasonable quality sound at a price that would not burn too big a hole in my pocket. This speaker exceeded my expectations. The sound is pretty great and comparable to a pricier speaker that I had previously owned. The look of the speaker is also classy and it is easy to pair with devices and to operate. Love it!

Nice little speaker, but if you lay it flat down, it muffles the sound. It needs to be resting standing up, for the sound quality to be normal. I'm slightly concerned about it rolling off the table when it's standing on its side. But a nice little speaker for the money!

I JUST LOVE MY SPEAKER. THE SOUND IS CLEAR & I USE IT ALL THE TIME SINCE PURCHASING IT. I'VE ONLY HAD IT FOR ABOUT A MONTH & HALF & HAVE ENJOYED LISTENING TO IT ALMOST EVERYDAY.
BTW....IT HAS LONG CHARGING LIFE.

reviews.reviewTitle: Loud enough for a group to here
reviews.reviewText: Its a little difficult to carry while walking, if you put it in your pocket the buttons can get bumped and change loudness, or forward to another song, etc. But love the quality and the loudness as we go walking and can here it quite well. Would buy again in a heartbeat

Great speaker. I use it to sync with my phone's white noise app when going to sleep. Only negative is the bright flashing blue light. Put some tape over it to lessen the effect. Otherwise incredible value.

Great little speaker. Looks substantial and the color is very nice. Came packaged well. The only downside is the directions. It would not hook up to Alexa by Bluetooth. Emailed company and Melinda sent directions to a Utube video. Followed along and it hooked up right away. Haven't had it long enough to comment on the battery life.

Fantastic product, modern stylish design. I am very impressed with these speakers. You can program them to work wirelessly (Bluetooth) or attach a cord to the speakers to use on your computer. The sound quality is great and very loud.
Better than expected!! I love this thing!
I have only had for a short time, but so far so good. It is small and very light weight. Easy to connect and pair well with both my Apple products. I would recommend.
Very good speaker for travel. Very good sound quality, however you have turn the device upside down to get good quality. Great for travel.

I‚Äôve only used it twice so it‚Äôs to early to really know how long a full charge lasts. I do love the size and how it works. The sound isn‚Äôt as clear as I was hoping for tho. So far I do really like it and once I‚Äôve used it more I will try to write an update.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks pretty on my desk and excellent volume control
reviews.reviewText:
Needed something I could have at my desk, but needed great sound at a low volume. This fits the bill exactly!
Love the touch controls at the top of the speaker - makes it very easy to adjust volume or turn off music quickly without fiddling with my phone.

reviews.reviewTitle: üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü Just delivered a hour ago and I am buying another one ‚òùÔ∏èLoVE it
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love it üëç I literally opened the box, plugged it in to charge for a hour then turned the Bluetooth on my iPhone and it connected right away. THATS IT !! Easiest price of electronics I have ever purchased.

It‚Äôs SUPER cute which is honestly my favorite part. I put 4/5 stars for battery life and durability because I‚Äôve only had it a short time and don‚Äôt actually know yet. The sound quality is great so far and it‚Äôs simple and easy to use and connect. I love that I can control the volume and song selection right from the speaker too. It‚Äôs sleek and compact, and looks awesome on my make up vanity. Def recommend!
HORRIBLE !!! Loudest setting you can barely hear anything! I returned.

reviews.reviewTitle: I turn it off when I am not using it. Since I don't use it every day I don't see a reason to keep needlessly re-charging.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product. The sound is great for my small apt. The vendor was great too. See the comments on the page for this and get helpful advice on setting up with an Alexa Dot. I followed the steps and it worked perfectly. ;) https://www.amazon.com/dp/B076PHC9N6/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_0

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent product you won't be disappointed!!!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my wife and she loved it. She only needed it for when she's showering or getting things done around the house. She says it's pretty loud and for the price it costs that its totally worth it.
Bought this to use in the backyard or at the beach. It has pretty good sound and I‚Äôm happy with my purchase.
Died after only 4 months of use; and after I already received a replacement from another issue regarding constant beeping. I am filing a complaint with BBB.org

After one day of use it won‚Äôt charge or work anymore. I can keep it on the charger all day and when I try to turn it on it won‚Äôt work. I‚Äôm disappointed because I really liked the sound and size of it
Nice design, nice color, great sound, reasonably priced.

Works well enough; small & compact. Very easily portable from room to room with good connectivity. Simple to use. Can connect and disconnect Bluetooth via phone or device. Sounds better when on a flat surface. Overall happy with purchase.

Awesome speaker!! I purchased the rose gold. I use the speaker to boost audio from my cellphone when listening to music and YouTube videos. The sound is clear and loud.

I recommend getting the travel case here from Amazon: Hard Case for Bluetooth Speaker XLeader Portable Speaker by Hermitshell (Rose gold).

I love this little bugger!!! It came right on time and the sound quality is Phenomenal!!! I would highly recommend this if your looking for a very good quality sound and besides that it‚Äôs a very attractive Bluetooth!

The battery life to this speaker device is HORRIBLE. At first I thought It was just a one off- I charged It and literally 30 min later it died and said to recharge.... so I did. It did the same thing. It‚Äôs such a waste of money Im so disappointed in this product I can‚Äôt even take it down to my pool for laying out for 30 min or more.

I lead exercise classes for the elderly and needed something portable with clear sound. This fits the bill. It was easy to set up and the sound quality is very good. You get a lot of quality for the price.
The speaker arrived on time and was well-packaged. You cannot beat the sound for this price. My daughter loves it, and I‚Äôm going to use it when traveling. It‚Äôs the perfect size.

I Purchased the speaker because it is so cute I love the color I wanted to like it so much but it just was not meant to be. It sounds weird and has really low volume it does not put out very much sound. As for battery life I do not know because I did not keep it I returned it. I was so disappointed because I love the color!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to store and good sound
reviews.reviewText: This product feels like good quality. I bought it for my assisted living exercise classes. It comes with a cute and sturdy carrying case with a pocket inside to hold the aux cord and charger cord. The sound is great. Unsure about the battery life as I havent used it very much yet. Cant beat the price. I'm very impressed so far! Wish it came with a wall adapter but you only get the aux and charger cord. However, a wall adapter probably wouldn't fit nicely in the cute case anyway. I love it regardless.

Only my first day with the product. But for the price you cannot beat it! There is minimal bass, mostly treble so obviously not meant for more than to play music casually. Also, someone else did mention in their review that the sound quality is a little bit better when turned upside down (since the speaker is on the bottom) otherwise, it works perfectly for what I needed!

We purchased this to be a speaker for our bathroom so we could listen to music while getting ready for work in the morning. The speaker sound quality is great, it is fairly small so it‚Äôs not taking up a lot of space, and in two months I‚Äôve only had to charge it once. This is a nice little speaker and big value for the cost. Very happy with our purchase.

If headphones can do next/previous, then bluetooth speakers should be able to also. Bluetooth option works fine and the only other ones I can find with separate next/previous (instead of combo with volume up/down) are much larger physically so we're keeping it.

have not used it much yet. but, what I have has been what I expected. Will update after more use. Update, best little speaker ever, told friends about it. They love it 2. Also it fell of the table and still work like new. Awesome.

reviews.reviewTitle: That it sound clear and it do
reviews.reviewText: Wow little but loud best bluetooth speaker

I like it very much. Good sound quality. I‚Äôm enjoying it
I don‚Äôt know yet about battery life and durability yet just started using it.

I was very surprised of how loud this little speaker can go. For the price it‚Äôs totally worth it. I had read from another review that the sound quality is better when the unit is upside down and it‚Äôs true. Depending on what you place it on (right side up), it may sound too high pitched/treble. That‚Äôs just a preference of mine. I‚Äôm happy with the purchase.

These speakers are great. The connecting is super easy and fast. They are definitely loud. And the sound is amazing. Highly recommend. I‚Äôve been listening to them for almost 6 hours straight out the box. Still going. So nice battery life too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing sound for the price, super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I am surprised at the quality of the sound of this super small speaker. It is also nice looking and very easy to set up (it does connect automatically, you just have to...turn the power on !)

I love this little speaker. The tone is good as is the battery life. I love the compact size. I only wish I have is for more bass, but that may not be possible because of the size. I would recommend it to friends. A good buy.

I use this at work and it‚Äôs perfect! I get many compliments and my ‚Äúroommate‚Äù at work can plug her phone into this for her music! We are happy rocking co-workers with this awesome little speaker!

Love this speaker! I purchased two: rose gold and black. They were easily paired with my phone and I really love the sound. They have a sleek style and design. They don‚Äôt have true buttons, it‚Äôs a flat touch surface like a cell phone or tablet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Impressive speaker for size and price - Great Service
reviews.reviewText: I am using these for my massage therapy practice. I was doing chair massage with another therapist outside in a noisy environment and she brought this great little puck as her blue tooth speaker. I couldn't believe the sound for the size. It is truly amazing and then for the price! Unbelievable! Very happy with my purchase and the service!

This speaker arrived less than 24 hours after I ordered it online. The speaker was easy to connect and start using right out of the box. It has great sound quality and a good volume range. The rose color is beautiful!

Perfect speaker for my office. Just wish it didn‚Äôt say when the item is paired or unpaired. Sound is good at lower volumes, it‚Äôs not intended to fill out a room with sound. Would be good to take on business trips when listening to other Bluetooth devises in a hotel room

For such a small speaker, this thing rocks! Has bottom firing speaker which gives nice bass effect. Connects to blue tooth without any problems. It's small and super easy to carry around. Very nice portable on the go blue tooth speaker.

I used this speaker for a lounge event that I had and it was a powerful little thing. It sounded much better than I thought it would. I have only two critical things to say. 1. I wish the volume would go louder. I turned it all the way up but it was still too low if you are trying to fill a room with music. 2. It needs more bass. So some tuning would improve it. Other than that it was filled the need. If you are looking for a personal speaker for your office or kitchen, this is a good deal. It was wroth the money.
I don't know where the company hired their technical writer to create their directions, but they are very hard to follow.
I love this little speaker. For such a small thing, it has great sound and good battery life. Took this on vacation - it packed well and was so easy to set up and use. I would purchase again!

I love it it‚Äôs very small but powerful sound, only thing I would complain is that touch buttons are very very sensitive when I hold it my hands I usually switch songs or disconnect without intention

reviews.reviewTitle: it‚Äôs small and is easy to pack to travel with
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my 12 year old daughter for her birthday and she loves it, it‚Äôs small and is easy to pack to travel with, decent sounding! Love it and will be buying another for my step daughter for her birthday.
I'm A ole Dinosaur and I could not get the speaker to pair up with my ILive Platinum echo. I packed it up and returned it, it was probably me but I could not get it to work for, nice unit thou .
It met or exceeded my every expectation! Love it!

I love the product. Suddenly the speaking stop working. It would come on but not project the sound. I used another speaker and it worked well. I looked back at my order date and it is too late to send it back. The last day to return it was the October 20th and today is October 21. There was a period of time I did not try to use the product. This will teach me to react expeditiously and not procrastinate.
Only had it a few days but used it at work with no problems. Easy to connect to and it even got a little wet from cleaning solution and had no problems! Great sound, can get super loud.

Pretty good Bluetooth speakers for this tiny little guy. It gets very loud and offer a very clear audio. Not much bass. Great battery life and was very easy to pair onto my phone. The design looks slick and premium. Good speakers for such a low price.

I bought this speaker for use around the house and it does not disappoint. For the price I paid I was shocked at how well it sounds! I thought having the speaker on the bottom would affect sound quality but it does not. It has small legs on the bottom to hold it up just enough so it doesn‚Äôt sound muffled. I was able to connect it without reading the instructions in less than a minute. I highly recommend this product and would purchase one again.

This arrived quickly and was just as described. I got the speaker and the case. I love that it stays on so you don't have to reconnect through blue tooth, especially if you leave it plugged in. It is easy to use and sounds good!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cutest Bluetooth speaker..with satisfactory sound range
reviews.reviewText:
Dynamite comes in small packages..
This item is dynamite
.perfect for travelling indoors or outdoor ......sound range and bass within reason....price is right....colors and tone is royally classic...

I recommend this for everyone because it is a great deal. You can hear your music crystal clear. It's small so you can sticker on your pocket and it can be really low of really loud. The speaker is on the bottom but trust me this don't stop it from anything.
I have to be honest, I didn't expect a whole lot for the price, but we were pleasantly surprised! Great sound, easy to use, perfect portable size and battery lasts for quite a while!
GOT THIS SPEAKER FOR MY DAUGHTER TO BLUETOOTH HER MUSIC IN THE BATHROOM. GREAT SOUND EVEN WITH THE SHOWER RUNNING. PRETTY COLOR SPEAKER AND IT DOES NOT TAKE UP MUCH ROOM.

Nice speaker, I use it in my car which does the job. My car‚Äôs auxiliary doesn‚Äôt work anymore and I needed a little speaker to play podcasts and music until I get my car fixed. The speaker sounds nice if I put it on my dash on top of the soft material. It comes already charged, it was easy to sync to my iPhone 8.

Everything I was looking for and more!!!! The sound is amazing....I go daysssss without recharging the battery with no issues- great battery life. My husband got jealous I didn‚Äôt order him one so guess who has to reorder this awesomeness!!!

I really like this speaker. The sound is good even though the speakers are on the bottom. It is sturdy and looks nice. I can't vouch for it playing music because I use it primarily for podcasts, but I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I love this little speaker! Great price, looks cool, sounds great. I have it in my office to blast my music in the early mornings. Holds a charge ridiculously well. Very small and cute.

reviews.reviewTitle: Big sound in a little package!
reviews.reviewText: There‚Äôs nothing about this speaker I don‚Äôt like, I absolutely love the sound that‚Äôs emanating from it! Hearing Pandora come across so clear and perfect soothes my soul! Bonus is that you can also answer your phone on this device, it‚Äôs a keeper! And my son is trying to take mine, guess I‚Äôll be buying another soon!!

I bought this product to use with my devices to hear movies, etc.
It works great! I really love the fact that I can connect my phone to it and make it easy to talk and do things around the house at the same time. Got to love multi-tasking.
This speaker is great! The only negative is that the forward and back buttons are mixed up... they do the opposite of what they usually would! But it's honestly a great speaker for the price!
Awesome little speaker for the price. I think the sound quality is really good for the size and price.
Bought two. One stopped working pretty fast

Very good speaker with quality sound. Buttons on top make it easy to control what you are listening to. Only issue I had was that the Fast forward is rewind and the rewind is fast forward. It isn't a problem.
Good speaker! It gets the job done. One design flaw, the speaker is on the bottom, and you have to turn it upside down to use it correctly (get the loudest boom). Otherwise, love it!

I purchased two of theses speakers for Christmas. They are very easy to use, they have a great sound and the battery life is a huge selling point as well.

I am very satisfied with this speaker and would highly recommend it.
It's a nice little speaker for the price. I wanted something super portable and this does the job. Don't buy this expecting big sound and booming bass. Not gonna happen...

For a low cost Bluetooth speaker, this little thing puts out a lot of sound. I use it in a daycare for infant for quiet lullabies and in a busy school aged room with lots of nosy children. It‚Äôs loud when I need it and still keeps the music in good quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: I highly recommend this speaker for affordability, ease of use and sound quality.
reviews.reviewText: The speaker is the perfect size to take on the go. I bought mine to take to work. It has great sound for such a small speaker. The controls are easy to use and in a great spot. I love that it came with a small pouch to transport it.
I have to fwt it set it up i Gave u good stars game goid not broken mm need to get a sd card though can bot wait i ve geting to it soon i jwt u know how iike it thank u

For the price this is an excellent excellent speaker. I would give it 5 stars, but its to soon to tell
on battery life and durability. It doesn't have an immense amount of bass...but its a small classy
looking speaker that sounds great! I bought two initially. Then bought another for my girlfriends
son because he liked it so much!

A million speakers on the market. Nothing special here. The major flaw is that the speaker is underneath the device, so it sounds horrible. If you flip it upside down, it‚Äôs actually pretty loud but you lose the ability to use the touch functions.

I absolutely love this little thing. And the color is so pretty. Very handy to take to the pool or the beach or just outside in general. It has a nice sound to be so small. And the battery life is much better than I expected.

What i like.... it was easy to pair with my small pad. it meets my expectation: a small speaker by my computer so I can listen to audio books while i work... I have not paired it with my phone. or my Big TV at home.
I probably wont. This is perfect for $16... perfect.
Gifted to asst living director

Great sound for such a small speaker - Bluetooth pairing is fast & easy - size is pocket perfect - I ordered a micro SD card to load music and see how well it plays - will come back for update - I recommend this speaker for on the go application.

This is a nicely built and very portable speaker. The sound quality is good, although I did feel that the sound broke a little at high volume. I deducted a star each from battery and durability as I have not used the speaker enough times to comment on either. Therefore, I am reserving my comment on both of those aspects until further use (I will update this review accordingly). That said, this is a really good speaker. It has a stylish make, is lightweight and portable and has good sound quality. I am happy with the purchase.

I had another bluetooth speaker for my laptop and it was absolutely driving me crazy. This SLeader portable speaker is absolutely great- The sound is very good and it connects to my laptop in seconds.Thank you!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Blue tooth speaker with volumn control

I can't tell you about something that I haven't completely installed yet, I also ordered two other speakers for our grandsons birthday in June. I will let you know about those after their birthday party.

This little speaker is small by mighty. I bought it to listen to music around the house and on the patio. It suits my needs perfectly, feels heavy in my hand, comes with a carry case, charger and adapter. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality as such a low price. I have not run the battery down yet, so I cannot comment on the battery life. I did use it for around 2 hours and it showed no signs of the battery being low. Would recommend to a friend.

The room size is about 30 x 15 and this speaker fills the room with clear and booming music. The clients can hear and understand everything clearly which helps the group progress. I'm genuinely impressed by it and glad I bought it.

My daughter loves this. I got her a speaker to match her phone and it has great volume, clarity and is very tidy and easy to store. It's been almost a month of her using it and no issues yet. (She has an iPhone 6s for reference). Recommend!

I work in a warehouse with lots of noise. This speaker is great. It‚Äôs loud and easy to connect and use. I have got a lot of compliments and people always ask where I got it because they want one. I can‚Äôt soeak on the battery life really because i usually just keep it plugged in.
Bought for my iPhone so that I could hear directions on Google Maps in the car - I have a sports car and there is lots of road noise - iPhone just wasn't loud enough. This little speaker is fabulous.

Best mini stereo ever! It‚Äôs very loud and projects through my apartment. Can even hear it outside . I was surprised and everyone was surprised how great the quality is especially for the size and price. Hands down better than a beats stereo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Volume Not As Loud As I Thought It Would Be
reviews.reviewText: Instructions are clearly written by someone with English as a second language and they are not understandable. We figured it out but not by the instuctions. The Sound is really no louder than my tablet which is what I bought it for. Not really happy with it.

I just got the product but its excellent so far. I like the quality of the sound, the touch screen, the built in battery was the final feature that make me decide for this product. The size is really compact. What I would prefer was a kind of support to stand it by itself or a hanger to carry it around.
I love the size and it looks quality. Sound is descent and battery life is true to package description. Love the carrying case! I use this at work. This is an awesome little Bluetooth speaker!

I was very worried that the speaker would not work the way it was supposed to. I have never ordered any electronics from Amazon. However, I am extremely happy and impressed with my blue tooth speaker. It is the perfect size and it sounds bigger than it actually is. I would recommend others to buy this blue tooth speaker as well.

My 68yr old mom wanted a bluetooth speaker. This was the perfect one for her. It's very easy for her to use.
It has a nice weight to it and seems to be of good quality.
The rose gold is quite beautiful

It is not as loud as I would‚Äôve liked. The speaker is on the bottom of the device which seems weird bc sound is muffled. It‚Äôs ok when I‚Äôm alone in my classroom but as soon as the students come in, I can barely hear it.

reviews.reviewTitle: HUGE SOUND IN A SMALL PACKAGE.
reviews.reviewText: It's compact. cute. amplifies sound and it's wireless. Great bang for a buck.
I love it, Excellent item, nice sound, Beautiful, Excellent

reviews.reviewTitle: Sound is off but works good.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is my favorite speaker! Love the rose gold color and large ...
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite speaker! Love the rose gold color and large control buttons. The speakers are on the bottom so sound can be played very loud because it bounces off whatever surface you have it on. Sound is good quality.

I listen to it at the golf course where I work part time and have had several folks stop and ask where I got it and passed along the brand name. One asked me if it cost over a 100 and was shocked at what I purchase it for. Very happy with this purchase and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound quality but not super loud
reviews.reviewText: Customer service was very helpful in informing me about the power light indicators. Not as loud as I thought it might be tbh (similar in volume with my phone at the highest setting) but sound quality was better than my phone. I own a samsung galaxy s8

Use this speaker as a radio in my car and for hiking. Sound quality is nice, even when I have all 4 windows down. I dont know if my speaker is possessed but it frequently changes the songs or thinks I'm pushing the volume buttons when nothing is near it. Besides that, works nice.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a great little speaker at a very reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I just ordered 2 more, I really like the speaker.

may Have gotten a defective one but this speaker will stop and start the song from the beginning as if on a constant loop. Does it for podcasts too. It doesn‚Äôt do it all the time but will randomly do it making the speaker useless until it fixes itself. (I never figured out how to fix it) For the price, there are better and louder ones here on amazon. I‚Äôve gotten victsing branded ones and they work much better. This speaker may look better but I wish I returned it when I could have.

Good sound quality and VERY impressive battery lifem. I uses for mobile massage and it doesn't run low. It will still ring even if your phone is on silent, so be sure to set airplane or do not disturb.
I love it. It‚Äôs small enough to be easily portable and loud enough to use as a speaker for Prime Videos, Netflix, Hulu, etc. I use this more than my headphones now.

This little Bluetooth speaker really is underrated! Excellent sound quality, not muffled like some reviews I have read. Long lasting battery. I have used it in range of about 50ft. Was ridiculously easy to pair with my Samsung Galaxy S 10 Plus. And the rose gold colour is very pretty. Actually works better than some of the more expensive Bluetooth speakers I have had.
Overall, an excellent product!
Shipped and delivered on-time, no packaging damage.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Portable Speaker for a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this speaker for my office at work, but used it home first to try it out. I love the size and sound so much that I decided to keep it for home and buy another.

The speaker skips when playing audiobooks. I‚Äôve tried it with different apps - Audible and Libby, and different books but it still skips. Music plays fine. Because the speaker is on the bottom, the speaker gives a tin sound. If I put it on its side, it sounds okay.

reviews.reviewTitle: OK so here is the deal
reviews.reviewText: So I would say this speaker is easily portable and would say the sound quality is OK for a movie but is very very tinny for music as it has no 'depth.' As I got it via Prime, I will be returning it and look for a better speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great speaker and the price is right
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy it is to pair, and the sound quality is excellent for a small speaker. I would have liked more documentation but it was easy so good enough. I reall like the style of the speaker also, it really is a great product.

I‚Äôm so impressed by this little speaker. First off, it‚Äôs tiny which makes it easy to take anywhere and store wherever. It pairs right away without lagging. It‚Äôs really loud for its size. I barely charged it when I first got it and it lasted days without dying. Best speaker for its price.

I love this little speaker. There are a few weird things. Every time you turn it on or off there‚Äôs a weird voice that says ‚Äúpowering on‚Äù or ‚Äúpowering off‚Äù it doesn‚Äôt effect anything it‚Äôs just strange. Another thing you need to know is the speakers are on the bottom so the sound changes depending on the surface you put it on. And the last thing is that the play/pause button is upside.

Wanted a small BT speaker to carry in my backpack for work. Found it in this one!. About the size of a hockey puck (much lighter though) and a great sound when placed on either a steel or wood surface. Would buy it again!

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome little portable hockey puck speaker

I bought this speaker to use with my laptop. The sound quality is better than expected. It has stereo sound and huge volume. It more than exceeds my needs. I have used it both indoors with my laptop and outside with my phone. The touch buttons are easy to use and in a convenient location on top of the speaker. The speaker is small and comes with a protective bag. I just toss it in my purse and take it with me. The sound resonates from the bottom. LOVE IT!

The speaker is the perfect size for packing. I got the rose color and it‚Äôs beautiful. It comes with the charge and audio cables and satin pouch.
It would have been nice if a little case was included for a nominal charge.

After a month the charger for this speaker just stopped working.. now I‚Äôm carrying around a dead speaker.
Also the music was decent yes, but there would be brief disconnections while it played music. Wasn‚Äôt bothersome at first but overtime it did get annoying.
Lastly the speaker would decrease the volume on its own. Got annoying overtime as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor sound quality but fine for me
reviews.reviewText: As the headline states, the sound quality is poor but it doesn‚Äôt bother me. It‚Äôs very loud, which is what I wanted, and the price was right. I just wanted a speaker to listen to podcasts while in the shower or the yard gardening and it was fine. If you really care about sound quality you probably need to spend more money

So far this speaker is amazing. I have not used it for an extended period of time to test out the battery life but it seems good. I will say though, it is not the best for a phone call, as it echoes and no one could really hear me. But otherwise, it's really loud and easy to use.

Music sounds great with this speaker. I placed it in the corner of my office but I can hear the music clearly throughout my office and the sound is quality. When watching a movie there is sometimes a minor delay in the sound but it still works great.

This thing sounds like music plays from the tin can it‚Äôs shaped like. Battery lasts forever, cause it‚Äôs barely working. It‚Äôs portable, okay. LOUD, sure. So loud I literally can‚Äôt put this thing on high volumes cause the amount of treble hurts my damn ears. I don‚Äôt know how it‚Äôs got such a high star rating- which is what convinced me to try my luck for such a cheap price.

It‚Äôs a really good speaker for the price. The sound it not the best sometimes it doesn‚Äôt sound a little muffled but nothing to serious. The battery life is pretty good as well. For me it last about 2 days without charging it. I think the only bad bad thing I could really say about this speaker is the voice. When it‚Äôs almost dying there‚Äôs a voice (kinda like Siri) that keeps saying ‚Äúplease charge please charge.‚Äù Other than that it‚Äôs a pretty good speaker:)
Product is good, to our feel battery could last longer and when is on a surface that vibrates changes the song on it's own

reviews.reviewTitle: Works as advertised, but quality is not as great as I'd expcect

For the price I was amazed at the quality. Love the size - looks modern. Great value and lightning fast shipping. Might buy some more for gifts. Great for travel. I thought for sure that I made a mistake, thinking no way would it be Bluetooth/wireless - but it was! What are you waiting for.....

It is for a small room. It is only to hear spa kind of music for relaxing. So, it does the job well. I would recommend this to a friend, I would not recommend this for a party type speaker.

Nice sound for the size ... but one of the most important factors didn‚Äôt work , which was the Bluetooth. It didn‚Äôt work at all, only plug in mode works . Other than that it‚Äôs great . This day in age , all Bluetooth should work seamlessly. It‚Äôs 20 yr old tech .

WOW. I bought a used 2005 Chevy Silverado. My other car is a 2013 Subaru Outback with eyesight. I became very dependent on Bluetooth Music and Telephone. I checked about duplicating the same in my truck. Went to after make electronics vendor. It was going to cost me $400.

Your little speaker that plays my music, Spotify, and my telephone, all hands free is wonderful. What a wonderful product.

the speaker is on the bottom, so if you leave this right side up, the sound is incredibly tinny. I was going to return it until I saw other reviewers turn it upside down. Definitely sounds better, but a bit impractical.

This is the loudest and smallest speaker i've ever purchased. Even at max volume sound is not distorted at all. Wonderful product. Definitely worth the money. Looks and feels like quality. Would definitely recommend.
I just received this yesterday. I can‚Äôt review on the battery as I haven‚Äôt had it long. But I hooked it up to Pandora and the sound is amazing. Very cute as well

I absolutely LOVE this speaker!

I use my tablet to stream tv and the speaker on the tablet wasn‚Äôt loud enough. This speaker has changed that!!

I love it. It has much better sound than I expected and I haven‚Äôt an issue with it for months with daily use. I like that I can take it along with me while cleaning house and the charge lasts.

My friend came over and loved it. Asked if she could have it so I gave it to her and bought a second one that delivered today. Probably the best $15 I spent in a long time. Sound is loud and crystal clear. I plan to get a few more to give to fam and friends. It‚Äôs awesome sauce!!!!!

Small enough to throw in your bag and to fill a room with clear sound. I just got it, so I don't know how long it will hold up, but so far, so good.

The downside to this product is that it's lowest volume is still a little loud for me since I am in an office space. If I were at home or an outing this would make the best music player!!!

You for sure get a lot of bang for the buck!

reviews.reviewTitle: Powerful sound from a small speaker!

I was really surprised at how good this little speaker sounds. Perfect for taking to work. It pairs instantly with my phone and stays connected. Really happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: This little gem is totally worth your money!

Great sound for such a small speaker and for a very reasonable price. Very easy connection - no problem at all. I just received this so I do not have any input regarding its durability.
This little thing is awesome it fills up my whole apartment with loud music i got it a week ago and haven't charged it yet i really love it and it matches the exact color as my iphone

reviews.reviewTitle: Good sound in a little package

Love this speaker. Pairs easy. Works great on my work desk. Sound is a little distorted when on wood and turned up loud and the ‚Äúnext/last‚Äù buttons work backwards. But exactly what I was looking for to add a little sound to my office.

It‚Äôs a cheap speaker, unless you‚Äôve never heard anything but this speaker, you‚Äôll notice it sounds very bad. The reviews saying it sounds really well are either fake or by people who don‚Äôt have good ears. I mean it‚Äôs okay that it does I guess, it‚Äôs cheap as heck. Spend $20 more and get a speaker that will sound so much better. The design isn‚Äôt bad and it feels nice; if they made the speaker cost $10 more and used nicer drivers I‚Äôd purchase again and recommend it. I cannot - in good faith - recommend this to anyone.

Exactly as described, and a terrific bargain at the price. Decent sound, solid construction, physically attractive, by no means cheap-looking or sounding. The only thing cheap about it is the price! Also comes very well packaged. Good job!
for a product so small, the sound is pretty loud! I spent a whole day at the beach and have been teaching my fitness classes with this lil guy. No problems at all

Bought it for my daughter and she loves it... cute, stylish with a nice sound for her in her bedroom. The only downside is the sound comes from the bottom of the speakers which requires her to hold it upside down while using it.

The buttons on the face of the speaker is very easy to use and its not so sensitive to the touch. Over all this speaker is wonderful. I would definately recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: It‚Äôs a very good speaker for the price. You want be disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: This little speaker is very loud. It‚Äôs it with my tablet IPhone 7 or laptop. I was surprised how amplified the sound was, just amazing. I can put it in my purse or work bag and take it with me at all times.

Lighted touch controls easy to use
My granddaughter really loves her speaker. Connected easily to her phone and the sound is perfect. The rose gold color was right up her alley. Great productcand extra great price
This speaker is definitely worth it better than the imitation one has controls on top easy to use do not have to charge as often as cheaper one this thing is great

I got this for my mom as gift, who owns a new model/ brand of headphones so she had to be impressed by the sound quality and she absolutely loves it!!! It looks exactly like the photo, super classy. Not an eye sore.
I love this BT speaker. Its not to small and not too big. It pairs with my phone very easily and it even talks. The sound is big for a small portable speaker. Love it

Love this little speaker. The sound and volume really surprised me. And I took it 2 rooms away from the source and still got great sound. Would definitely recommend this speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Throw in the garbage where it belongs.

Clarity is SUPERB while the Volume is AWESOME from the quietest to the loudest to be small & compact. Battery life is Awesome too.
I luv luv luv it.

finally got around to using this speaker and it skips all the time, making it useless.

It's got a clear sound quality, volume is amazing for those who like loud music. Also it's very compact. When the box arrived I threw it in my purse and took it home.
So far I‚Äôve not had any problems. So far this is the perfect little speaker. It gives off a good and quality sound. It was very simple to use. So far I am satisfied!

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty good, would be better if the speaker wasn't on the bottom
reviews.reviewText: I like it for the most part but with the actual speaker being on the bottom, the sound is kind of muffled and only sounds clear when the unit is upside down.
It didn't have the quality of sound that I expected. Would not work after first usage.

I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loved it. We tested it out. I was not expecting the sound quality to be amazing for its price, but it is! We have had no issues with it. I do recommend buying it.

reviews.reviewTitle: High quality and easy to set up / transport
reviews.reviewText: A small high quality speaker that is easy to set up. Blue tooth connection was seamless. long battery life and great sound quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: For the money it‚Äôs a steal
reviews.reviewText: We got the rose gold speaker and it looks high end. Pairing the device to my iPhone could not have been easier. Good sound. Very clear.
Have a nice quality metal body. Durable and portable. Battery life is also good. Only downside is sound quality gets bit detiorated when it's full volume.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best Bluetooth speaker I‚Äôve ever had! üëèüèª
reviews.reviewText:
I üíúüíúüíú LOVE üíúüíúüíú this speaker!!! I can sing as loud as I want and not worry how closely anyone is listening, because this thing darn near drowns me out! It gets so loud!!!
Now I‚Äôm coming to buy more because my husband and kids all want their own now.

So, I guess I missed the memo that the actual speakers are on the BOTTOM of the device. When it's just sitting on a table or a desk, the sound is honestly bad. It's muffled and hard to hear. I flip it over to hear it better but that kind of defeats the purpose. I bought this for my classroom and it lasted 2-3 months but the Audio Jack barely works anymore. Overall, I've been unimpressed with this item.

I liked how portable it was & how easy it was so set up and use. However, the sound was kind of crisp. Like it was echoing or something & after a while you get tired of hearing your music like that (atleast for me).

reviews.reviewTitle: It is as others say not cheap made wellüëç
reviews.reviewText: I have had a great experience with this speaker so far. I bought the hard case so I can take it with me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good little speaker for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Actually a very nice little speaker. It sounds great my only complaint is the touch pad is too sensitive, causing me to accidentally turn it off if I have to move it.

reviews.reviewTitle: The speaker looks great, the only problem with this speaker is that ...
reviews.reviewText:
The speaker looks great, the only problem with this speaker is that is designed akward.
The sound comes from the bottom of the speaker. The sound is bouncing from the surface underneath and sounds bad. If you turn the speaker upside down the problem is resolved, the sound is good. If you don't mind using it upside down, it's woth the money
I'm happy with it. I ordered it for my classroom and being in a tight space it's loud enough for anyone to hear.

First off Speaker kept turning off while being charged, then it got worst when you touch the top button it calls the last phone number U dialed! I called my Hubby 15x UGH. Speaker had the Worst Cracking Sound, it was Awful. Will be returning it.
Stick to Name brands it will save you Grief.
The best speaker ever! The sound, the battery life are superb! Easy to use and recharge. Cute presentation!

Product is nice with great sound. But we cannot get it hooked up via Bluetooth. Have to use the audio cord, which I don't like. English Instructions are poorly written. They need to include bluetooth.

Also the buttons don't work right away it takes a moment for the skip or pause buttons to work after pressing them. Overall I think it is an excellent speaker :)

So far I hav e only used the product for an online course, so the quality has been quite sufficient to meet my needs. I have not yet used it long enough to evaluate the battery life, but so far, so good.

Speaker sound quality is not great, but what do you expect for $15. Speaker turns off after a relatively short time of non-use. It does not turn on again unless you physically turn it on by pressing and holding the button. This feature is probably to save battery life, however this is true even if connected to a power source. What a pain.
Love this thing! The sound is excellent and it is small enough to fit in a purse. Lightweight and nice design.
Absolutely amazing. The sound quality is incredible. It almost sounds as if I have a portable sound system.
Love the size but was hoping it would have a higher quality tone. Great speaker for the price though.
Read instructions I don't like to read. This is a good product as an external sound you can carry around the house i like it.

This is a very good speaker for its size and price. The reason I am giving the sound a 4 star is that the first day it was opened my phone was able to get louder so if this happens to you let it sit for 3 day and it will work and put out a large amount of sound

Update
This speaker is still going and it feels better than some of the higher priced speakers, if you need a speaker and your low on money I suggest this

We used it for 8 months straight and it just started giving out on us. But Will be repurchasing!

The company didn't replace it but told me about the issue and I just use bluetooth now. Customer service was good and helpful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality product for the quality.
reviews.reviewText: My second purchase after I accidentally spilled water on my original. I bought this for my husband who was in need of a good compact speaker. The sound is equivalent to that of a car speaker in terms of quality (or better). It takes a few hrs to charge at first but the battery lasts a while. Would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not bad, sound quality is mediocre
reviews.reviewText: Not bad for the price, works for my application. Sound quality is poor to fair from a bass perspective, but it certainly isn't horrible.

I needed a small radio for my desk at work and this does the job. I've never had any problems with the battery dying and I love how small it is. It might be small but it gives out a lot of sound. The sound isn't the greatest, but it really isn't bad. It does the job well enough and for the price it's perfect.
